GE09ram_03_u:7: 3.001.003c pūjitaṃ copanṛttaṃ ca nityam apsarasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:10: 3.001.005a āraṇyaiś ca mahāvṛkṣaiḥ puṇyaiḥ svāduphalair vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:12: 3.001.006a puṣpair vanyaiḥ parikṣiptaṃ padminyā ca sapadmayā
GE09ram_03_u:19: 3.001.009c abhyagacchan mahātejā vijyaṃ kṛtvā mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:21: 3.001.010c abhyagacchaṃs tadā prītā vaidehīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:22: 3.001.011a te taṃ somam ivodyantaṃ dṛṣṭvā vai dharmacāriṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:26: 3.001.013a vaidehīṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ rāmaṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_03_u:32: 3.001.016a mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vanyam āśramaṃ ca mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:35: 3.001.017c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca rājā daṇḍadharo guruḥ
GE09ram_03_u:37: 3.001.018c rājā tasmād vanān bhogān bhuṅkte lokanamaskṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:39: 3.001.019c nagarastho vanastho vā tvaṃ no rājā janeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:42: 3.001.021a evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpair vanyaiś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:47: 3.002.001c āmantrya sa munīn sarvān vanam evānvagāhata
GE09ram_03_u:58: 3.002.007a trīn siṃhāṃś caturo vyāghrān dvau vṛkau pṛṣatān daśa
GE09ram_03_u:59: 3.002.007c saviṣāṇaṃ vasādigdhaṃ gajasya ca śiro mahat
GE09ram_03_u:61: 3.002.008c sa rāmo lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā ca maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:63: 3.002.009c sa kṛtvā bhairavaṃ nādaṃ cālayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_03_u:67: 3.002.011c kathaṃ tāpasayor vāṃ ca vāsaḥ pramadayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:69: 3.002.012c ahaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ virāgho nāma rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:71: 3.002.013c iyaṃ nārī varārohā mama bharyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:72: 3.002.013e yuvayoḥ pāpayoś cāhaṃ pāsyāmi rudhiraṃ mṛdhe
GE09ram_03_u:76: 3.002.015a tāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ sītāṃ virādhāṅkagatāṃ śubhām
GE09ram_03_u:81: 3.002.017a yad abhipretam asmāsu priyaṃ vara vṛtaṃ ca yat
GE09ram_03_u:82: 3.002.017c kaikeyyās tu susaṃvṛttaṃ kṣipram adyaiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:83: 3.002.018a yā na tuṣyati rājyena putrārthe dīrghadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:85: 3.002.018e adyedānīṃ sakāmā sā yā mātā mama madhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:86: 3.002.019a parasparśāt tu vaidehyā na duḥkhataram asti me
GE09ram_03_u:89: 3.002.020c abravīl lakṣmaṇaḥ kruddho ruddho nāga iva śvasan
GE09ram_03_u:90: 3.002.021a anātha iva bhūtānāṃ nāthas tvaṃ vāsavopamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:93: 3.002.022c virādhasya gatāsor hi mahī pāsyati śoṇitam
GE09ram_03_u:94: 3.002.023a rājyakāme mama krodho bharate yo babhūva ha
GE09ram_03_u:95: 3.002.023c taṃ virādhe vimokṣyāmi vajrī vajram ivācale
GE09ram_03_u:100: 3.003.001a athovāca punar vākyaṃ virādhaḥ pūrayan vanam
GE09ram_03_u:101: 3.003.001c ātmānaṃ pṛcchate brūtaṃ kau yuvāṃ kva gamiṣyathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:102: 3.003.002a tam uvāca tato rāmo rākṣasaṃ jvalitānanam
GE09ram_03_u:105: 3.003.003c tvāṃ tu veditum icchāvaḥ kas tvaṃ carasi daṇḍakān
GE09ram_03_u:106: 3.003.004a tam uvāca virādhas tu rāmaṃ satyaparākramam
GE09ram_03_u:107: 3.003.004c hanta vakṣyāmi te rājan nibodha mama rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:108: 3.003.005a putraḥ kila jayasyāhaṃ mātā mama śatahradā
GE09ram_03_u:109: 3.003.005c virādha iti mām āhuḥ pṛthivyāṃ sarvarākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:110: 3.003.006a tapasā cāpi me prāptā brahmaṇo hi prasādajā
GE09ram_03_u:113: 3.003.007c tvaramāṇau pālayethāṃ na vāṃ jīvitam ādade
GE09ram_03_u:116: 3.003.009a kṣudra dhik tvāṃ tu hīnārthaṃ mṛtyum anveṣase dhruvam
GE09ram_03_u:117: 3.003.009c raṇe saṃprāpsyase tiṣṭha na me jīvan gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:118: 3.003.010a tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā rāmaḥ suniśitāñ śarān
GE09ram_03_u:127: 3.003.014c dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ ciccheda rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:128: 3.003.015a tasya raudrasya saumitrir bāhuṃ savyaṃ babhañja ha
GE09ram_03_u:129: 3.003.015c rāmas tu dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ tarasā tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:133: 3.003.017a kausalyā suprajās tāta rāmas tvaṃ vidito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:134: 3.003.017c vaidehī ca mahābhāgā lakṣmaṇaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:135: 3.003.018a abhiśāpād ahaṃ ghorāṃ praviṣṭo rākṣasīṃ tanum
GE09ram_03_u:136: 3.003.018c tumburur nāma gandharvaḥ śapto vaiśvaraṇena hi
GE09ram_03_u:137: 3.003.019a prasādyamānaś ca mayā so 'bravīn māṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:138: 3.003.019c yadā dāśarathī rāmas tvāṃ vadhiṣyati saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:139: 3.003.020a tadā prakṛtim āpanno bhavān svargaṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:140: 3.003.020c iti vaiśravaṇo rājā rambhāsaktam uvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:143: 3.003.021e bhavanaṃ svaṃ gamiṣyāmi svasti vo 'stu paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:146: 3.003.023a taṃ kṣipram abhigaccha tvaṃ sa te śreyo vidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:147: 3.003.023c avaṭe cāpi māṃ rāma nikṣipya kuśalī vraja
GE09ram_03_u:149: 3.003.024c avaṭe ye nidhīyante teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:150: 3.003.025a evam uktvā tu kākutsthaṃ virādhaḥ śarapīḍitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:158: 3.004.001a hatvā tu taṃ bhīmabalaṃ virādhaṃ rākṣasaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:159: 3.004.001c tataḥ sītāṃ pariṣvajya samāśvāsya ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:161: 3.004.002a kaṣṭaṃ vanam idaṃ durgaṃ na ca smo vanagocarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:178: 3.004.011a dṛṣṭvā śatakratuṃ tatra rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:179: 3.004.011c ye hayāḥ puruhūtasya purā śakrasya naḥ śrutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:180: 3.004.011e antarikṣagatā divyās ta ime harayo dhruvam
GE09ram_03_u:181: 3.004.012a ime ca puruṣavyāghra ye tiṣṭhanty abhito ratham
GE09ram_03_u:185: 3.004.014a etad dhi kila devānāṃ vayo bhavati nityadā
GE09ram_03_u:187: 3.004.015a ihaiva saha vaidehyā muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:188: 3.004.015c yāvaj janāmy ahaṃ vyaktaṃ ka eṣa dyutimān rathe
GE09ram_03_u:189: 3.004.016a tam evam uktvā saumitrim ihaiva sthīyatām iti
GE09ram_03_u:193: 3.004.018a ihopayāty asau rāmo yāvan māṃ nābhibhāṣate
GE09ram_03_u:194: 3.004.018c niṣṭhāṃ nayata tāvat tu tato māṃ draṣṭum arhati
GE09ram_03_u:195: 3.004.019a jitavantaṃ kṛtārthaṃ ca draṣṭāham acirād imam
GE09ram_03_u:196: 3.004.019c karma hy anena kartavyaṃ mahad anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_03_u:197: 3.004.020a iti vajrī tam āmantrya mānayitvā ca tāpasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:201: 3.004.022a tasya pādau ca saṃgṛhya rāmaḥ sītā ca lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:203: 3.004.023a tataḥ śakropayānaṃ tu paryapṛcchat sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:204: 3.004.023c śarabhaṅgaś ca tat sarvaṃ rāghavāya nyavedayat
GE09ram_03_u:205: 3.004.024a mām eṣa varado rāma brahmalokaṃ ninīṣati
GE09ram_03_u:208: 3.004.025c brahmalokaṃ na gacchāmi tvām adṛṣṭvā priyātithim
GE09ram_03_u:210: 3.004.026c akṣayā naraśārdūla jitā lokā mayā śubhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:211: 3.004.026e brāhmyāś ca nākapṛṣṭhyāś ca pratigṛhṇīṣva māmakān
GE09ram_03_u:215: 3.004.028c āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
GE09ram_03_u:218: 3.004.030a sutīkṣṇam abhigaccha tvaṃ śucau deśe tapasvinam
GE09ram_03_u:219: 3.004.030c ramaṇīye vanoddeśe sa te vāsaṃ vidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:220: 3.004.031a eṣa panthā naravyāghra muhūrtaṃ paśya tāta mām
GE09ram_03_u:221: 3.004.031c yāvaj jahāmi gātrāṇi jīrṇaṃ tvacam ivoragaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:222: 3.004.032a tato 'gniṃ sa samādhāya hutvā cājyena mantravit
GE09ram_03_u:224: 3.004.033a tasya romāṇi keśāṃś ca dadāhāgnir mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:225: 3.004.033c jīrṇaṃ tvacaṃ tathāsthīni yac ca māṃsaṃ ca śoṇitam
GE09ram_03_u:228: 3.004.035a sa lokān āhitāgnīnām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:237: 3.005.002c aśmakuṭṭāś ca bahavaḥ patrāhārāś ca tāpasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:245: 3.005.006a abhigamya ca dharmajñā rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:248: 3.005.007c pradhānaś cāsi nāthaś ca devānāṃ maghavān iva
GE09ram_03_u:249: 3.005.008a viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
GE09ram_03_u:250: 3.005.008c pitṛvratatvaṃ satyaṃ ca tvayi dharmaś ca puṣkalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:252: 3.005.009c arthitvān nātha vakṣyāmas tac ca naḥ kṣantum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:253: 3.005.010a adhārmas tu mahāṃs tāta bhavet tasya mahīpateḥ
GE09ram_03_u:254: 3.005.010c yo hared baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ na ca rakṣati putravat
GE09ram_03_u:255: 3.005.011a yuñjānaḥ svān iva prāṇān prāṇair iṣṭān sutān iva
GE09ram_03_u:257: 3.005.012a prāpnoti śāśvatīṃ rāma kīrtiṃ sa bahuvārṣikīm
GE09ram_03_u:258: 3.005.012c brahmaṇaḥ sthānam āsādya tatra cāpi mahīyate
GE09ram_03_u:259: 3.005.013a yat karoti paraṃ dharmaṃ munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:260: 3.005.013c tatra rājñaś caturbhāgaḥ prajā dharmeṇa rakṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:262: 3.005.014c tvan nātho 'nāthavad rāma rākṣasair vadhyate bhṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:264: 3.005.015c hatānāṃ rākṣasair ghorair bahūnāṃ bahudhā vane
GE09ram_03_u:267: 3.005.017a evaṃ vayaṃ na mṛṣyāmo viprakāraṃ tapasvinam
GE09ram_03_u:269: 3.005.018a tatas tvāṃ śaraṇārthaṃ ca śaraṇyaṃ samupasthitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:271: 3.005.019a etac chrutvā tu kākutsthas tāpasānāṃ tapasvinām
GE09ram_03_u:272: 3.005.019c idaṃ provāca dharmātmā sarvān eva tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:273: 3.005.019e naivam arhatha māṃ vaktum ājñāpyo 'haṃ tapasvinam
GE09ram_03_u:275: 3.005.020c tasya me 'yaṃ vane vāso bhaviṣyati mahāphalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:276: 3.005.020e tapasvināṃ raṇe śatrūn hantum icchāmi rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:281: 3.006.001a rāmas tu sahito bhrātrā sītayā ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:283: 3.006.002a sa gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ nadīs tīrtva bahūdakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:285: 3.006.003a tatas tad ikṣvākuvarau satataṃ vividhair drumaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:286: 3.006.003c kānanaṃ tau viviśatuḥ sītayā saha rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:291: 3.006.006a rāmo 'ham asmi bhagavan bhavantaṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:293: 3.006.007a sa nirīkṣya tato vīraṃ rāmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:294: 3.006.007c samāśliṣya ca bāhubhyām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:295: 3.006.008a svāgataṃ khalu te vīra rāma dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:298: 3.006.009c devalokam ito vīra dehaṃ tyaktvā mahītale
GE09ram_03_u:301: 3.006.010e sarvāṃl lokāñ jitān āha mama puṇyena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:307: 3.006.013c āvāsaṃ tv aham icchāmi pradiṣṭam iha kānane
GE09ram_03_u:310: 3.006.015a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa maharṣir lokaviśrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:312: 3.006.016a ayam evāśramo rāma guṇavān ramyatām iha
GE09ram_03_u:316: 3.006.018a tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya maharṣer lakṣmaṇāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:317: 3.006.018c uvāca vacanaṃ dhīro vikṛṣya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:320: 3.006.020a bhavāṃs tatrābhiṣajyeta kiṃ syāt kṛcchrataraṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:321: 3.006.020c etasminn āśrame vāsaṃ ciraṃ tu na samarthaye
GE09ram_03_u:322: 3.006.021a tam evam uktvā varadaṃ rāmaḥ saṃdhyām upāgamat
GE09ram_03_u:323: 3.006.021c anvāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ tatra vāsam akalpayat
GE09ram_03_u:330: 3.007.002a utthāya tu yathākālaṃ rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:332: 3.007.003a atha te 'gniṃ surāṃś caiva vaidehī rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:336: 3.007.005a sukhoṣitāḥ sma bhagavaṃs tvayā pūjyena pūjitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:344: 3.007.009a tāvad icchāmahe gantum ity uktvā caraṇau muneḥ
GE09ram_03_u:347: 3.007.010c gāḍham āliṅgya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:348: 3.007.011a ariṣṭaṃ gaccha panthānaṃ rāma saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:358: 3.007.016a gamyatāṃ vatsa saumitre bhavān api ca gacchatu
GE09ram_03_u:359: 3.007.016c āgantavyaṃ ca te dṛṣṭvā punar evāśramaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:360: 3.007.017a evam uktas tathety uktvā kākutsthaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:363: 3.007.018c dadau sītā tayor bhrātroḥ khaḍgau ca vimalau tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:364: 3.007.019a ābadhya ca śubhe tūṇī cāpe cādāya sasvane
GE09ram_03_u:365: 3.007.019c niṣkrāntāv āśramād gantum ubhau tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:367: 3.008.001c vaidehī snigdhayā vācā bhartāram idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:368: 3.008.002a ayaṃ dharmaḥ susūkṣmeṇa vidhinā prāpyate mahān
GE09ram_03_u:369: 3.008.002c nivṛttena ca śakyo 'yaṃ vyasanāt kāmajād iha
GE09ram_03_u:370: 3.008.003a trīṇy eva vyasanāny atra kāmajāni bhavanty uta
GE09ram_03_u:371: 3.008.003c mithyā vākyaṃ paramakaṃ tasmād gurutarāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:373: 3.008.004a mithyāvākyaṃ na te bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:375: 3.008.005a tac ca sarvaṃ mahābāho śakyaṃ voḍhuṃ jitendriyaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:378: 3.008.006c nirvairaṃ kriyate mohāt tac ca te samupasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:381: 3.008.008a etannimittaṃ ca vanaṃ daṇḍakā iti viśrutam
GE09ram_03_u:383: 3.008.009a tatas tvāṃ prasthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mama cintākulaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:384: 3.008.009c tvad vṛttaṃ cintayantyā vai bhaven niḥśreyasaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:385: 3.008.010a na hi me rocate vīra gamanaṃ daṇḍakān prati
GE09ram_03_u:386: 3.008.010c kāraṇaṃ tatra vakṣyāmi vadantyāḥ śrūyatāṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:387: 3.008.011a tvaṃ hi bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir bhrātrā saha vanaṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:388: 3.008.011c dṛṣṭvā vanacarān sarvān kaccit kuryāḥ śaravyayam
GE09ram_03_u:391: 3.008.013a purā kila mahābāho tapasvī satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:392: 3.008.013c kasmiṃś cid abhavat puṇye vane ratamṛgadvije
GE09ram_03_u:393: 3.008.014a tasyaiva tapaso vighnaṃ kartum indraḥ śacīpatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:395: 3.008.015a tasmiṃs tad āśramapade nihitaḥ khaḍga uttamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:396: 3.008.015c sa nyāsavidhinā dattaḥ puṇye tapasi tiṣṭhataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:398: 3.008.016c vane tu vicaraty eva rakṣan pratyayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:399: 3.008.017a yatra gacchaty upādātuṃ mūlāni ca phalāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:400: 3.008.017c na vinā yāti taṃ khaḍgaṃ nyāsarakṣaṇatatparaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:401: 3.008.018a nityaṃ śastraṃ parivahan krameṇa sa tapodhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:402: 3.008.018c cakāra raudrīṃ svāṃ buddhiṃ tyaktvā tapasi niścayam
GE09ram_03_u:404: 3.008.019c tasya śastrasya saṃvāsāj jagāma narakaṃ muniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:405: 3.008.020a snehāc ca bahumānāc ca smāraye tvāṃ na śikṣaye
GE09ram_03_u:406: 3.008.020c na kathaṃ cana sā kāryā hṛhītadhanuṣā tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:407: 3.008.021a buddhir vairaṃ vinā hantuṃ rākṣasān daṇḍakāśritān
GE09ram_03_u:408: 3.008.021c aparādhaṃ vinā hantuṃ lokān vīra na kāmaye
GE09ram_03_u:411: 3.008.023a kva ca śastraṃ kva ca vanaṃ kva ca kṣātraṃ tapaḥ kva ca
GE09ram_03_u:412: 3.008.023c vyāviddham idam asmābhir deśadharmas tu pūjyatām
GE09ram_03_u:414: 3.008.024c punar gatvā tv ayodhyāyāṃ kṣatradharmaṃ cariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:415: 3.008.025a akṣayā tu bhavet prītiḥ śvaśrū śvaśurayor mama
GE09ram_03_u:416: 3.008.025c yadi rājyaṃ hi saṃnyasya bhaves tvaṃ nirato muniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:417: 3.008.026a dharmād arthaḥ prabhavati dharmāt prabhavate sukham
GE09ram_03_u:418: 3.008.026c dharmeṇa labhate sarvaṃ dharmasāram idaṃ jagat
GE09ram_03_u:419: 3.008.027a ātmānaṃ niyamais tais taiḥ karṣayitvā prayatnataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:420: 3.008.027c prāpyate nipuṇair dharmo na sukhāl labhyate sukham
GE09ram_03_u:421: 3.008.028a nityaṃ śucimatiḥ saumya cara dharmaṃ tapovane
GE09ram_03_u:422: 3.008.028c sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tubhyaṃ trailokyam api tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:424: dharmaṃ ca vaktuṃ tava kaḥ samarthaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:427: 3.009.001a vākyam etat tu vaidehyā vyāhṛtaṃ bhartṛbhaktayā
GE09ram_03_u:428: 3.009.001c śrutvā dharme sthito rāmaḥ pratyuvācātha maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:429: 3.009.002a hitam uktaṃ tvayā devi snigdhayā sadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:431: 3.009.003a kiṃ tu vakṣyāmy ahaṃ devi tvayaivoktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:432: 3.009.003c kṣatriyair dhāryate cāpo nārtaśabdo bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:434: 3.009.004c māṃ sīte svayam āgamya śaraṇyāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:436: 3.009.005c na labhante sukhaṃ bhītā rākṣasaiḥ krūrakarmabhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:437: 3.009.006a kāle kāle ca niratā niyamair vividhair vane
GE09ram_03_u:441: 3.009.008a mayā tu vacanaṃ śrutvā teṣām evaṃ mukhāc cyutam
GE09ram_03_u:443: 3.009.009a prasīdantu bhavanto me hrīr eṣā hi mamātulā
GE09ram_03_u:445: 3.009.009e kiṃ karomīti ca mayā vyāhṛtaṃ dvijasaṃnidhau
GE09ram_03_u:446: 3.009.010a sarvair eva samāgamya vāg iyaṃ samudāhṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:448: 3.009.010e arditāḥ sma bhṛśaṃ rāma bhavān nas trātum arhati
GE09ram_03_u:452: 3.009.012c gatiṃ mṛgayamāṇānāṃ bhavān naḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:453: 3.009.013a kāmaṃ tapaḥ prabhāvena śaktā hantuṃ niśācarān
GE09ram_03_u:454: 3.009.013c cirārjitaṃ tu necchāmas tapaḥ khaṇḍayituṃ vayam
GE09ram_03_u:456: 3.009.014c tena śāpaṃ na muñcāmo bhakṣyamāṇāś ca rākṣasaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:458: 3.009.015c rakṣanas tvaṃ saha bhrātrā tvannāthā hi vayaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:459: 3.009.016a mayā caitad vacaḥ śrutvā kārtsnyena paripālanam
GE09ram_03_u:461: 3.009.017a saṃśrutya ca na śakṣyāmi jīvamānaḥ pratiśravam
GE09ram_03_u:462: 3.009.017c munīnām anyathā kartuṃ satyam iṣṭaṃ hi me sadā
GE09ram_03_u:463: 3.009.018a apy ahaṃ jīvitaṃ jahyāṃ tvāṃ vā sīte salakṣmaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:464: 3.009.018c na tu pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya brāhmaṇebhyo viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:465: 3.009.019a tad avaśyaṃ mayā kāryam ṛṣīṇāṃ paripālanam
GE09ram_03_u:466: 3.009.019c anuktenāpi vaidehi pratijñāya tu kiṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:467: 3.009.020a mama snehāc ca sauhārdād idam uktaṃ tvayā vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:468: 3.009.020c parituṣṭo 'smy ahaṃ sīte na hy aniṣṭo 'nuśiṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:469: 3.009.020e sadṛśaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kulasya tava śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:474: 3.010.001a agrataḥ prayayau rāmaḥ sītā madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:476: 3.010.002a tau paśyamānau vividhāñ śailaprasthān vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:477: 3.010.002c nadīś ca vividhā ramyā jagmatuḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:479: 3.010.003c sarāṃsi ca sapadmāni yutāni jalajaiḥ khagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:481: 3.010.004c mahiṣāṃś ca varāhāṃś ca gajāṃś ca drumavairiṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:482: 3.010.005a te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ lambamāne divākare
GE09ram_03_u:487: 3.010.007c gītavāditranirghoṣo na tu kaś cana dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:488: 3.010.008a tataḥ kautūhalād rāmo lakṣmaṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:490: 3.010.009a idam atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā sarveṣāṃ no mahāmune
GE09ram_03_u:491: 3.010.009c kautūhalaṃ mahaj jātaṃ kim idaṃ sādhu kathyatām
GE09ram_03_u:492: 3.010.010a tenaivam ukto dharmātmā rāghaveṇa munis tadā
GE09ram_03_u:496: 3.010.012a sa hi tepe tapas tīvraṃ māṇḍakarṇir mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:500: 3.010.013e asmakaṃ kasya cit sthānam eṣa prārthayate muniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:501: 3.010.014a tataḥ kartuṃ tapovighnaṃ sarvair devair niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:506: 3.010.016c taṭāke nirmitaṃ tāsām asminn antarhitaṃ gṛham
GE09ram_03_u:515: 3.010.021a praviśya saha vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:516: 3.010.021c tadā tasmin sa kākutsthaḥ śrīmaty āśramamaṇḍale
GE09ram_03_u:519: 3.010.023a yeṣām uṣitavān pūrvaṃ sakāśe sa mahāstravit
GE09ram_03_u:520: 3.010.023c kva cit paridaśān māsān ekaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:521: 3.010.024a kva cic ca caturo māsān pañcaṣaṭ cāparān kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:522: 3.010.024c aparatrādhikān māsān adhyardham adhikaṃ kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:523: 3.010.025a trīn māsān aṣṭamāsāṃś ca rāghavo nyavasat sukham
GE09ram_03_u:524: 3.010.025c tathā saṃvasatas tasya munīnām āśrameṣu vai
GE09ram_03_u:526: 3.010.026a parisṛtya ca dharmajño rāghavaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:528: 3.010.027a sa tam āśramam āgamya munibhiḥ pratipūjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:529: 3.010.027c tatrāpi nyavasad rāmaḥ kaṃ cit kālam ariṃdamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:530: 3.010.028a athāśramastho vinayāt kadā cit taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:531: 3.010.028c upāsīnaḥ sa kākutsthaḥ sutīkṣṇam idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:533: 3.010.029c vasatīti mayā nityaṃ kathāḥ kathayatāṃ śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:534: 3.010.030a na tu jānāmi taṃ deśaṃ vanasyāsya mahattayā
GE09ram_03_u:536: 3.010.031a prasādāt tatra bhavataḥ sānujaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:539: 3.010.032c yad ahaṃ taṃ munivaraṃ śuśrūṣeyam api svayam
GE09ram_03_u:540: 3.010.033a iti rāmasya sa muniḥ śrutvā dharmātmano vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:542: 3.010.034a aham apy etad eva tvāṃ vaktukāmaḥ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:544: 3.010.035a diṣṭyā tv idānīm arthe 'smin svayam eva bravīṣi mām
GE09ram_03_u:545: 3.010.035c aham ākhyāsi te vatsa yatrāgastyo mahāmuniḥ
GE09ram_03_u:546: 3.010.036a yojanāny āśramāt tāta yāhi catvāri vai tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:552: 3.010.039a tatraikāṃ rajanīm uṣya prabhāte rāma gamyatām
GE09ram_03_u:556: 3.010.040e raṃsyate tatra vaidehī lakṣmaṇaś ca tvayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:558: 3.010.041c yadi buddhiḥ kṛtā draṣṭum agastyaṃ taṃ mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:560: 3.010.042a iti rāmo muneḥ śrutvā saha bhrātrābhivādya ca
GE09ram_03_u:568: 3.010.046a yathā hīme vanasyāsya jñātāḥ pathi sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:570: 3.010.047a pippalīnāṃ ca pakvānāṃ vanād asmād upāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:572: 3.010.048a tatra tatra ca dṛśyante saṃkṣiptāḥ kāṣṭhasaṃcayāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:573: 3.010.048c lūnāś ca pathi dṛśyante darbhā vaidūryavarcasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:578: 3.010.051a tat sutīkṣṇasya vacanaṃ yathā saumya mayā śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:581: 3.010.052c yasya bhrātrā kṛteyaṃ dik śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:582: 3.010.053a ihaikadā kila krūro vātāpir api celvalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:584: 3.010.054a dhārayan brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam ilvalaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ vadan
GE09ram_03_u:585: 3.010.054c āmantrayati viprān sa śrāddham uddiśya nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:586: 3.010.055a bhrātaraṃ saṃskṛtaṃ bhrātā tatas taṃ meṣarūpiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:587: 3.010.055c tān dvijān bhojayām āsa śrāddhadṛṣṭena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:590: 3.010.057a tato bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā vātāpir meṣavan nadan
GE09ram_03_u:595: 3.010.059c anubhūya kila śrāddhe bhakṣitaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:596: 3.010.060a tataḥ saṃpannam ity uktvā dattvā hastāvasecanam
GE09ram_03_u:598: 3.010.061a taṃ tathā bhāṣamāṇaṃ tu bhrātaraṃ vipraghātinam
GE09ram_03_u:600: 3.010.062a kuto niṣkramituṃ śaktir mayā jīrṇasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:601: 3.010.062c bhrātus te meṣa rūpasya gatasya yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:602: 3.010.063a atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhrātur nidhanasaṃśritam
GE09ram_03_u:610: 3.010.067a upāsya paścimāṃ saṃdhyāṃ saha bhrātrā yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:612: 3.010.068a samyak pratigṛhītas tu muninā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:613: 3.010.068c nyavasat tāṃ niśām ekāṃ prāśya mūlaphalāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:616: 3.010.070a abhivādaye tvā bhagavan sukham adhyuṣito niśām
GE09ram_03_u:617: 3.010.070c āmantraye tvāṃ gacchāmi guruṃ te draṣṭum agrajam
GE09ram_03_u:620: 3.010.072a nīvārān panasāṃs tālāṃs timiśān vañjulān dhavān
GE09ram_03_u:621: 3.010.072c ciribilvān madhūkāṃś ca bilvān api ca tindukān
GE09ram_03_u:628: 3.010.076a snigdhapatrā yathā vṛkṣā yathā kṣāntā mṛgadvijāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:630: 3.010.077a agastya iti vikhyāto loke svenaiva karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:635: 3.010.079c dakṣiṇā dik kṛtā yena śaraṇyā puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:637: 3.010.080c dig iyaṃ dakṣiṇā trāsād dṛśyate nopabhujyate
GE09ram_03_u:638: 3.010.081a yadā prabhṛti cākrāntā dig iyaṃ puṇyakarmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:640: 3.010.082a nāmnā ceyaṃ bhagavato dakṣiṇā dik pradakṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:643: 3.010.083c saṃdeśaṃ pālayaṃs tasya vindhyaśaulo na vardhate
GE09ram_03_u:646: 3.010.085a eṣa lokārcitaḥ sādhur hite nityaṃ rataḥ satām
GE09ram_03_u:649: 3.010.086c śeṣaṃ ca vanavāsasya saumya vatsyāmy ahaṃ prabho
GE09ram_03_u:650: 3.010.087a atra devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:652: 3.010.088a nātra jīven mṛṣāvādī krūro vā yadi vā śaṭhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:653: 3.010.088c nṛśaṃsaḥ kāma vṛtto vā munir eṣa tathāvidhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:654: 3.010.089a atra devāś ca yakṣāś ca nāgāś ca patagaiḥ saha
GE09ram_03_u:657: 3.010.090c tyaktvā dehān navair dehaiḥ svaryātāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:658: 3.010.091a yakṣatvam amaratvaṃ ca rājyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:659: 3.010.091c atra devāḥ prayacchanti bhūtair ārādhitāḥ śubhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:661: 3.010.092c nivedayeha māṃ prāptam ṛṣaye saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:663: 3.011.001c agastyaśiṣyam āsādya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:664: 3.011.002a rājā daśaratho nāma jyeṣṭhas tasya suto balī
GE09ram_03_u:665: 3.011.002c rāmaḥ prāpto muniṃ draṣṭuṃ bhāryayā saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:666: 3.011.003a lakṣmaṇo nāma tasyāhaṃ bhrātā tv avarajo hitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:667: 3.011.003c anukūlaś ca bhaktaś ca yadi te śrotram āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:668: 3.011.004a te vayaṃ vanam atyugraṃ praviṣṭāḥ pitṛśāsanāt
GE09ram_03_u:672: 3.011.006a sa praviśya muni śreṣṭhaṃ tapasā duṣpradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:674: 3.011.007a putrau daśarathasyemau rāmo lakṣmaṇa eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:678: 3.011.009a tataḥ śiṣyād upaśrutya prāptaṃ rāmaṃ salakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:679: 3.011.009c vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgām idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:680: 3.011.010a diṣṭyā rāmaś cirasyādya draṣṭuṃ māṃ samupāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:681: 3.011.010c manasā kāṅkṣitaṃ hy asya mayāpy āgamanaṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:683: 3.011.011c praveśyatāṃ samīpaṃ me kiṃ cāsau na praveśitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:684: 3.011.012a evam uktas tu muninā dharmajñena mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:686: 3.011.013a tato niṣkramya saṃbhrāntaḥ śiṣyo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:687: 3.011.013c kvāsau rāmo muniṃ draṣṭum etu praviśatu svayam
GE09ram_03_u:689: 3.011.014c darśayām āsa kākutsthaṃ sītāṃ ca janakātmajām
GE09ram_03_u:690: 3.011.015a taṃ śiṣyaḥ praśritaṃ vākyam agastyavacanaṃ bruvan
GE09ram_03_u:694: 3.011.017a sa tatra brahmaṇaḥ sthānam agneḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:695: 3.011.017c viṣṇoḥ sthānaṃ mahendrasya sthānaṃ caiva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:696: 3.011.018a somasthānaṃ bhagasthānaṃ sthānaṃ kauberam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:697: 3.011.018c dhātur vidhātuḥ sthānaṃ ca vāyoḥ sthānaṃ tathaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:698: 3.011.019a tataḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto munir apy abhiniṣpatat
GE09ram_03_u:701: 3.011.020a eṣa lakṣmaṇa niṣkrāmaty agastyo bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:705: 3.011.022a abhivādya tu dharmātmā tasthau rāmaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:706: 3.011.022c sītayā saha vaidehyā tadā rāma salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:708: 3.011.023c kuśalapraśnam uktvā ca āsyatām iti so 'bravīt
GE09ram_03_u:709: 3.011.024a agniṃ hutvā pradāyārghyam atithiṃ pratipūjya ca
GE09ram_03_u:710: 3.011.024c vānaprasthena dharmeṇa sa teṣāṃ bhojanaṃ dadau
GE09ram_03_u:714: 3.011.026c duḥsākṣīva pare loke svāni māṃsāni bhakṣayet
GE09ram_03_u:716: 3.011.027c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca bhavān prāptaḥ priyātithiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:717: 3.011.028a evam uktvā phalair mūlaiḥ puṣpaiś cānyaiś ca rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:723: 3.011.031a saṃpūrṇau niśitair bāṇair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:725: 3.011.032a anena dhanuṣā rāma hatvā saṃkhye mahāsurān
GE09ram_03_u:726: 3.011.032c ājahāra śriyaṃ dīptāṃ purā viṣṇur divaukasām
GE09ram_03_u:727: 3.011.033a tad dhanus tau ca tūṇīrau śaraṃ khaḍgaṃ ca mānada
GE09ram_03_u:729: 3.011.034a evam uktvā mahātejāḥ samastaṃ tad varāyudham
GE09ram_03_u:730: 3.011.034c dattvā rāmāya bhagavān agastyaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:731: 3.012.001a rāma prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te parituṣṭo 'smi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:732: 3.012.001c abhivādayituṃ yan māṃ prāptau sthaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:735: 3.012.003a eṣā hi sukumārī ca duḥkhaiś ca na vimānitā
GE09ram_03_u:737: 3.012.004a yathaiṣā ramate rāma iha sītā tathā kuru
GE09ram_03_u:738: 3.012.004c duṣkaraṃ kṛtavaty eṣā vane tvām anugacchatī
GE09ram_03_u:739: 3.012.005a eṣā hi prakṛtiḥ strīṇām āsṛṣṭe raghunandana
GE09ram_03_u:743: 3.012.007a iyaṃ tu bhavato bhāryā doṣair etair vivarjitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:744: 3.012.007c ślāghyā ca vyapadeśyā ca yathā devī hy arundhatī
GE09ram_03_u:745: 3.012.008a alaṃkṛto 'yaṃ deśaś ca yatra saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:746: 3.012.008c vaidehyā cānayā rāma vatsyasi tvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:747: 3.012.009a evam uktas tu muninā rāghavaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:748: 3.012.009c uvāca praśritaṃ vākyam ṛṣiṃ dīptam ivānalam
GE09ram_03_u:751: 3.012.011a kiṃ tu vyādiśa me deśaṃ sodakaṃ bahukānanam
GE09ram_03_u:753: 3.012.012a tato 'bravīn muni śreṣṭhaḥ śrutvā rāmasya bhāṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:754: 3.012.012c dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ dharmātmā dhīro dhīrataraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:758: 3.012.014c ramasva tvaṃ pitur vākyaṃ yathoktam anupālayan
GE09ram_03_u:759: 3.012.015a vidito hy eṣa vṛttānto mama sarvas tavānagha
GE09ram_03_u:760: 3.012.015c tapasaś ca prabhāvena snehād daśarathasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:761: 3.012.016a hṛdayasthaś ca te chando vijñātas tapasā mayā
GE09ram_03_u:762: 3.012.016c iha vāsaṃ pratijñāya mayā saha tapovane
GE09ram_03_u:763: 3.012.017a ataś ca tvām ahaṃ brūmi gaccha pañcavaṭīm iti
GE09ram_03_u:764: 3.012.017c sa hi ramyo vanoddeśo maithilī tatra raṃsyate
GE09ram_03_u:765: 3.012.018a sa deśaḥ ślāghanīyaś ca nātidūre ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:766: 3.012.018c godāvaryāḥ samīpe ca maithilī tatra raṃsyate
GE09ram_03_u:768: 3.012.019c viviktaś ca mahābāho puṇyo ramyas tathaiva ca
GE09ram_03_u:769: 3.012.020a bhavān api sadāraś ca śaktaś ca parirakṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:770: 3.012.020c api cātra vasan rāmas tāpasān pālayiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:771: 3.012.021a etad ālakṣyate vīra madhukānāṃ mahad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:775: 3.012.023a agastyenaivam uktas tu rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:785: 3.013.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā tau mahābhāgau vanasthaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:786: 3.013.002c menāte rākṣasaṃ pakṣiṃ bruvāṇau ko bhavān iti
GE09ram_03_u:787: 3.013.003a sa tau madhurayā vācā saumyayā prīṇayann iva
GE09ram_03_u:788: 3.013.003c uvāca vatsa māṃ viddhi vayasyaṃ pitur ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:789: 3.013.004a sa taṃ pitṛsakhaṃ buddhvā pūjayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:790: 3.013.004c sa tasya kulam avyagram atha papraccha nāma ca
GE09ram_03_u:791: 3.013.005a rāmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā kulam ātmānam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:794: 3.013.006c tān me nigadataḥ sarvān āditaḥ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:796: 3.013.007c śeṣaś ca saṃśrayaś caiva bahuputraś ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:797: 3.013.008a sthāṇur marīcir atriś ca kratuś caiva mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:798: 3.013.008c pulastyaś cāṅgirāś caiva pracetāḥ pulahas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:800: 3.013.009c kaśyapaś ca mahātejās teṣām āsīc ca paścimaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:801: 3.013.010a prajāpates tu dakṣasya babhūvur iti naḥ śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:804: 3.013.011c aditiṃ ca ditiṃ caiva danūm api ca kālakām
GE09ram_03_u:805: 3.013.012a tāmrāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva manuṃ cāpy analām api
GE09ram_03_u:806: 3.013.012c tās tu kanyās tataḥ prītaḥ kaśyapaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:807: 3.013.013a putrāṃs trailokyabhartṝn vai janayiṣyatha mat samān
GE09ram_03_u:808: 3.013.013c aditis tan manā rāma ditiś ca danur eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:809: 3.013.014a kālakā ca mahābāho śeṣās tv amanaso 'bhavan
GE09ram_03_u:811: 3.013.015a ādityā vasavo rudrā aśvinau ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:812: 3.013.015c ditis tv ajanayat putrān daityāṃs tāta yaśasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:814: 3.013.016c danus tv ajanayat putram aśvagrīvam ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:816: 3.013.017c krauñcīṃ bhāsīṃ tathā śyenīṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrīṃ tathā śukīm
GE09ram_03_u:818: 3.013.018c ulūkāñ janayat krauñcī bhāsī bhāsān vyajāyata
GE09ram_03_u:819: 3.013.019a śyenī śyenāṃś ca gṛdhrāṃś ca vyajāyata sutejasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:820: 3.013.019c dhṛtarāṣṭrī tu haṃsāṃś ca kalahaṃsāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:821: 3.013.020a cakravākāṃś ca bhadraṃ te vijajñe sāpi bhāminī
GE09ram_03_u:822: 3.013.020c śukī natāṃ vijajñe tu natāyā vinatā sutā
GE09ram_03_u:824: 3.013.021c mṛgīṃ ca mṛgamandāṃ ca harīṃ bhadramadām api
GE09ram_03_u:825: 3.013.022a mātaṅgīm atha śārdūlīṃ śvetāṃ ca surabhīṃ tathā
GE09ram_03_u:827: 3.013.023a apatyaṃ tu mṛgāḥ sarve mṛgyā naravarottama
GE09ram_03_u:828: 3.013.023c ṛṣkāś ca mṛgamandāyāḥ sṛmarāś camarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:829: 3.013.024a tatas tv irāvatīṃ nāma jajñe bhadramadā sutām
GE09ram_03_u:830: 3.013.024c tasyās tv airāvataḥ putro lokanātho mahāgajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:831: 3.013.025a haryāś ca harayo 'patyaṃ vānarāś ca tapasvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:832: 3.013.025c golāṅgūlāṃś ca śārdūlī vyāghrāṃś cājanayat sutān
GE09ram_03_u:833: 3.013.026a mātaṅgyās tv atha mātaṅgā apatyaṃ manujarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:834: 3.013.026c diśāgajaṃ tu śvetākṣaṃ śvetā vyajanayat sutam
GE09ram_03_u:835: 3.013.027a tato duhitarau rāma surabhir devy ajāyata
GE09ram_03_u:836: 3.013.027c rohiṇīṃ nāma bhadraṃ te gandharvīṃ ca yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:837: 3.013.028a rohiṇy ajanayad gā vai gandharvī vājinaḥ sutān
GE09ram_03_u:838: 3.013.028c surasājanayan nāgān rāma kadrūś ca pannagān
GE09ram_03_u:840: 3.013.029c brāhmaṇān kṣatriyān vaiśyāñ śūdrāṃś ca manujarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:841: 3.013.030a mukhato brāhmaṇā jātā urasaḥ kṣatriyās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:842: 3.013.030c ūrubhyāṃ jajñire vaiśyāḥ padbhyāṃ śūdrā iti śrutiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:844: 3.013.031c vinatā ca śukī pautrī kadrūś ca surasā svasā
GE09ram_03_u:846: 3.013.032c dvau putrau vinatāyās tu garuḍo 'ruṇa eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:847: 3.013.033a tasmāj jāto 'ham aruṇāt saṃpātiś ca mamāgrajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:848: 3.013.033c jaṭāyur iti māṃ viddhi śyenīputram ariṃdama
GE09ram_03_u:850: 3.013.034c sītāṃ ca tāta rakṣiṣye tvayi yāte salakṣmaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:861: 3.014.002a āgatāḥ sma yathoddiṣṭam amuṃ deśaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:863: 3.014.003a sarvataś cāryatāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ kānane nipuṇo hy asi
GE09ram_03_u:864: 3.014.003c āśramaḥ katarasmin no deśe bhavati saṃmataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:865: 3.014.004a ramate yatra vaidehī tvam ahaṃ caiva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:869: 3.014.006a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakmaṇaḥ saṃyatāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:870: 3.014.006c sītā samakṣaṃ kākutstham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:871: 3.014.007a paravān asmi kākutstha tvayi varṣaśataṃ sthite
GE09ram_03_u:872: 3.014.007c svayaṃ tu rucire deśe kriyatām iti māṃ vada
GE09ram_03_u:875: 3.014.009a sa taṃ ruciram ākramya deśam āśramakarmaṇi
GE09ram_03_u:876: 3.014.009c haste gṛhītvā hastena rāmaḥ saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:877: 3.014.010a ayaṃ deśaḥ samaḥ śrīmān puṣpitair tarubhir vṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:882: 3.014.012c iyaṃ godāvarī ramyā puṣpitais tarubhir vṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:886: 3.014.014c dṛśyante girayaḥ saumya phullais tarubhir āvṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:887: 3.014.015a sauvarṇe rājatais tāmrair deśe deśe ca dhātubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:889: 3.014.016a sālais tālais tamālaiś ca kharjūraiḥ panasāmrakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:891: 3.014.017a cūtair aśokais tilakaiś campakaiḥ ketakair api
GE09ram_03_u:893: 3.014.018a candanaiḥ syandanair nīpaiḥ panasair lakucair api
GE09ram_03_u:895: 3.014.019a idaṃ puṇyam idaṃ medhyam idaṃ bahumṛgadvijam
GE09ram_03_u:896: 3.014.019c iha vatsyāma saumitre sārdham etena pakṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:897: 3.014.020a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE09ram_03_u:901: 3.014.022a sa gatvā lakṣmaṇaḥ śrīmān nadīṃ godāvarīṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:902: 3.014.022c snātvā padmāni cādāya saphalaḥ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:903: 3.014.023a tataḥ puṣpabaliṃ kṛtvā śāntiṃ ca sa yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:904: 3.014.023c darśayām āsa rāmāya tad āśramapadaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:905: 3.014.024a sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛtaṃ saumyam āśramaṃ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:908: 3.014.025c atisnigdhaṃ ca gāḍhaṃ ca vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:909: 3.014.026a prīto 'smi te mahat karma tvayā kṛtam idaṃ prabho
GE09ram_03_u:910: 3.014.026c pradeyo yannimittaṃ te pariṣvaṅgo mayā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:912: 3.014.027c tvayā putreṇa dharmātmā na saṃvṛttaḥ pitā mama
GE09ram_03_u:913: 3.014.028a evaṃ lakṣmaṇam uktvā tu rāghavo lakṣmivardhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:914: 3.014.028c tasmin deśe bahuphale nyavasat sa sukhaṃ vaśī
GE09ram_03_u:915: 3.014.029a kaṃ cit kālaṃ sa dharmātmā sītayā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_03_u:917: 3.015.001a vasatas tasya tu mukhaṃ rāghavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:919: 3.015.002a sa kadā cit prabhātāyāṃ śarvaryāṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:921: 3.015.003a prahvaḥ kalaśahastas taṃ sītayā saha vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:923: 3.015.004a ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ priyo yas te priyaṃvada
GE09ram_03_u:944: 3.015.014c sīteva cātapa śyāmā lakṣyate na tu śobhate
GE09ram_03_u:952: 3.015.018c dūram abhyuditaḥ sūryaḥ śaśāṅka iva lakṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:954: 3.015.019c saṃraktaḥ kiṃ cid āpāṇḍur ātapaḥ śobhate kṣitau
GE09ram_03_u:962: 3.015.023c śaityād agāgrastham api prāyeṇa rasavaj jalam
GE09ram_03_u:966: 3.015.025c tapaś carati dharmātmā tvadbhaktyā bharataḥ pure
GE09ram_03_u:967: 3.015.026a tyaktvā rājyaṃ ca mānaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca vividhān bahūn
GE09ram_03_u:969: 3.015.027a so 'pi velām imāṃ nūnam abhiṣekārtham udyataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:970: 3.015.027c vṛtaḥ prakṛtibhir nityaṃ prayāti sarayūṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:974: 3.015.029c dharmajñaḥ satyavādī ca hrī niṣedho jitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:977: 3.015.031a jitaḥ svargas tava bhrātrā bharatena mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:978: 3.015.031c vanastham api tāpasye yas tvām anuvidhīyate
GE09ram_03_u:979: 3.015.032a na pitryam anuvarntante mātṛkaṃ dvipadā iti
GE09ram_03_u:981: 3.015.033a bhartā daśaratho yasyāḥ sādhuś ca bharataḥ sutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:982: 3.015.033c kathaṃ nu sāmbā kaikeyī tādṛśī krūradarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:983: 3.015.034a ity evaṃ lakṣmaṇe vākyaṃ snehād bruvati dharmike
GE09ram_03_u:985: 3.015.035a na te 'mbā madhyamā tāta garhitavyā kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:987: 3.015.036a niścitāpi hi me buddhir vanavāse dṛḍhavratā
GE09ram_03_u:989: 3.015.037a ity evaṃ vilapaṃs tatra prāpya godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:991: 3.015.038a tarpayitvātha salilais te pitṝn daivatāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:992: 3.015.038c stuvanti smoditaṃ sūryaṃ devatāś ca samāhitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:997: 3.016.001a kṛtābhiṣeko rāmas tu sītā saumitrir eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:998: 3.016.001c tasmād godāvarītīrāt tato jagmuḥ svam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:1001: 3.016.003a sa rāmaḥ parṇaśālāyām āsīnaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:1003: 3.016.003e lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cakāra vividhāḥ kathāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1005: 3.016.004c taṃ deśaṃ rākṣasī kā cid ājagāma yadṛcchayā
GE09ram_03_u:1006: 3.016.005a sā tu śūrpaṇakhā nāma daśagrīvasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1019: 3.016.011c āgatas tvam imaṃ deśaṃ kathaṃ rākṣasasevitam
GE09ram_03_u:1020: 3.016.012a evam uktas tu rākṣasyā śūrpaṇakhyā paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1023: 3.016.013c tasyāham agrajaḥ putro rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1024: 3.016.014a bhrātāyaṃ lakṣmaṇo nāma yavīyān mām anuvrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1025: 3.016.014c iyaṃ bhāryā ca vaidehī mama sīteti viśrutā
GE09ram_03_u:1026: 3.016.015a niyogāt tu narendrasya pitur mātuś ca yantritaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1027: 3.016.015c dharmārthaṃ dharmakāṅkṣī ca vanaṃ vastum ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1028: 3.016.016a tvāṃ tu veditum icchāmi kathyatāṃ kāsi kasya vā
GE09ram_03_u:1029: 3.016.016c iha vā kiṃnimittaṃ tvam āgatā brūhi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1031: 3.016.017c śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi tattvārthaṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:1034: 3.016.019a rāvaṇo nāma me bhrātā rākṣaso rākṣaseśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1036: 3.016.020a vibhīṣaṇas tu dharmātmā na tu rākṣasaceṣṭitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1040: 3.016.021e cirāya bhava bhartā me sītayā kiṃ kariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1041: 3.016.022a vikṛtā ca virūpā ca na seyaṃ sadṛśī tava
GE09ram_03_u:1042: 3.016.022c aham evānurūpā te bhāryā rūpeṇa paśya mām
GE09ram_03_u:1044: 3.016.023c anena saha te bhrātrā bhakṣayiṣyāmi mānuṣīm
GE09ram_03_u:1046: 3.016.024c paśyan saha mayā kānta daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1047: 3.016.025a ity evam uktaḥ kākutsthaḥ prahasya madirekṣaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:1053: 3.017.003a anujas tv eṣa me bhrātā śīlavān priyadarśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1054: 3.017.003c śrīmān akṛtadāraś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:1056: 3.017.004c anurūpaś ca te bhartā rūpasyāsya bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1057: 3.017.005a enaṃ bhaja viśālākṣi bhartāraṃ bhrātaraṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:1059: 3.017.006a iti rāmeṇa sā proktā rākṣasī kāmamohitā
GE09ram_03_u:1060: 3.017.006c visṛjya rāmaṃ sahasā tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1061: 3.017.007a asya rūpasya te yuktā bhāryāhaṃ varavarṇinī
GE09ram_03_u:1062: 3.017.007c mayā saha sukhaṃ sarvān daṇḍakān vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1063: 3.017.008a evam uktas tu saumitrī rākṣasyā vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1064: 3.017.008c tataḥ śūrpaṇakhīṃ smitvā lakṣmaṇo yuktam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1065: 3.017.009a kathaṃ dāsasya me dāsī bhāryā bhavitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:1068: 3.017.010c āryasya tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā bhava yavīyasī
GE09ram_03_u:1070: 3.017.011c bhāryāṃ vṛddhāṃ parityajya tvām evaiṣa bhajiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1071: 3.017.012a ko hi rūpam idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ saṃtyajya varavarṇini
GE09ram_03_u:1078: 3.017.015c vṛddhāṃ bhāryām avaṣṭabhya na māṃ tvaṃ bahu manyase
GE09ram_03_u:1084: 3.017.018c nigṛhya rāmaḥ kupitas tato lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1085: 3.017.019a krūrair anāryaiḥ saumitre parihāsaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:1086: 3.017.019c na kāryaḥ paśya vaidehīṃ kathaṃ cit saumya jīvatīm
GE09ram_03_u:1089: 3.017.021a ity ukto lakṣmaṇas tasyāḥ kruddho rāmasya paśyataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1091: 3.017.022a nikṛttakarṇanāsā tu visvaraṃ sā vinadya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1094: 3.017.023c nanāda vividhān nādān yathā prāvṛṣi toyadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1105: 3.018.001a tāṃ tathā patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā virūpāṃ śoṇitokṣitām
GE09ram_03_u:1108: 3.018.002c imām avasthāṃ nītā tvaṃ kenāntakasamā gatā
GE09ram_03_u:1110: 3.018.003c ko 'yam evaṃ mahāvīryas tvāṃ virūpāṃ cakāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:1111: 3.018.004a na hi paśyāmy ahaṃ loke yaḥ kuryān mama vipriyam
GE09ram_03_u:1114: 3.018.005c salile kṣīram āsaktaṃ niṣpibann iva sārasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1116: 3.018.006c saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ raktaṃ medinī kasya pāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:1117: 3.018.007a kasya patrarathāḥ kāyān māṃsam utkṛtya saṃgatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1119: 3.018.008a taṃ na devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1121: 3.018.009a upalabhya śanaiḥ saṃjñāṃ taṃ me śaṃsitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:1122: 3.018.009c yena tvaṃ durvinītena vane vikramya nirjitā
GE09ram_03_u:1123: 3.018.010a iti bhrātur vacaḥ śrutvā kruddhasya ca viśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1124: 3.018.010c tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ sabāṣpam idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1128: 3.018.012c devau vā mānuṣau vā tau na tarkayitum utsahe
GE09ram_03_u:1130: 3.018.013c dṛṣṭā tatra mayā nārī tayor madhye sumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:1131: 3.018.014a tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃbhūya pramadām adhikṛtya tām
GE09ram_03_u:1133: 3.018.015a tasyāś cānṛjuvṛttāyās tayoś ca hatayor aham
GE09ram_03_u:1135: 3.018.016a eṣa me prathamaḥ kāmaḥ kṛtas tāta tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:1136: 3.018.016c tasyās tayoś ca rudhiraṃ pibeyam aham āhave
GE09ram_03_u:1141: 3.018.019a tau hatvā tāṃ ca durvṛttām upāvartitum arhatha
GE09ram_03_u:1142: 3.018.019c iyaṃ ca rudhiraṃ teṣāṃ bhaginī mama pāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:1144: 3.018.020c śīghraṃ saṃpadyatāṃ gatvā tau pramathya svatejasā
GE09ram_03_u:1146: 3.018.021c tatra jagmus tayā sārdhaṃ ghanā vāteritā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1148: 3.019.001c rakṣasām ācacakṣe tau bhrātarau saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:1150: 3.019.002c dadṛśuḥ sītayā sārdhaṃ vaidehyā lakṣmaṇena ca
GE09ram_03_u:1151: 3.019.003a tān dṛṣṭvā rāghavaḥ śrīmān āgatāṃ tāṃ ca rākṣasīm
GE09ram_03_u:1154: 3.019.004c imān asyā vadhiṣyāmi padavīm āgatān iha
GE09ram_03_u:1155: 3.019.005a vākyam etat tataḥ śrutvā rāmasya viditātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1158: 3.019.006c cakāra sajyaṃ dharmātmā tāni rakṣāṃsi cābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1166: 3.019.010c yadi prāṇair ihārtho vo nivartadhvaṃ niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1167: 3.019.011a tasya tadvacanaṃ śrutvā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:1171: 3.019.013a krodham utpādya no bhartuḥ kharasya sumahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1172: 3.019.013c tvam eva hāsyase prāṇān adyāsmābhir hato yudhi
GE09ram_03_u:1173: 3.019.014a kā hi te śaktir ekasya bahūnāṃ raṇamūrdhani
GE09ram_03_u:1174: 3.019.014c asmākam agrataḥ sthātuṃ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave
GE09ram_03_u:1176: 3.019.015c prāṇāṃs tyakṣyasi vīryaṃ ca dhanuś ca karapīḍitam
GE09ram_03_u:1177: 3.019.016a ity evam uktvā saṃrabdhā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:1179: 3.019.016e cikṣipus tāni śūlāni rāghavaṃ prati durjayam
GE09ram_03_u:1184: 3.019.019a gṛhītvā dhanur āyamya lakṣyān uddiśya rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:1185: 3.019.019c mumoca rāghavo bāṇān vajrān iva śatakratuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1188: 3.019.021a te bhittvā rakṣasāṃ vegād vakṣāṃsi rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1190: 3.019.022a te bhinnahṛdayā bhūmau chinnamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1192: 3.019.023a tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā rākṣasī krodhamūrchitā
GE09ram_03_u:1193: 3.019.023c paritrastā punas tatra vyasṛjad bhairavaṃ ravam
GE09ram_03_u:1194: 3.019.024a sā nadantī mahānādaṃ javāc chūrpaṇakhā punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1195: 3.019.024c upagamya kharaṃ sā tu kiṃ cit saṃśuṣka śoṇitā
GE09ram_03_u:1201: 3.020.001a sa punaḥ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā krodhāc chūrpaṇakhāṃ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1202: 3.020.001c uvāca vyaktatā vācā tām anarthārtham āgatām
GE09ram_03_u:1203: 3.020.002a mayā tv idānīṃ śūrās te rākṣasā rudhirāśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1205: 3.020.003a bhaktāś caivānuraktāś ca hitāś ca mama nityaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1206: 3.020.003c ghnanto 'pi na nihantavyā na na kuryur vaco mama
GE09ram_03_u:1207: 3.020.004a kim etac chrotum icchāmi kāraṇaṃ yatkṛte punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1208: 3.020.004c hā nātheti vinardantī sarpavad veṣṭase kṣitau
GE09ram_03_u:1209: 3.020.005a anāthavad vilapasi kiṃ nu nāthe mayi sthite
GE09ram_03_u:1210: 3.020.005c uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha mā bhaiṣīr vaiklavyaṃ tyajyatām iha
GE09ram_03_u:1211: 3.020.006a ity evam uktā durdharṣā khareṇa parisāntvitā
GE09ram_03_u:1212: 3.020.006c vimṛjya nayane sāsre kharaṃ bhrātaram abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1213: 3.020.007a preṣitāś ca tvayā śūrā rākṣasās te caturdaśa
GE09ram_03_u:1217: 3.020.009a tān bhūmau patitān dṛṣṭvā kṣaṇenaiva mahābalān
GE09ram_03_u:1218: 3.020.009c rāmasya ca mahat karma mahāṃs trāso 'bhavan mama
GE09ram_03_u:1219: 3.020.010a sāsmi bhītā samudvignā viṣaṇṇā ca niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:1220: 3.020.010c śaraṇaṃ tvāṃ punaḥ prāptā sarvato bhayadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:1222: 3.020.011c kiṃ māṃ na trāyase magnāṃ vipule śokasāgare
GE09ram_03_u:1223: 3.020.012a ete ca nihatā bhūmau rāmeṇa niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1224: 3.020.012c ye ca me padavīṃ prāptā rākṣasāḥ piśitāśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1225: 3.020.013a mayi te yady anukrośo yadi rakṣaḥsu teṣu ca
GE09ram_03_u:1226: 3.020.013c rāmeṇa yadi śaktis te tejo vāsti niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:1228: 3.020.014a yadi rāmaṃ mamāmitram adya tvaṃ na vadhiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1230: 3.020.015a buddhyāham anupaśyāmi na tvaṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:1233: 3.020.016c mānuṣau yan na śaknoṣi hantuṃ tau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:1235: 3.020.017c niḥsattvasyālpavīryasya vāsas te kīdṛśas tv iha
GE09ram_03_u:1238: 3.020.018e bhrātā cāsya mahāvīryo yena cāsmi virūpitā
GE09ram_03_u:1239: 3.021.001a evam ādharṣitaḥ śūraḥ śūrpaṇakhyā kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1240: 3.021.001c uvāca rakṣasāṃ madhye kharaḥ kharataraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1243: 3.021.003a na rāmaṃ gaṇaye vīryān mānuṣaṃ kṣīṇajīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:1244: 3.021.003c ātmā duścaritaiḥ prāṇān hato yo 'dya vimokṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1245: 3.021.004a bāṣpaḥ saṃhriyatām eṣa saṃbhramaś ca vimucyatām
GE09ram_03_u:1246: 3.021.004c ahaṃ rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā nayāmi yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:1248: 3.021.005c rāmasya rudhiraṃ raktam uṣṇaṃ pāsyasi rākṣasi
GE09ram_03_u:1249: 3.021.006a sā prahṛṣṭvā vacaḥ śrutvā kharasya vadanāc cyutam
GE09ram_03_u:1250: 3.021.006c praśaśaṃsa punar maurkhyād bhrātaraṃ rakṣasāṃ varam
GE09ram_03_u:1251: 3.021.007a tayā paruṣitaḥ pūrvaṃ punar eva praśaṃsitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1252: 3.021.007c abravīd dūṣaṇaṃ nāma kharaḥ senāpatiṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1259: 3.021.011a upasthāpaya me kṣipraṃ rathaṃ saumya dhanūṃṣi ca
GE09ram_03_u:1260: 3.021.011c śarāṃś ca citrān khaḍgāṃś ca śaktīś ca vividhāḥ śitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1267: 3.021.015a matsyaiḥ puṣpair drumaiḥ śailaiś candrasūryaiś ca kāñcanaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1268: 3.021.015c māṅgalyaiḥ pakṣisaṃghaiś ca tārābhiś ca samāvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1277: 3.021.020a mudgaraiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ sutīkṣṇaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1278: 3.021.020c khaḍgaiś cakraiś ca hastasthair bhrājamānaiś ca tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1279: 3.021.021a śaktibhiḥ patighair ghorair atimātraiś ca kārmukaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1283: 3.021.023a tāṃs tv abhidravato dṛṣṭvā rākṣasān bhīmavikramān
GE09ram_03_u:1284: 3.021.023c kharasyāpi rathaḥ kiṃ cij jagāma tadanantaram
GE09ram_03_u:1287: 3.021.025a sa codito rathaḥ śīghraṃ kharasya ripughātinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1288: 3.021.025c śabdenāpūrayām āsa diśaś ca pratiśas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:1293: 3.022.001a tat prayātaṃ balaṃ ghoram aśivaṃ śoṇitodakam
GE09ram_03_u:1303: 3.022.006a vyājahruś ca padīptāyāṃ diśi vai bhairavasvanam
GE09ram_03_u:1304: 3.022.006c aśivā yātu dāhānāṃ śivā ghorā mahāsvanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1306: 3.022.007c ākāśaṃ tad anākāśaṃ cakrur bhīmā balāhakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1308: 3.022.008c diśo vā vidiśo vāpi suvyaktaṃ na cakāśire
GE09ram_03_u:1310: 3.022.009c kharasyābhimukhaṃ nedus tadā ghorā mṛgāḥ khagāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1316: 3.022.012c utpetuś ca vinā rātriṃ tārāḥ khadyotasaprabhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1318: 3.022.013c tasmin kṣaṇe babhūvuś ca vinā puṣpaphalair drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1319: 3.022.014a uddhūtaś ca vinā vātaṃ reṇur jaladharāruṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1326: 3.022.017c lalāṭe ca rujā jātā na ca mohān nyavartata
GE09ram_03_u:1328: 3.022.018c abravīd rākṣasān sarvān prahasan sa kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1330: 3.022.019c na cintayāmy ahaṃ vīryād balavān durbalān iva
GE09ram_03_u:1331: 3.022.020a tārā api śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ pātayeyaṃ nabhastalāt
GE09ram_03_u:1333: 3.022.021a rāghavaṃ taṃ balotsiktaṃ bhrātaraṃ cāpi lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1335: 3.022.022a sakāmā bhaginī me 'stu pītvā tu rudhiraṃ tayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1337: 3.022.023a na kva cit prāptapūrvo me saṃyugeṣu parājayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1338: 3.022.023c yuṣmākam etat pratyakṣaṃ nānṛtaṃ kathayāmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:1340: 3.022.024c vajrahastaṃ raṇe hanyāṃ kiṃ punas tau ca mānuṣau
GE09ram_03_u:1341: 3.022.025a sā tasya garjitaṃ śrutvā rākṣasasya mahācamūḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1344: 3.022.026c ṛṣayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1346: 3.022.027c svasti gobrāhmaṇebhyo 'stu lokānāṃ ye ca saṃmatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1348: 3.022.028c cakrā hasto yathā yuddhe sarvān asurapuṃgavān
GE09ram_03_u:1349: 3.022.029a etac cānyac ca bahuśo bruvāṇāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1351: 3.022.030a rathena tu kharo vegāt sainyasyāgrād viniḥsṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1352: 3.022.030c taṃ dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ bhūyo rākṣasāś ca viniḥsṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1363: 3.023.001a āśramaṃ prati yāte tu khare kharaparākrame
GE09ram_03_u:1364: 3.023.001c tān evautpātikān rāmaḥ saha bhrātrā dadarśa ha
GE09ram_03_u:1366: 3.023.002c prajānām ahitān dṛṣṭvā vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1371: 3.023.005a sadhūmāś ca śarāḥ sarve mama yuddhābhinandinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1374: 3.023.006c agrato no bhayaṃ prāptaṃ saṃśayo jīvitasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1375: 3.023.007a saṃprahāras tu sumahān bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1376: 3.023.007c ayam ākhyāti me bāhuḥ sphuramāṇo muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1377: 3.023.008a saṃnikarṣe tu naḥ śūra jayaṃ śatroḥ parājayam
GE09ram_03_u:1378: 3.023.008c suprabhaṃ ca prasannaṃ ca tava vaktraṃ hi lakṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:1379: 3.023.009a udyatānāṃ hi yuddhārthaṃ yeṣāṃ bhavati lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1380: 3.023.009c niṣprabhaṃ vadanaṃ teṣāṃ bhavaty āyuḥ parikṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1385: 3.023.012a pratikūlitum icchāmi na hi vākyam idaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:1386: 3.023.012c śāpito mama pādābhyāṃ gamyatāṃ vatsa māciram
GE09ram_03_u:1387: 3.023.013a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:1388: 3.023.013c śarān ādāya cāpaṃ ca guhāṃ durgāṃ samāśrayat
GE09ram_03_u:1389: 3.023.014a tasmin praviṣṭe tu guhāṃ lakṣmaṇe saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:1390: 3.023.014c hanta niryuktam ity uktvā rāmaḥ kavacam āviśat
GE09ram_03_u:1393: 3.023.016a sa cāpam udyamya mahac charān ādāya vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:1395: 3.023.017a tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca saha cāraṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1398: 3.023.018c ekaś ca rāmo dharmātmā kathaṃ yuddhaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1404: 3.023.021c teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ pūrayām āsa tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:1407: 3.023.023a tat tv anīkaṃ mahāvegaṃ rāmaṃ samupasarpata
GE09ram_03_u:1411: 3.023.025a vitatya ca dhanur bhīmaṃ tūṇyāś coddhṛtya sāyakān
GE09ram_03_u:1413: 3.023.026a duṣprekṣyaḥ so 'bhavat kruddho yugāntāgnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_03_u:1415: 3.023.027a tasya kruddhasya rūpaṃ tu rāmasya dadṛśe tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1419: 3.024.002a taṃ dṛṣṭvā saguṇaṃ cāpam udyamya kharaniḥsvanam
GE09ram_03_u:1422: 3.024.003c yatra rāmo mahābāhur eko dhunvan dhanuḥ sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1423: 3.024.004a taṃ tu niṣpatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te rajanīcarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1425: 3.024.005a sa teṣāṃ yātudhānānāṃ madhye rato gataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1427: 3.024.006a tatas taṃ bhīmadhanvānaṃ kruddhāḥ sarve niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1429: 3.024.007a mudgarair āyasaiḥ śūlaiḥ prāsaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1433: 3.024.009a te rāme śaravarṣāṇi vyasṛjan rakṣasāṃ guṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1435: 3.024.010a sa taiḥ parivṛto ghorai rāghavo rakṣasāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1436: 3.024.010c tithiṣv iva mahādevo vṛtaḥ pāriṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1437: 3.024.011a tāni muktāni śastrāṇi yātudhānaiḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1439: 3.024.012a sa taiḥ praharaṇair ghorair bhinnagātro na vivyathe
GE09ram_03_u:1440: 3.024.012c rāmaḥ pradīptair bahubhir vajrair iva mahācalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1444: 3.024.014c ekaṃ sahastrair bahubhis tadā dṛṣṭvā samāvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1449: 3.024.017a te śarāḥ śatrusainyeṣu muktā rāmeṇa līlayā
GE09ram_03_u:1450: 3.024.017c ādadū rakṣasāṃ prāṇān pāśāḥ kālakṛtā iva
GE09ram_03_u:1451: 3.024.018a bhittvā rākṣasadehāṃs tāṃs te śarā rudhirāplutāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1455: 3.024.020a tair dhanūṃṣi dhvajāgrāṇi varmāṇi ca śirāṃsi ca
GE09ram_03_u:1459: 3.024.022a tat sainyaṃ niśitair bāṇair arditaṃ marmabhedibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1460: 3.024.022c rāmeṇa na sukhaṃ lebhe śuṣkaṃ vanam ivāgninā
GE09ram_03_u:1461: 3.024.023a ke cid bhīmabalāḥ śūrāḥ śūlān khaḍgān paraśvadhān
GE09ram_03_u:1463: 3.024.024a tāni bāṇair mahābāhuḥ śastrāṇy āvārya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1464: 3.024.024c jahāra samare prāṇāṃś ciccheda ca śirodharān
GE09ram_03_u:1465: 3.024.025a avaśiṣṭāś ca ye tatra viṣaṇṇāś ca niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1467: 3.024.026a tān sarvān punar ādāya samāśvāsya ca dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1472: 3.024.028c rāmasyāsya mahāghoraṃ punas teṣāṃ ca rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:1473: 3.025.001a tad drumāṇāṃ śilānāṃ ca varṣaṃ prāṇaharaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:1475: 3.025.002a pratigṛhya ca tad varaṃ nimīlita ivarṣabhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1476: 3.025.002c rāmaḥ krodhaṃ paraṃ bheje vadhārthaṃ sarvarakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:1490: 3.025.009a sa karābhyāṃ vikīrṇābhyāṃ papāta bhuvi dūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1492: 3.025.010a dṛṣṭvā taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau dūṣaṇaṃ nihataṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:1493: 3.025.010c sādhu sādhv iti kākutsthaṃ sarvabhūtāny apūjayan
GE09ram_03_u:1498: 3.025.012c sthūlākṣaḥ paṭṭiśaṃ gṛhya pramāthī ca paraśvadham
GE09ram_03_u:1499: 3.025.013a dṛṣṭvaivāpatatas tāṃs tu rāghavaḥ sāyakaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1504: 3.025.015c sa papāta hato bhūmau viṭapīva mahādrumaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1507: 3.025.017a te rukmapuṅkhā viśikhāḥ sadhūmā iva pāvakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1508: 3.025.017c nijaghnus tāni rakṣāṃsi vajrā iva mahādrumān
GE09ram_03_u:1509: 3.025.018a rakṣasāṃ tu śataṃ rāmaḥ śatenaikena karṇinā
GE09ram_03_u:1514: 3.025.020c āstīrṇā vasudhā kṛtsnā mahāvediḥ kuśair iva
GE09ram_03_u:1519: 3.025.023a tasya sainyasya sarvasya kharaḥ śeṣo mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1520: 3.025.023c rākṣasas triśirāś caiva rāmaś ca ripusūdanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1529: 3.026.003a pratijānāmi te satyam āyudhaṃ cāham ālabhe
GE09ram_03_u:1531: 3.026.004a ahaṃ vāsya raṇe mṛtyur eṣa vā samare mama
GE09ram_03_u:1533: 3.026.005a prahṛṣṭo vā hate rāme janasthānaṃ prayāsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1538: 3.026.007c abhyadravad raṇe rāmaṃ triśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1543: 3.026.010a sa saṃprahāras tumulo rāma triśirasor mahān
GE09ram_03_u:1545: 3.026.011a tatas triśirasā bāṇair lalāṭe tāḍitas tribhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1546: 3.026.011c amarṣī kupito rāmaḥ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1548: 3.026.012c puṣpair iva śarair yasya lalāṭe 'smi parikṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1550: 3.026.013a evam uktvā tu saṃrabdhaḥ śarān āśīviṣopamān
GE09ram_03_u:1555: 3.026.015c rāmaś ciccheda bāṇena dhvajaṃ cāsya samucchritam
GE09ram_03_u:1557: 3.026.016c bibheda rāmas taṃ bāṇair hṛdaye so 'bhavaj jaḍaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1559: 3.026.017c śirāṃsy apātayat trīṇi vegavadbhis tribhiḥ śataiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1563: 3.026.019c dravanti sma na tiṣṭhanti vyāghratrastā mṛgā iva
GE09ram_03_u:1564: 3.026.020a tān kharo dravato dṛṣṭvā nivartya ruṣitaḥ svayam
GE09ram_03_u:1566: 3.027.001a nihataṃ dūṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā raṇe triśirasā saha
GE09ram_03_u:1567: 3.027.001c kharasyāpy abhavat trāso dṛṣṭvā rāmasya vikramam
GE09ram_03_u:1568: 3.027.002a sa dṛṣṭvā rākṣasaṃ sainyam aviṣahyaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1569: 3.027.002c hatam ekena rāmeṇa dūṣaṇas triśirā api
GE09ram_03_u:1570: 3.027.003a tad balaṃ hatabhūyiṣṭhaṃ vimanāḥ prekṣya rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1571: 3.027.003c āsasāda kharo rāmaṃ namucir vāsavaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1573: 3.027.004c kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya kruddhān āśīviṣān iva
GE09ram_03_u:1575: 3.027.005c cacāra samare mārgāñ śarai rathagataḥ kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1576: 3.027.006a sa sarvāś ca diśo bāṇaiḥ pradiśaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1577: 3.027.006c pūrayām āsa taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo 'pi sumahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1582: 3.027.009a śarajālāvṛtaḥ sūryo na tadā sma prakāśate
GE09ram_03_u:1585: 3.027.010c ājaghāna raṇe rāmaṃ totrair iva mahādvipam
GE09ram_03_u:1589: 3.027.012c dṛṣṭvā nodvijate rāmaḥ siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1591: 3.027.013c āsasāda raṇe rāmaṃ pataṅga iva pāvakam
GE09ram_03_u:1594: 3.027.015a sa punas tv aparān sapta śarān ādāya varmaṇi
GE09ram_03_u:1596: 3.027.016a tatas tat prahataṃ bāṇaiḥ kharamuktaiḥ suparvabhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1598: 3.027.017a sa śarair arpitaḥ kruddhaḥ sarvagātreṣu rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1599: 3.027.017c rarāja samare rāmo vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
GE09ram_03_u:1601: 3.027.018c cakārāntāya sa ripoḥ sajyam anyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1602: 3.027.019a sumahad vaiṣṇavaṃ yat tad atisṛṣṭaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:1603: 3.027.019c varaṃ tad dhanur udyamya kharaṃ samabhidhāvata
GE09ram_03_u:1605: 3.027.020c ciccheda rāmaḥ saṃkruddhaḥ kharasya samare dhvajam
GE09ram_03_u:1606: 3.027.021a sa darśanīyo bahudhā vicchinnaḥ kāñcano dhvajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1608: 3.027.022a taṃ caturbhiḥ kharaḥ kruddho rāmaṃ gātreṣu mārgaṇaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1609: 3.027.022c vivyādha hṛdi marmajño mātaṅgam iva tomaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1612: 3.027.024a sa dhanur dhanvināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya paramāhave
GE09ram_03_u:1614: 3.027.025a śirasy ekena bāṇena dvābhyāṃ bāhvor athārpayat
GE09ram_03_u:1615: 3.027.025c tribhiś candrārdhavaktraiś ca vakṣasy abhijaghāna ha
GE09ram_03_u:1618: 3.027.027a tato 'sya yugam ekena caturbhiś caturo hayān
GE09ram_03_u:1619: 3.027.027c ṣaṣṭhena ca śiraḥ saṃkhye ciccheda kharasāratheḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1620: 3.027.028a tribhis triveṇuṃ balavān dvābhyām akṣaṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1621: 3.027.028c dvādaśena tu bāṇena kharasya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1625: 3.027.029c gadāpāṇir avaplutya tasthau bhūmau kharas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:1630: 3.028.001a kharaṃ tu virathaṃ rāmo gadāpāṇim avasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:1635: 3.028.003c trayāṇām api lokānām īśvaro 'pi na tiṣṭhati
GE09ram_03_u:1637: 3.028.004c tīkṣṇaṃ sarvajano hanti sarpaṃ duṣṭam ivāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:1638: 3.028.005a lobhāt pāpāni kurvāṇaḥ kāmād vā yo na budhyate
GE09ram_03_u:1639: 3.028.005c bhraṣṭaḥ paśyati tasyāntaṃ brāhmaṇī karakād iva
GE09ram_03_u:1641: 3.028.006c kiṃ nu hatvā mahābhāgān phalaṃ prāpsyasi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:1643: 3.028.007c aiśvaryaṃ prāpya tiṣṭhanti śīrṇamūlā iva drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1644: 3.028.008a avaśyaṃ labhate kartā phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1645: 3.028.008c ghoraṃ paryāgate kāle drumaḥ puṣpam ivārtavam
GE09ram_03_u:1646: 3.028.009a nacirāt prāpyate loke pāpānāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalam
GE09ram_03_u:1649: 3.028.010c aham āsādito rājā prāṇān hantuṃ niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:1650: 3.028.011a adya hi tvāṃ mayā muktāḥ śarāḥ kāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1654: 3.028.013a adya tvāṃ nihataṃ bāṇaiḥ paśyantu paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1655: 3.028.013c nirayasthaṃ vimānasthā ye tvayā hiṃsitāḥ purā
GE09ram_03_u:1656: 3.028.014a prahara tvaṃ yathākāmaṃ kuru yatnaṃ kulādhama
GE09ram_03_u:1657: 3.028.014c adya te pātayiṣyāmi śiras tālaphalaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1658: 3.028.015a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa kruddhaḥ saṃraktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1662: 3.028.017a vikrāntā balavanto vā ye bhavanti nararṣabhāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1663: 3.028.017c kathayanti na te kiṃ cit tejasā svena garvitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1667: 3.028.019c mṛtyukāle hi saṃprāpte svayam aprastave stavam
GE09ram_03_u:1668: 3.028.020a sarvathā tu laghutvaṃ te katthanena vidarśitam
GE09ram_03_u:1670: 3.028.021a na tu mām iha tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyasi tvaṃ gadādharam
GE09ram_03_u:1672: 3.028.022a paryāpto 'haṃ gadāpāṇir hantuṃ prāṇān raṇe tava
GE09ram_03_u:1674: 3.028.023a kāmaṃ bahv api vaktavyaṃ tvayi vakṣyāmi na tv aham
GE09ram_03_u:1675: 3.028.023c astaṃ gacched dhi savitā yuddhavighras tato bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:1678: 3.028.025a ity uktvā paramakruddhas tāṃ gadāṃ paramāṅgadām
GE09ram_03_u:1679: 3.028.025c kharaś cikṣepa rāmāya pradīptām aśaniṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1681: 3.028.026c bhasmavṛkṣāṃś ca gulmāṃś ca kṛtvāgāt tatsamīpataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1684: 3.028.028a sā viśīrṇā śarair bhinnā papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_03_u:1686: 3.029.001a bhittvā tu tāṃ gadāṃ bāṇai rāghavo dharmavatsalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1687: 3.029.001c smayamānaḥ kharaṃ vākyaṃ saṃrabdham idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1693: 3.029.004c rākṣasānāṃ karomīti mithyā tad api te vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1699: 3.029.007c svapsyase gāṃ samāśliṣya durlabhāṃ pramadām iva
GE09ram_03_u:1707: 3.029.011c anurūpakulāḥ patnyo yāsāṃ tvaṃ patir īdṛśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1709: 3.029.012c tvatkṛte śaṅkitair agnau munibhiḥ pātyate haviḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1710: 3.029.013a tam evam abhisaṃrabdhaṃ bruvāṇaṃ rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:1711: 3.029.013c kharo nirbhartsayām āsa roṣāt kharatara svanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1712: 3.029.014a dṛḍhaṃ khalv avalipto 'si bhayeṣv api ca nirbhayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1713: 3.029.014c vācyāvācyaṃ tato hi tvaṃ mṛtyuvaśyo na budhyase
GE09ram_03_u:1716: 3.029.016a evam uktvā tato rāmaṃ saṃrudhya bhṛkuṭiṃ tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1719: 3.029.017c sa tam utpāṭayām āsa saṃdṛśya daśanacchadam
GE09ram_03_u:1721: 3.029.018c rāmam uddiśya cikṣepa hatas tvam iti cābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:1722: 3.029.019a tam āpatantaṃ bāṇaughaiś chittvā rāmaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:1723: 3.029.019c roṣam āhārayat tīvraṃ nihantuṃ samare kharam
GE09ram_03_u:1726: 3.029.021a tasya bāṇāntarād raktaṃ bahu susrāva phenilam
GE09ram_03_u:1728: 3.029.022a vihvalaḥ sa kṛto bāṇaiḥ kharo rāmeṇa saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:1734: 3.029.025a sa tad dattaṃ maghavatā surarājena dhīmatā
GE09ram_03_u:1735: 3.029.025c saṃdadhe ca sa dharmātmā mumoca ca kharaṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:1738: 3.029.027a sa papāta kharo bhūmau dahyamānaḥ śarāgninā
GE09ram_03_u:1740: 3.029.028a sa vṛtra iva vajreṇa phenena namucir yathāa
GE09ram_03_u:1743: 3.029.029c sabhājya muditā rāmam idaṃ vacanam abruvan
GE09ram_03_u:1746: 3.029.031a ānītas tvam imaṃ deśam upāyena maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1748: 3.029.032a tad idaṃ naḥ kṛtaṃ kāryaṃ tvayā daśarathātmaja
GE09ram_03_u:1750: 3.029.033a etasminn antare vīro lakṣmaṇaḥ saha sītayā
GE09ram_03_u:1752: 3.029.034a tato rāmas tu vijayī pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1758: 3.030.002a dūṣaṇaṃ ca kharaṃ caiva hataṃ triśirasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:1760: 3.030.003a sā dṛṣṭvā karma rāmasya kṛtam anyaiḥ suduṣkaram
GE09ram_03_u:1780: 3.030.013a purīṃ bhogavatīṃ gatvā parājitya ca vāsukim
GE09ram_03_u:1781: 3.030.013c takṣakasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ parājitya jahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1783: 3.030.014c vimānaṃ puṣpakaṃ tasya kāmagaṃ vai jahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1784: 3.030.015a vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ divyaṃ nalinīṃ nandanaṃ vanam
GE09ram_03_u:1789: 3.030.017c purā svayambhuve dhīraḥ śirāṃsy upajahāra yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1791: 3.030.018c abhayaṃ yasya saṃgrāme mṛtyuto mānuṣād ṛte
GE09ram_03_u:1797: 3.030.021a rākṣasī bhrātaraṃ krūraṃ sā dadarśa mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1809: 3.031.003c lubdhaṃ na bahu manyante śmaśānāgnim iva prajāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1810: 3.031.004a svayaṃ kāryāṇi yaḥ kāle nānutiṣṭhati pārthivaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1811: 3.031.004c sa tu vai saha rājyena taiś ca kāryair vinaśyati
GE09ram_03_u:1813: 3.031.005c varjayanti narā dūrān nadīpaṅkam iva dvipāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1814: 3.031.006a ye na rakṣanti viṣayam asvādhīnā narādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1815: 3.031.006c te na vṛddhyā prakāśante girayaḥ sāgare yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1818: 3.031.008a yeṣāṃ cāraś ca kośaś ca nayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:1819: 3.031.008c asvādhīnā narendrāṇāṃ prākṛtais te janaiḥ samāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1820: 3.031.009a yasmāt paśyanti dūrasthān sarvān arthān narādhipāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1822: 3.031.010a ayuktacāraṃ manye tvāṃ prākṛtaiḥ sacivair vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1823: 3.031.010c svajanaṃ ca janasthānaṃ hataṃ yo nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_03_u:1825: 3.031.011c hatāny ekena rāmeṇa kharaś ca sahadūṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1826: 3.031.012a ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1828: 3.031.013a tvaṃ tu lubdhaḥ pramattaś ca parādhīnaś ca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:1829: 3.031.013c viṣaye sve samutpannaṃ bhayaṃ yo nāvabudhyase
GE09ram_03_u:1834: 3.031.016a nānutiṣṭhati kāryāṇi bhayeṣu na bibheti ca
GE09ram_03_u:1835: 3.031.016c kṣipraṃ rājyāc cyuto dīnas tṛṇais tulyo bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:1836: 3.031.017a śuṣkakāṣṭhair bhavet kāryaṃ loṣṭair api ca pāṃsubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1837: 3.031.017c na tu sthānāt paribhraṣṭaiḥ kāryaṃ syād vasudhādhipaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1838: 3.031.018a upabhuktaṃ yathā vāsaḥ srajo vā mṛditā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:1840: 3.031.019a apramattaś ca yo rājā sarvajño vijitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1841: 3.031.019c kṛtajño dharmaśīlaś ca sa rājā tiṣṭhate ciram
GE09ram_03_u:1843: 3.031.020c vyaktakrodhaprasādaś ca sa rājā pūjyate janaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1844: 3.031.021a tvaṃ tu rāvaṇadurbuddhir guṇair etair vivarjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1845: 3.031.021c yasya te 'viditaś cārai rakṣasāṃ sumahān vadhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1854: 3.032.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhāṃ kruddhāṃ bruvatīṃ paruṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1856: 3.032.002a kaś ca rāmaḥ kathaṃ vīryaḥ kiṃ rūpaḥ kiṃ parākramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1858: 3.032.003a āyudhaṃ kiṃ ca rāmasya nihatā yena rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1859: 3.032.003c kharaś ca nihataṃ saṃkhye dūṣaṇas triśirās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:1865: 3.032.006c dīptān kṣipati nārācān sarpān iva mahāviṣān
GE09ram_03_u:1866: 3.032.007a nādadānaṃ śarān ghorān na muñcantaṃ mahābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1867: 3.032.007c na kārmukaṃ vikarṣantaṃ rāmaṃ paśyāmi saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:1868: 3.032.008a hanyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ paśyāmi śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1873: 3.032.010c ṛṣīṇām abhayaṃ dattaṃ kṛtakṣemāś ca daṇḍakāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1874: 3.032.011a ekā kathaṃ cin muktāhaṃ paribhūya mahātmanā
GE09ram_03_u:1877: 3.032.012c anuraktaś ca bhaktaś ca lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:1878: 3.032.013a amarṣī durjayo jetā vikrānto buddhimān balī
GE09ram_03_u:1879: 3.032.013c rāmasya dakṣiṇe bāhur nityaṃ prāṇo bahiṣcaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1882: 3.032.015a naiva devī na gandharvā na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_03_u:1884: 3.032.016a yasya sītā bhaved bhāryā yaṃ ca hṛṣṭā pariṣvajet
GE09ram_03_u:1885: 3.032.016c atijīvet sa sarveṣu lokeṣv api puraṃdarāt
GE09ram_03_u:1887: 3.032.017c tavānurūpā bhāryā sā tvaṃ ca tasyās tathā patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1891: 3.032.019c manmathasya śarāṇāṃ ca tvaṃ vidheyo bhaviṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:1892: 3.032.020a yadi tasyām abhiprāyo bhāryārthe tava jāyate
GE09ram_03_u:1893: 3.032.020c śīghram uddhriyatāṃ pādo jayārtham iha dakṣiṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1894: 3.032.021a kuru priyaṃ tathā teṣāṃ rakṣasāṃ rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:1896: 3.032.022a taṃ śarair niśitair hatvā lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_03_u:1898: 3.032.023a rocate yadi te vākyaṃ mamaitad rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:1902: 3.032.024c kharaṃ ca buddhvā nihataṃ ca dūṣaṇaṃ;
GE09ram_03_u:1904: 3.033.001a tataḥ śūrpaṇakhā vākyaṃ tac chrutvā romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:1905: 3.033.001c sacivān abhyanujñāya kāryaṃ buddhvā jagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:1906: 3.033.002a tat kāryam anugamyātha yathāvad upalabhya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1907: 3.033.002c doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_03_u:1908: 3.033.003a iti kartavyam ity eva kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1909: 3.033.003c sthirabuddhis tato ramyāṃ yānaśālāṃ jagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:1911: 3.033.004c sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaḥ saṃyujyatām iti
GE09ram_03_u:1929: 3.033.013c sālais tālais tamālaiś ca tarubhiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1931: 3.033.014c nāgaiḥ suparṇair gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1932: 3.033.015a jitakāmaiś ca siddhaiś ca cāmaṇaiś copaśobhitam
GE09ram_03_u:1946: 3.033.022a agarūṇāṃ ca mukhyānāṃ vanāny upavanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:1947: 3.033.022c takkolānāṃ ca jātyānāṃ phalānāṃ ca sugandhinām
GE09ram_03_u:1948: 3.033.023a puṣpāṇi ca tamālasya gulmāni maricasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:1951: 3.033.024c kāñcanāni ca śailāni rājatāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1957: 3.033.027c tatrāpaśyat sa meghābhaṃ nyagrodham ṛṣibhir vṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:1958: 3.033.028a samantād yasya tāḥ śākhāḥ śatayojanam āyatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1959: 3.033.028c yasya hastinam ādāya mahākāyaṃ ca kaccapam
GE09ram_03_u:1961: 3.033.029a tasya tāṃ sahasā śākhāṃ bhāreṇa patagottamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1964: 3.033.030c ajā babhūvur dhūmrāś ca saṃgatāḥ paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1965: 3.033.031a teṣāṃ dayārthaṃ garuḍas tāṃ śākhāṃ śatayojanām
GE09ram_03_u:1976: 3.033.036a taṃ tu gatvā paraṃ pāraṃ samudrasya nadīpateḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1980: 3.033.038a sa rāvaṇaḥ samāgamya vidhivat tena rakṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:1981: 3.033.038c tataḥ paścād idaṃ vākyam abravīd vākyakovidaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1982: 3.034.001a mārīca śrūyatāṃ tāta vacanaṃ mama bhāṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1983: 3.034.001c ārto 'smi mama cārtasya bhavān hi paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1984: 3.034.002a jānīṣe tvaṃ janasthānaṃ bhrātā yatra kharo mama
GE09ram_03_u:1985: 3.034.002c dūṣaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ svasā śūrpaṇakhā ca me
GE09ram_03_u:1987: 3.034.003c anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā labdhalakṣā niśācarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1992: 3.034.006a te tv idānīṃ janasthāne vasamānā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1993: 3.034.006c saṃgatāḥ param āyattā rāmeṇa saha saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:1995: 3.034.007c anuktvā paruṣaṃ kiṃ cic charair vyāpāritaṃ dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1998: 3.034.009a kharaś ca nihataḥ saṃkhye dūṣaṇaś ca nipātitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:1999: 3.034.009c hatvā triśirasaṃ cāpi nirbhayā daṇḍakāḥ kṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2001: 3.034.010c sa hantā tasya sainyasya rāmaḥ kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2003: 3.034.011c tyaktadharmas tv adharmātmā bhūtānām ahite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2004: 3.034.012a yena vairaṃ vināraṇye sattvam āśritya kevalam
GE09ram_03_u:2007: 3.034.013c ānayiṣyāmi vikramya sahāyas tatra me bhava
GE09ram_03_u:2008: 3.034.014a tvayā hy ahaṃ sahāyena pārśvasthena mahābala
GE09ram_03_u:2009: 3.034.014c bhrātṛbhiś ca surān yuddhe samagrān nābhicintaye
GE09ram_03_u:2010: 3.034.015a tat sahāyo bhava tvaṃ me samartho hy asi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:2011: 3.034.015c vīrye yuddhe ca darpe ca na hy asti sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_03_u:2013: 3.034.016c śṛṇu tat karma sāhāyye yat kāryaṃ vacanān mama
GE09ram_03_u:2014: 3.034.017a sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2015: 3.034.017c āśrame tasya rāmasya sītāyāḥ pramukhe cara
GE09ram_03_u:2016: 3.034.018a tvāṃ tu niḥsaṃśayaṃ sītā dṛṣṭvā tu mṛgarūpiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2018: 3.034.019a tatas tayor apāye tu śūnye sītāṃ yathāsukham
GE09ram_03_u:2023: 3.034.021c śuṣkaṃ samabhavad vaktraṃ paritrasto babhūva ca
GE09ram_03_u:2027: hitaṃ ca tasmai hitam ātmanaś ca
GE09ram_03_u:2031: 3.035.002c apriyasya ca pathyasya vaktā śrotā ca durlabhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2032: 3.035.003a na nūnaṃ budhyase rāmaṃ mahāvīryaṃ guṇonnatam
GE09ram_03_u:2034: 3.035.004a api svasti bhavet tāta sarveṣāṃ bhuvi rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:2035: 3.035.004c api rāmo na saṃkruddhaḥ kuryāl lokam arākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2037: 3.035.005c api sītā nimittaṃ ca na bhaved vyasanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:2038: 3.035.006a api tvām īśvaraṃ prāpya kāmavṛttaṃ niraṅkuśam
GE09ram_03_u:2039: 3.035.006c na vinaśyet purī laṅkā tvayā saha sarākṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:2041: 3.035.007c ātmānaṃ svajanaṃ rāṣṭraṃ sa rājā hanti durmatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2042: 3.035.008a na ca pitrā parityakto nāmaryādaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:2043: 3.035.008c na lubdho na ca duḥśīlo na ca kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2045: 3.035.009c na ca tīkṣṇo hi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2049: 3.035.011c hitvā rājyaṃ ca bhogāṃś ca praviṣṭo daṇḍakāvanam
GE09ram_03_u:2050: 3.035.012a na rāmaḥ karkaśas tāta nāvidvān nājitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2051: 3.035.012c anṛtaṃ na śrutaṃ caiva naiva tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2053: 3.035.013c rājā sarvasya lokasya devānām iva vāsavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2054: 3.035.014a kathaṃ tvaṃ tasya vaidehīṃ rakṣitāṃ svena tejasā
GE09ram_03_u:2055: 3.035.014c icchasi prasabhaṃ hartuṃ prabhām iva vivasvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2057: 3.035.015c rāmāgniṃ sahasā dīptaṃ na praveṣṭuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2060: 3.035.017a rājyaṃ sukhaṃ ca saṃtyajya jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2062: 3.035.018a aprameyaṃ hi tat tejo yasya sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:2063: 3.035.018c na tvaṃ samarthas tāṃ hartuṃ rāmacāpāśrayāṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:2066: 3.035.020a kim udyamaṃ vyartham imaṃ kṛtvā te rākṣasādhipa
GE09ram_03_u:2067: 3.035.020c dṛṣṭaś cet tvaṃ raṇe tena tad antaṃ tava jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:2068: 3.035.020e jīvitaṃ ca sukhaṃ caiva rājyaṃ caiva sudurlabham
GE09ram_03_u:2070: 3.035.021c mantrayitvā tu dharmiṣṭhaiḥ kṛtvā niścayam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2071: 3.035.022a doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca saṃpradhārya balābalam
GE09ram_03_u:2072: 3.035.022c ātmanaś ca balaṃ jñātvā rāghavasya ca tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2073: 3.035.022e hitaṃ hi tava niścitya kṣamaṃ tvaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2074: 3.035.023a ahaṃ tu manye tava na kṣamaṃ raṇe;
GE09ram_03_u:2076: 3.035.023c idaṃ hi bhūyaḥ śṛṇu vākyam uttamaṃ;
GE09ram_03_u:2078: 3.036.001a kadā cid apy ahaṃ vīryāt paryaṭan pṛthivīm imām
GE09ram_03_u:2084: 3.036.003c svayaṃ gatvā daśarathaṃ narendram idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2085: 3.036.004a ayaṃ rakṣatu māṃ rāmaḥ parvakāle samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2086: 3.036.004c mārīcān me bhayaṃ ghoraṃ samutpannaṃ nareśvara
GE09ram_03_u:2087: 3.036.005a ity evam ukto dharmātmā rājā daśarathas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:2089: 3.036.006a ūna ṣoḍaśa varṣo 'yam akṛtāstraś ca rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2090: 3.036.006c kāmaṃ tu mama yat sainyaṃ mayā saha gamiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2092: 3.036.007a ity evam uktaḥ sa munī rājānaṃ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2093: 3.036.007c rāmān nānyad balaṃ loke paryāptaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2094: 3.036.008a bālo 'py eṣa mahātejāḥ samarthas tasya nigrahe
GE09ram_03_u:2095: 3.036.008c gamiṣye rāmam ādāya svasti te 'stu paraṃtapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2096: 3.036.009a ity evam uktvā sa munis tam ādāya nṛpātmajam
GE09ram_03_u:2098: 3.036.010a taṃ tadā daṇḍakāraṇye yajñam uddiśya dīkṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:2107: 3.036.014c māṃ tu dṛṣṭvā dhanuḥ sajyam asaṃbhrāntaś cakāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:2108: 3.036.015a avajānann ahaṃ mohād bālo 'yam iti rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:2110: 3.036.016a tena muktas tato bāṇaḥ śitaḥ śatrunibarhaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2114: 3.036.017e prāpya saṃjñāṃ cirāt tāta laṅkāṃ prati gataḥ purīm
GE09ram_03_u:2115: 3.036.018a evam asmi tadā muktaḥ sahāyās te nipātitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2117: 3.036.019a tan mayā vāryamāṇas tvaṃ yadi rāmeṇa vigraham
GE09ram_03_u:2118: 3.036.019c kariṣyasy āpadaṃ ghorāṃ kṣipraṃ prāpya naśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2122: 3.036.021c drakṣyasi tvaṃ purīṃ laṅkāṃ vinaṣṭāṃ maithilīkṛte
GE09ram_03_u:2126: 3.036.023c drakṣyasy abhihatān bhūmau tava doṣāt tu rākṣasān
GE09ram_03_u:2133: 3.036.027a mānaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca rājyaṃ ca jīvitaṃ ceṣṭam iātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2134: 3.036.027c yadīcchasi ciraṃ bhoktuṃ mā kṛthā rāma vipriyam
GE09ram_03_u:2139: 3.037.001a evam asmi tadā muktaḥ kathaṃ cit tena saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:2140: 3.037.001c idānīm api yad vṛttaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva yad uttaram
GE09ram_03_u:2141: 3.037.002a rākṣasābhyām ahaṃ dvābhyām anirviṇṇas tathā kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2148: 3.037.005c rudhirāṇi pibaṃs teṣāṃ tathā māṃsāni bhakṣayan
GE09ram_03_u:2152: 3.037.007c āsādayaṃ tadā rāmaṃ tāpasaṃ dharmam āśritam
GE09ram_03_u:2153: 3.037.008a vaidehīṃ ca mahābhāgāṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ ca mahāratham
GE09ram_03_u:2159: 3.037.011a tena muktās trayo bāṇāḥ śitāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2164: 3.037.013c samutkrāntas tato muktas tāv ubhau rākṣasau hatau
GE09ram_03_u:2165: 3.037.014a śareṇa mukto rāmasya kathaṃ cit prāpya jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:2170: 3.037.016c rāmabhūtam idaṃ sarvam araṇyaṃ pratibhāti me
GE09ram_03_u:2171: 3.037.017a rāmam eva hi paśyāmi rahite rākṣaseśvara
GE09ram_03_u:2174: 3.037.018c ratnāni ca rathāś caiva trāsaṃ saṃjanayanti me
GE09ram_03_u:2175: 3.037.019a ahaṃ tasya prabhāvajño na yuddhaṃ tena te kṣamam
GE09ram_03_u:2176: 3.037.019c raṇe rāmeṇa yudhyasva kṣamāṃ vā kuru rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:2177: 3.037.019e na te rāmakathā kāryā yadi māṃ draṣṭum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2182: 3.038.001a mārīcena tu tad vākyaṃ kṣamaṃ yuktaṃ ca rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2186: 3.038.003a yat kilaitad ayuktārthaṃ mārīca mayi kathyate
GE09ram_03_u:2187: 3.038.003c vākyaṃ niṣphalam atyarthaṃ bījam uptam ivoṣare
GE09ram_03_u:2188: 3.038.004a tvadvākyair na tu māṃ śakyaṃ bhettuṃ rāmasya saṃyuge
GE09ram_03_u:2190: 3.038.005a yas tyaktvā suhṛdo rājyaṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ tathā
GE09ram_03_u:2191: 3.038.005c strīvākyaṃ prākṛtaṃ śrutvā vanam ekapade gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2192: 3.038.006a avaśyaṃ tu mayā tasya saṃyuge kharaghātinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2193: 3.038.006c prāṇaiḥ priyatarā sītā hartavyā tava saṃnidhau
GE09ram_03_u:2194: 3.038.007a evaṃ me niścitā buddhir hṛdi mārīca vartate
GE09ram_03_u:2195: 3.038.007c na vyāvartayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2196: 3.038.008a doṣaṃ guṇaṃ vā saṃpṛṣṭas tvam evaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2197: 3.038.008c apāyaṃ vāpy upāyaṃ vā kāryasyāsya viniścane
GE09ram_03_u:2199: 3.038.009c udyatāñjalinā rājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2200: 3.038.010a vākyam apratikūlaṃ tu mṛdupūrvaṃ śubhaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:2202: 3.038.011a sāvamardaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ mārīca hitam ucyate
GE09ram_03_u:2205: 3.038.012c agner indrasya somasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:2206: 3.038.012e auṣṇyaṃ tathā vikramaṃ ca saumyaṃ daṇḍaṃ prasannatām
GE09ram_03_u:2207: 3.038.013a tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu mānyāḥ pūjyāś ca pārthivāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2208: 3.038.013c tvaṃ tu dharmam avijñāya kevalaṃ moham āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2210: 3.038.014c guṇadoṣau na pṛcchāmi kṣamaṃ cātmani rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:2211: 3.038.014e asmiṃs tu sa bhavān kṛtye sāhāryyaṃ kartum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2212: 3.038.015a sauvarṇas tvaṃ mṛgo bhūtvā citro rajatabindubhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2214: 3.038.016a tvāṃ tu māyā mṛgaṃ dṛṣṭvā kāñcanaṃ jātavismayā
GE09ram_03_u:2215: 3.038.016c ānayainam iti kṣipraṃ rāmaṃ vakṣyati maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:2216: 3.038.017a apakrānte ca kākutsthe lakṣmaṇe ca yathāsukham
GE09ram_03_u:2218: 3.038.018a evaṃ kṛtvā tv idaṃ kāryaṃ yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:2220: 3.038.019a gaccha saumya śivaṃ mārgaṃ kāryasyāsya vivṛddhaye
GE09ram_03_u:2221: 3.038.019c prāpya sītām ayuddhena vañcayitvā tu rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:2222: 3.038.019e laṅkāṃ prati gamiṣyāmi kṛtakāryaḥ saha tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:2223: 3.038.020a etat kāryam avaśyaṃ me balād api kariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2224: 3.038.020c rājño hi pratikūlastho na jātu sukham edhate
GE09ram_03_u:2226: mṛtyur dhruvo hy adya mayā virudhya
GE09ram_03_u:2228: yad atra pathyaṃ kuru tat tathā tvam
GE09ram_03_u:2233: 3.039.003a kas tvayā sukhinā rājan nābhinandati pāpakṛt
GE09ram_03_u:2238: 3.039.005c yas tvām icchati naśyantaṃ svakṛtena niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:2239: 3.039.006a vadhyāḥ khalu na hanyante sacivās tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2240: 3.039.006c ye tvām utpatham ārūḍhaṃ na nigṛhṇanti sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2241: 3.039.007a amātyaiḥ kāmavṛtto hi rājā kāpatham āśritaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2242: 3.039.007c nigrāhyaḥ sarvathā sadbhir na nigrāhyo nigṛhyase
GE09ram_03_u:2243: 3.039.008a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca yaśaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:2245: 3.039.009a viparyaye tu tat sarvaṃ vyarthaṃ bhavati rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2247: 3.039.010a rājamūlo hi dharmaś ca jayaś ca jayatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:2249: 3.039.011a rājyaṃ pālayituṃ śakyaṃ na tīkṣṇena niśācara
GE09ram_03_u:2251: 3.039.012a ye tīkṣṇamantrāḥ sacivā bhajyante saha tena vai
GE09ram_03_u:2256: 3.039.014c rakṣyamāṇā na vardhante meṣā gomāyunā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2258: 3.039.015c yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2259: 3.039.016a tad idaṃ kākatālīyaṃ ghoram āsāditaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:2260: 3.039.016c atra kiṃ śobhanaṃ yat tvaṃ sasainyo vinaśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2261: 3.039.017a māṃ nihatya tu rāmo 'sau nacirāt tvāṃ vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2262: 3.039.017c anena kṛtakṛtyo 'smi mriye yad ariṇā hataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2263: 3.039.018a darśanād eva rāmasya hataṃ mām upadhāraya
GE09ram_03_u:2264: 3.039.018c ātmānaṃ ca hataṃ viddhi hṛtvā sītāṃ sabāndhavam
GE09ram_03_u:2265: 3.039.019a ānayiṣyāmi cet sītām āśramāt sahito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:2266: 3.039.019c naiva tvam asi naivāhaṃ naiva laṅkā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2271: 3.040.001a evam uktvā tu paruṣaṃ mārīco rāvaṇo tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2275: 3.040.003a kiṃ tu kartuṃ mayā śakyam evaṃ tvayi durātmani
GE09ram_03_u:2276: 3.040.003c eṣa gacchāmy ahaṃ tāta svasti te 'stu niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2277: 3.040.004a prahṛṣṭas tv abhavat tena vacanena sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2279: 3.040.005a etac chauṇḍīryayuktaṃ te macchabdād iva bhāṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:2280: 3.040.005c idānīm asi mārīcaḥ pūrvam anyo niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2282: 3.040.006c mayā saha ratho yuktaḥ piśācavadanaiḥ kharaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2283: 3.040.007a tato rāvaṇamārīcau vimānam iva taṃ ratham
GE09ram_03_u:2285: 3.040.008a tathaiva tatra paśyantau pattanāni vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:2286: 3.040.008c girīṃś ca saritaḥ sarvā rāṣṭrāṇi nagarāṇi ca
GE09ram_03_u:2290: 3.040.010c haste gṛhītvā mārīcaṃ rāvaṇo vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2292: 3.040.011c kriyatāṃ tat sakhe śīghraṃ yadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2293: 3.040.012a sa rāvaṇavacaḥ śrutvā mārīco rākṣasas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:2303: 3.040.017a vanaṃ prajvalayan ramyaṃ rāmāśramapadaṃ ca tat
GE09ram_03_u:2304: 3.040.017c manoharaṃ darśanīyaṃ rūpaṃ kṛtvā sa rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2313: 3.040.022a punar gatvā nivṛttaś ca vicacāra mṛgottamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2315: 3.040.023a vikrīḍaṃś ca punar bhūmau punar eva niṣīdati
GE09ram_03_u:2320: 3.040.025c samudvīkṣya ca sarve taṃ mṛgā ye 'nye vanecarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2322: 3.040.026c rākṣasaḥ so 'pi tān vanyān mṛgān mṛgavadhe rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2324: 3.040.027c tasminn eva tataḥ kāle vaidehī śubhalocanā
GE09ram_03_u:2326: 3.040.028c karṇikārān aśokāṃś ca cūṭāṃś ca madirekṣaṇā
