GE09ram_03_u:2332: 3.040.031a sa ca tāṃ rāma dayitāṃ paśyan māyāmayo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2333: 3.040.031c vicacāra tatas tatra dīpayann iva tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:2336: 3.041.001a sā taṃ saṃprekṣya suśroṇī kusumāni vicinvatī
GE09ram_03_u:2339: 3.041.002c bhartāram api cākrandal lakṣmaṇaṃ caiva sāyudham
GE09ram_03_u:2341: 3.041.003c vīkṣamāṇau tu taṃ deśaṃ tadā dadṛśatur mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:2342: 3.041.004a śaṅkamānas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2343: 3.041.004c tam evainam ahaṃ manye mārīcaṃ rākṣasaṃ mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:2346: 3.041.006a asya māyāvido māyā mṛgarūpam idaṃ kṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:2348: 3.041.007a mṛgo hy evaṃvidho ratnavicitro nāsti rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2349: 3.041.007c jagatyāṃ jagatīnātha māyaiṣā hi na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2355: 3.041.010c mṛgāś caranti sahitāś camarāḥ sṛmarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:2356: 3.041.011a ṛkṣāḥ pṛṣatasaṃghāś ca vānarāḥ kinarās tathā
GE09ram_03_u:2358: 3.041.012a na cāsya sadṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo mṛgaḥ purā
GE09ram_03_u:2362: 3.041.014a aho rūpam aho lakṣmīḥ svarasaṃpac ca śobhanā
GE09ram_03_u:2364: 3.041.015a yadi grahaṇam abhyeti jīvann eva mṛgas tava
GE09ram_03_u:2370: 3.041.018a jīvan na yadi te 'bhyeti grahaṇaṃ mṛgasattamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2374: 3.041.020a kāmavṛttam idaṃ raudraṃ strīṇām asadṛśaṃ matam
GE09ram_03_u:2375: 3.041.020c vapuṣā tv asya sattvasya vismayo janito mama
GE09ram_03_u:2379: 3.041.022a evaṃ sītāvacaḥ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā ca mṛgam adbhutam
GE09ram_03_u:2380: 3.041.022c uvāca rāghavo hṛṣṭo bhrātaraṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2381: 3.041.023a paśya lakṣmaṇa vaidehyāḥ spṛhāṃ mṛgagatām imām
GE09ram_03_u:2382: 3.041.023c rūpaśreṣṭhatayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2384: 3.041.024c kutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ saumitre yo 'sya kaś cit samo mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2388: 3.041.026c jihvāṃ mukhān niḥsarantīṃ meghād iva śatahradām
GE09ram_03_u:2390: 3.041.027c kasya nāmānirūpyo 'sau na mano lobhayen mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2391: 3.041.028a kasya rūpam idaṃ dṛṣṭvā jāmbūnadamaya prabham
GE09ram_03_u:2392: 3.041.028c nānāratnamayaṃ divyaṃ na mano vismayaṃ vrajet
GE09ram_03_u:2393: 3.041.029a māṃsahetor api mṛgān vihārārthaṃ ca dhanvinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2397: 3.041.031a tat sāram akhilaṃ nṝṇāṃ dhanaṃ nicayavardhanam
GE09ram_03_u:2398: 3.041.031c manasā cintitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā śukrasya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2400: 3.041.032c tam artham arthaśāstrajñaḥ prāhur arthyāś ca lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2403: 3.041.034a na kādalī na priyakī na praveṇī na cāvikī
GE09ram_03_u:2404: 3.041.034c bhaved etasya sadṛśī sparśaneneti me matiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2405: 3.041.035a eṣa caiva mṛgaḥ śrīmān yaś ca divyo nabhaścaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2407: 3.041.036a yadi vāyaṃ tathā yan māṃ bhaved vadasi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2412: 3.041.038c nihatāḥ parameṣvāsās tasmād vadhyas tv ayaṃ mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2415: 3.041.040a sa kadā cic cirāl loke āsasāda mahāmunim
GE09ram_03_u:2416: 3.041.040c agastyaṃ tejasā yuktaṃ bhakṣyas tasya babhūva ha
GE09ram_03_u:2417: 3.041.041a samutthāne ca tad rūpaṃ kartukāmaṃ samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_03_u:2418: 3.041.041c utsmayitvā tu bhagavān vātāpim idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2420: 3.041.042c jīvaloke dvijaśreṣṭhās tasmād asi jarāṃ gataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2421: 3.041.043a evaṃ tan na bhaved rakṣo vātāpir iva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2423: 3.041.044a bhaved dhato 'yaṃ vātāpir agastyeneva mā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2424: 3.041.044c iha tvaṃ bhava saṃnaddho yantrito rakṣa maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:2425: 3.041.045a asyām āyattam asmākaṃ yat kṛtyaṃ raghunandana
GE09ram_03_u:2426: 3.041.045c aham enaṃ vadhiṣyāmi grahīṣyāmy atha vā mṛgam
GE09ram_03_u:2427: 3.041.046a yāvad gacchāmi saumitre mṛgam ānayituṃ drutam
GE09ram_03_u:2429: 3.041.047a tvacā pradhānayā hy eṣa mṛgo 'dya na bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2431: 3.041.048a yāvat pṛṣatam ekena sāyakena nihanmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:2432: 3.041.048c hatvaitac carma ādāya śīghram eṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2437: 3.042.001a tathā tu taṃ samādiśya bhrātaraṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2441: 3.042.003a taṃ vañcayāno rājendram āpatantaṃ nirīkṣya vai
GE09ram_03_u:2443: 3.042.004a baddhāsir dhanur ādāya pradudrāva yato mṛgaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2444: 3.042.004c taṃ sa paśyati rūpeṇa dyotamānam ivāgrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2446: 3.042.005c ativṛttam iṣoḥ pātāl lobhayānaṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_03_u:2448: 3.042.006c daśyamānam adṛśyaṃ ca navoddeśeṣu keṣu cit
GE09ram_03_u:2450: 3.042.007c muhūrtād eva dadṛśe muhur dūrāt prakāśate
GE09ram_03_u:2452: 3.042.008c āsīt kruddhas tu kākutstho vivaśas tena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2455: 3.042.010a dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahātejās taṃ hantuṃ kṛtaniścayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2456: 3.042.010c saṃdhāya sudṛḍhe cāpe vikṛṣya balavad balī
GE09ram_03_u:2457: 3.042.011a tam eva mṛgam uddiśya jvalantam iva pannagam
GE09ram_03_u:2463: 3.042.013e mriyamāṇas tu mārīco jahau tāṃ kṛtrimāṃ tanum
GE09ram_03_u:2464: 3.042.014a saṃprāptakālam ājñāya cakāra ca tataḥ svaram
GE09ram_03_u:2465: 3.042.014c sadṛśaṃ rāghavasyaiva hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_03_u:2467: 3.042.015c mṛgarūpaṃ tu tat tyaktvā rākṣasaṃ rūpam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2468: 3.042.015e cakre sa sumahākāyo mārīco jīvitaṃ tyajan
GE09ram_03_u:2471: 3.042.017a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau rākṣasaṃ ghoradarśanam
GE09ram_03_u:2472: 3.042.017c jagāma manasā sītāṃ lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ smaran
GE09ram_03_u:2473: 3.042.018a hā sīte lakṣmaṇety evam ākruśya tu mahāsvaram
GE09ram_03_u:2474: 3.042.018c mamāra rākṣasaḥ so 'yaṃ śrutvā sītā kathaṃ bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:2475: 3.042.019a lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābāhuḥ kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2477: 3.042.020a tatra rāmaṃ bhayaṃ tīvram āviveśa viṣādajam
GE09ram_03_u:2478: 3.042.020c rākṣasaṃ mṛgarūpaṃ taṃ hatvā śrutvā ca tat svaram
GE09ram_03_u:2479: 3.042.021a nihatya pṛṣataṃ cānyaṃ māṃsam ādāya rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2481: 3.043.001a ārtasvaraṃ tu taṃ bhartur vijñāya sadṛśaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:2482: 3.043.001c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ sītā gaccha jānīhi rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:2483: 3.043.002a na hi me jīvitaṃ sthāne hṛdayaṃ vāvatiṣṭhate
GE09ram_03_u:2484: 3.043.002c krośataḥ paramārtasya śrutaḥ śabdo mayā bhṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:2485: 3.043.003a ākrandamānaṃ tu vane bhrātaraṃ trātum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2486: 3.043.003c taṃ kṣipram abhidhāva tvaṃ bhrātaraṃ śaraṇaiṣiṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2487: 3.043.004a rakṣasāṃ vaśam āpannaṃ siṃhānām iva govṛṣam
GE09ram_03_u:2488: 3.043.004c na jagāma tathoktas tu bhrātur ājñāya śāsanam
GE09ram_03_u:2489: 3.043.005a tam uvāca tatas tatra kupitā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:2490: 3.043.005c saumitre mitrarūpeṇa bhrātus tvam asi śatruvat
GE09ram_03_u:2491: 3.043.006a yas tvam asyām avasthāyāṃ bhrātaraṃ nābhipadyase
GE09ram_03_u:2492: 3.043.006c icchasi tvaṃ vinaśyantaṃ rāmaṃ lakṣmaṇa matkṛte
GE09ram_03_u:2493: 3.043.007a vyasanaṃ te priyaṃ manye sneho bhrātari nāsti te
GE09ram_03_u:2494: 3.043.007c tena tiṣṭhasi visrabdhas tam apaśyan mahādyutim
GE09ram_03_u:2495: 3.043.008a kiṃ hi saṃśayam āpanne tasminn iha mayā bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:2496: 3.043.008c kartavyam iha tiṣṭhantyā yat pradhānas tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2498: 3.043.009c abravīl lakṣmaṇas trastāṃ sītāṃ mṛgavadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:2501: 3.043.011a dānaveṣu ca ghoreṣu na sa vidyeta śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:2503: 3.043.012a avadhyaḥ samare rāmo naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2504: 3.043.012c na tvām asmin vane hātum utsahe rāghavaṃ vinā
GE09ram_03_u:2505: 3.043.013a anivāryaṃ balaṃ tasya balair balavatām api
GE09ram_03_u:2506: 3.043.013c tribhir lokaiḥ samudyuktaiḥ seśvaraiḥ sāmarair api
GE09ram_03_u:2507: 3.043.014a hṛdayaṃ nirvṛtaṃ te 'stu saṃtāpas tyajyatām ayam
GE09ram_03_u:2508: 3.043.014c āgamiṣyati te bhartā śīghraṃ hatvā mṛgottamam
GE09ram_03_u:2509: 3.043.015a na sa tasya svaro vyaktaṃ na kaś cid api daivataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2512: 3.043.016c rāmeṇa tvaṃ varārohe na tvāṃ tyaktum ihotsahe
GE09ram_03_u:2513: 3.043.017a kṛtavairāś ca kalyāṇi vayam etair niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2520: 3.043.020c ahaṃ tava priyaṃ manye tenaitāni prabhāṣase
GE09ram_03_u:2521: 3.043.021a naitac citraṃ sapatneṣu pāpaṃ lakṣmaṇa yad bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:2523: 3.043.022a suduṣṭas tvaṃ vane rāmam ekam eko 'nugacchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2524: 3.043.022c mama hetoḥ praticchannaḥ prayukto bharatena vā
GE09ram_03_u:2527: 3.043.024a samakṣaṃ tava saumitre prāṇāṃs tyakṣye na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2528: 3.043.024c rāmaṃ vinā kṣaṇam api na hi jīvāmi bhūtale
GE09ram_03_u:2529: 3.043.025a ity uktaḥ paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ sītayā somaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2531: 3.043.026a uttaraṃ notsahe vaktuṃ daivataṃ bhavatī mama
GE09ram_03_u:2532: 3.043.026c vākyam apratirūpaṃ tu na citraṃ strīṣu maithili
GE09ram_03_u:2533: 3.043.027a svabhāvas tv eṣa nārīṇām eṣu lokeṣu dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:2536: 3.043.028c nyāyavādī yathā vākyam ukto 'haṃ paruṣaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:2537: 3.043.029a dhik tvām adya praṇaśya tvaṃ yan mām evaṃ viśaṅkase
GE09ram_03_u:2539: 3.043.030a gamiṣye yatra kākutsthaḥ svasti te 'stu varānane
GE09ram_03_u:2541: 3.043.031a nimittāni hi ghorāṇi yāni prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_03_u:2542: 3.043.031c api tvāṃ saha rāmeṇa paśyeyaṃ punar āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2547: 3.043.034a pibāmi vā viṣaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ pravekṣyāmi hutāśanam
GE09ram_03_u:2548: 3.043.034c na tv ahaṃ rāghavād anyaṃ padāpi puruṣaṃ spṛśe
GE09ram_03_u:2550: 3.043.035c pāṇibhyāṃ rudatī duḥkhād udaraṃ prajaghāna ha
GE09ram_03_u:2554: taṃ bhrātaraṃ kiṃ cid uvāca sītā
GE09ram_03_u:2559: 3.044.001a tayā paruṣam uktas tu kupito rāghavānujaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2560: 3.044.001c sa vikāṅkṣan bhṛśaṃ rāmaṃ pratasthe nacirād iva
GE09ram_03_u:2568: 3.044.005a tām apaśyat tato bālāṃ rājaputrīṃ yaśasvinīm
GE09ram_03_u:2571: 3.044.006c samīkṣya na prakampante na pravāti ca mārutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2572: 3.044.007a śīghrasrotāś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vīkṣantaṃ raktalocanam
GE09ram_03_u:2573: 3.044.007c stimitaṃ gantum ārebhe bhayād godāvarī nadī
GE09ram_03_u:2574: 3.044.008a rāmasya tv antaraṃ prepsur daśagrīvas tadantare
GE09ram_03_u:2578: 3.044.010a sa pāpo bhavyarūpeṇa tṛṇaiḥ kūpa ivāvṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2586: 3.044.014a tām uttamāṃ trilokānāṃ padmahīnām iva śriyam
GE09ram_03_u:2589: 3.044.015c kamalānāṃ śubhāṃ mālāṃ padminīva ca bibhratī
GE09ram_03_u:2590: 3.044.016a hrīḥ śrīḥ kīrtiḥ śubhā lakṣmīr apsarā vā śubhānane
GE09ram_03_u:2591: 3.044.016c bhūtir vā tvaṃ varārohe ratir vā svairacāriṇī
GE09ram_03_u:2592: 3.044.017a samāḥ śikhariṇaḥ snigdhāḥ pāṇḍurā daśanās tava
GE09ram_03_u:2599: 3.044.020c mano harasi me rāme nadīkūlam ivāmbhasā
GE09ram_03_u:2601: 3.044.021c naiva devī na gandharvī na yakṣī na ca kiṃnarī
GE09ram_03_u:2603: 3.044.022c iha vāsaś ca kāntāre cittam unmāthayanti me
GE09ram_03_u:2604: 3.044.023a sā pratikrāma bhadraṃ te na tvaṃ vastum ihārhasi
GE09ram_03_u:2608: 3.044.025a varaṃ mālyaṃ varaṃ pānaṃ varaṃ vastraṃ ca śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:2609: 3.044.025c bhartāraṃ ca varaṃ manye tvadyuktam asitekṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:2610: 3.044.026a kā tvaṃ bhavasi rudrāṇāṃ marutāṃ vā śucismite
GE09ram_03_u:2611: 3.044.026c vasūnāṃ vā varārohe devatā pratibhāsi me
GE09ram_03_u:2612: 3.044.027a neha gacchantī gandharvā na devā na ca kiṃnarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2613: 3.044.027c rākṣasānām ayaṃ vāsaḥ kathaṃ nu tvam ihāgatā
GE09ram_03_u:2615: 3.044.028c ṛkṣās tarakṣavaḥ kaṅkāḥ kathaṃ tebhyo na bibhyase
GE09ram_03_u:2617: 3.044.029c katham ekā mahāraṇye na bibheṣi vanānane
GE09ram_03_u:2618: 3.044.030a kāsi kasya kutaś ca tvaṃ kiṃnimittaṃ ca daṇḍakān
GE09ram_03_u:2621: 3.044.031c dvijātiveṣeṇa hi taṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_03_u:2624: 3.044.032c abravīt siddham ity eva tadā taṃ saumyadarśanam
GE09ram_03_u:2641: 3.045.001a rāvaṇena tu vaidehī tadā pṛṣṭā jihīrṣuṇā
GE09ram_03_u:2643: 3.045.002a brāhmaṇaś cātithiś caiṣa anukto hi śapeta mām
GE09ram_03_u:2644: 3.045.002c iti dhyātvā muhūrtaṃ tu sītā vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:2646: 3.045.003c sītā nāmnāsmi bhadraṃ te rāmabhāryā dvijottama
GE09ram_03_u:2649: 3.045.005a tataḥ saṃvatsarād ūrdhvaṃ samamanyata me patim
GE09ram_03_u:2652: 3.045.006c kaikeyī nāma bhartāraṃ mamāryā yācate varam
GE09ram_03_u:2653: 3.045.007a pratigṛhya tu kaikeyī śvaśuraṃ sukṛtena me
GE09ram_03_u:2656: 3.045.008a nādya bhokṣye na ca svapsye na pāsye 'haṃ kadā cana
GE09ram_03_u:2657: 3.045.008c eṣa me jīvitasyānto rāmo yady abhiṣicyate
GE09ram_03_u:2658: 3.045.009a iti bruvāṇāṃ kaikeyīṃ śvaśuro me sa mānadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2659: 3.045.009c ayācatārthair anvarthair na ca yācñāṃ cakāra sā
GE09ram_03_u:2661: 3.045.010c rāmeti prathito loke guṇavān satyavāk śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2663: 3.045.011a abhiṣekāya tu pituḥ samīpaṃ rāmam āgatam
GE09ram_03_u:2664: 3.045.011c kaikeyī mama bhartāram ity uvāca drutaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2665: 3.045.012a tava pitrā samājñaptaṃ mamedaṃ śṛṇu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:2667: 3.045.013a tvayā tu khalu vastavyaṃ nava varṣāṇi pañca ca
GE09ram_03_u:2669: 3.045.014a tathety uvāca tāṃ rāmaḥ kaikeyīm akutobhayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2670: 3.045.014c cakāra tadvacas tasyā mama bhartā dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2671: 3.045.015a dadyān na pratigṛhṇīyāt satyabrūyān na cānṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:2672: 3.045.015c etad brāhmaṇa rāmasya vrataṃ dhruvam anuttamam
GE09ram_03_u:2673: 3.045.016a tasya bhrātā tu vaimātro lakṣmaṇo nāma vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:2675: 3.045.017a sa bhrātā lakṣmaṇo nāma dharmacārī dṛḍhavrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2677: 3.045.018a te vayaṃ pracyutā rājyāt kaileyyās tu kṛte trayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2679: 3.045.019a samāśvasa muhūrtaṃ tu śakyaṃ vastum iha tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:2680: 3.045.019c āgamiṣyati me bhartā vanyam ādāya puṣkalam
GE09ram_03_u:2681: 3.045.020a sa tvaṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca kulam ācakṣva tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2682: 3.045.020c ekaś ca daṇḍakāraṇye kimarthaṃ carasi dvija
GE09ram_03_u:2686: 3.045.022c ahaṃ sa rāvaṇo nāma sīte rakṣogaṇeśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2690: 3.045.024c sarvāsām eva bhadraṃ te mamāgramahiṣī bhava
GE09ram_03_u:2691: 3.045.025a laṅkā nāma samudrasya madhye mama mahāpurī
GE09ram_03_u:2693: 3.045.026a tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ vaneṣu vicariṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2696: 3.045.027c sīte paricariṣyanti bhāryā bhavasi me yadi
GE09ram_03_u:2705: 3.045.032a tvaṃ punar jambukaḥ siṃhīṃ mām ihecchasi durlabhām
GE09ram_03_u:2706: 3.045.032c nāhaṃ śakyā tvayā spraṣṭum ādityasya prabhā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2707: 3.045.033a pādapān kāñcanān nūnaṃ bahūn paśyasi mandabhāk
GE09ram_03_u:2708: 3.045.033c rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ yas tvam icchasi rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2712: 3.045.035c kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ pītvā svastimān gantum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2713: 3.045.036a akṣisūcyā pramṛjasi jihvayā leḍhi ca kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:2714: 3.045.036c rāghavasya priyāṃ bhāryām adhigantuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2715: 3.045.037a avasajya śilāṃ kaṇṭhe samudraṃ tartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2716: 3.045.037c sūryā candramasau cobhau prāṇibhyāṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2717: 3.045.037e yo rāmasya priyāṃ bhāryāṃ pradharṣayitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2719: 3.045.038c kalyāṇa vṛttāṃ rāmasya yo bhāryāṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2721: 3.045.039c rāmasya sadṛśīṃ bhāryāṃ yo 'dhigantuṃ tvam icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2744: 3.045.045c kulaṃ balaṃ nāma ca karma cātmanaḥ;
GE09ram_03_u:2747: 3.046.001c lalāṭe bhrukuṭīṃ kṛtvā rāvaṇaḥ pratyuvāca ha
GE09ram_03_u:2749: 3.046.002c rāvaṇo nāma bhadraṃ te daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:2751: 3.046.003c vidravanti bhayād bhītā mṛtyor iva sadā prajāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2753: 3.046.004c dvandvam āsāditaḥ krodhād raṇe vikramya nirjitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2756: 3.046.006a yasya tat puṣpakaṃ nāma vimānaṃ kāmagaṃ śubham
GE09ram_03_u:2757: 3.046.006c vīryād āvarjitaṃ bhadre yena yāmi vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:2760: 3.046.008a yatra tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ tatra māruto vāti śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2761: 3.046.008c tīvrāṃśuḥ śiśirāṃśuś ca bhayāt saṃpadyate raviḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2763: 3.046.009c bhavanti yatra yatrāhaṃ tiṣṭhāmi ca carāmi ca
GE09ram_03_u:2764: 3.046.010a mama pāre samudrasya laṅkā nāma purī śubhā
GE09ram_03_u:2770: 3.046.013a tatra tvaṃ vasatī sīte rājaputri mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:2772: 3.046.014a bhuñjānā mānuṣān bhogān divyāṃś ca varavarṇini
GE09ram_03_u:2774: 3.046.015a sthāpayitvā priyaṃ putraṃ rājñā daśarathena yaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2775: 3.046.015c mandavīryaḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tataḥ prasthāpito vanam
GE09ram_03_u:2780: 3.046.018a pratyākhyāya hi māṃ bhīru paritāpaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2782: 3.046.019a evam uktā tu vaidehī kruddhā saṃraktalocanā
GE09ram_03_u:2785: 3.046.020c bhrātaraṃ vyapadiśya tvam aśubhaṃ kartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2787: 3.046.021c yeṣāṃ tvaṃ karkaśo rājā durbuddhir ajitendriyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2788: 3.046.022a apahṛtya śacīṃ bhāryāṃ śakyam indrasya jīvitum
GE09ram_03_u:2789: 3.046.022c na tu rāmasya bhāryāṃ mām apanīyāsti jīvitam
GE09ram_03_u:2795: 3.047.001c haste hastaṃ samāhatya cakāra sumahad vapuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2796: 3.047.002a sa maithilīṃ punar vākyaṃ babhāṣe ca tato bhṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:2798: 3.047.003a udvaheyaṃ bhujābhyāṃ tu medinīm ambare sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2799: 3.047.003c āpibeyaṃ samudraṃ ca mṛtyuṃ hanyāṃ raṇe sthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2800: 3.047.004a arkaṃ rundhyāṃ śarais tīkṣṇair vibhindyāṃ hi mahītalam
GE09ram_03_u:2801: 3.047.004c kāmarūpiṇam unmatte paśya māṃ kāmadaṃ patim
GE09ram_03_u:2804: 3.047.006a sadyaḥ saumyaṃ parityajya bhikṣurūpaṃ sa rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2812: 3.047.010a sa tām asitakeśāntāṃ bhāskarasya prabhām iva
GE09ram_03_u:2814: 3.047.011a triṣu lokeṣu vikhyātaṃ yadi bhartāram icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2815: 3.047.011c mām āśraya varārohe tavāhaṃ sadṛśaḥ patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2816: 3.047.012a māṃ bhajasva cirāya tvam ahaṃ ślāghyas tava priyaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2817: 3.047.012c naiva cāhaṃ kva cid bhadre kariṣye tava vipriyam
GE09ram_03_u:2818: 3.047.012e tyajyatāṃ mānuṣo bhāvo mayi bhāvaḥ praṇīyatām
GE09ram_03_u:2821: 3.047.014a yaḥ striyā vacanād rājyaṃ vihāya sasuhṛjjanam
GE09ram_03_u:2823: 3.047.015a ity uktvā maithilīṃ vākyaṃ priyārhāṃ priyavādinīm
GE09ram_03_u:2824: 3.047.015c jagrāha rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ budhaḥ khe rohiṇīm iva
GE09ram_03_u:2825: 3.047.016a vāmena sītāṃ padmākṣīṃ mūrdhajeṣu kareṇa saḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2829: 3.047.018a sa ca māyāmayo divyaḥ kharayuktaḥ kharasvanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2831: 3.047.019a tatas tāṃ paruṣair vākyair abhitarjya mahāsvanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2834: 3.047.020c rāmeti sītā duḥkhārtā rāmaṃ dūragataṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:2835: 3.047.021a tām akāmāṃ sa kāmārtaḥ pannagendravadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:2841: 3.047.024a jīvitaṃ sukham arthāṃś ca dharmahetoḥ parityajan
GE09ram_03_u:2842: 3.047.024c hriyamāṇām adharmeṇa māṃ rāghava na paśyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2844: 3.047.025c katham evaṃvidhaṃ pāpaṃ na tvaṃ śādhi hi rāvaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:2846: 3.047.026c kālo 'py aṅgī bhavaty atra sasyānām iva paktaye
GE09ram_03_u:2849: 3.047.028a hantedānīṃ sakāmā tu kaikeyī bāndhavaiḥ saha
GE09ram_03_u:2852: 3.047.029c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2854: 3.047.030c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2856: 3.047.031c kṣipraṃ rāmāya śaṃsadhvaṃ sītāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2857: 3.047.032a daivatāni ca yānty asmin vane vividhapādape
GE09ram_03_u:2858: 3.047.032c namaskaromy ahaṃ tebhyo bhartuḥ śaṃsata māṃ hṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:2859: 3.047.033a yāni kāni cid apy atra sattvāni nivasanty uta
GE09ram_03_u:2865: 3.047.036a rāmāya tu yathātattvaṃ jaṭāyo haraṇaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:2866: 3.047.036c lakṣmaṇāya ca tat sarvam ākhyātavyam aśeṣataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2867: 3.048.001a taṃ śabdam avasuptasya jaṭāyur atha śuśruve
GE09ram_03_u:2868: 3.048.001c niraikṣad rāvaṇaṃ kṣipraṃ vaidehīṃ ca dadarśa saḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2874: 3.048.004c lokānāṃ ca hite yukto rāmo daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2876: 3.048.005c sītā nāma varārohā yāṃ tvaṃ hartum ihecchasi
GE09ram_03_u:2877: 3.048.006a kathaṃ rājā sthito dharme paradārān parāmṛśet
GE09ram_03_u:2880: 3.048.007a na tat samācared dhīro yat paro 'sya vigarhayet
GE09ram_03_u:2882: 3.048.008a arthaṃ vā yadi vā kāmaṃ śiṣṭāḥ śāstreṣv anāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:2884: 3.048.009a rājā dharmaś ca kāmaś ca dravyāṇāṃ cottamo nidhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2885: 3.048.009c dharmaḥ śubhaṃ vā pāpaṃ vā rājamūlaṃ pravartate
GE09ram_03_u:2886: 3.048.010a pāpasvabhāvaś capalaḥ kathaṃ tvaṃ rakṣasāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:2888: 3.048.011a kāmasvabhāvo yo yasya na sa śakyaḥ pramārjitum
GE09ram_03_u:2889: 3.048.011c na hi duṣṭātmanām ārya mā vasaty ālaye ciram
GE09ram_03_u:2890: 3.048.012a viṣaye vā pure vā te yadā rāmo mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2894: 3.048.014a atra brūhi yathāsatyaṃ ko rāmasya vyatikramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2895: 3.048.014c yasya tvaṃ lokanāthasya hṛtvā bhāryāṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2896: 3.048.015a kṣipraṃ visṛja vaidehīṃ mā tvā ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:2897: 3.048.015c dahed dahana bhūtena vṛtram indrāśanir yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2899: 3.048.016c grīvāyāṃ pratimuktaṃ ca kālapāśaṃ na paśyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2900: 3.048.017a sa bhāraḥ saumya bhartavyo yo naraṃ nāvasādayet
GE09ram_03_u:2901: 3.048.017c tad annam upabhoktavyaṃ jīryate yad anāmayam
GE09ram_03_u:2902: 3.048.018a yat kṛtvā na bhaved dharmo na kīrtir na yaśo bhuvi
GE09ram_03_u:2903: 3.048.018c śarīrasya bhavet khedaḥ kas tat karma samācaret
GE09ram_03_u:2906: 3.048.020a vṛddho 'haṃ tvaṃ yuvā dhanvī sarathaḥ kavacī śarī
GE09ram_03_u:2907: 3.048.020c tathāpy ādāya vaidehīṃ kuśalī na gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2908: 3.048.021a na śaktas tvaṃ balād dhartuṃ vaidehīṃ mama paśyataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2910: 3.048.022a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2911: 3.048.022c śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathāpūrvaṃ kharas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:2913: 3.048.023c nacirāc cīravāsās tvāṃ rāmo yudhi vadhiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:2914: 3.048.024a kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ gatau dūraṃ nṛpātmajau
GE09ram_03_u:2915: 3.048.024c kṣipraṃ tvaṃ naśyase nīca tayor bhīto na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2916: 3.048.025a na hi me jīvamānasya nayiṣyasi śubhām imām
GE09ram_03_u:2918: 3.048.026a avaśyaṃ tu mayā kāryaṃ priyaṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2920: 3.048.027a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha daśagrīva muhūrtaṃ paśya rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2922: 3.048.027e vṛntād iva phalaṃ tvāṃ tu pātayeyaṃ rathottamāt
GE09ram_03_u:2927: 3.049.003a sa saṃprahāras tumulas tayos tasmin mahāvane
GE09ram_03_u:2939: 3.049.009a sa tair bāṇair mahāvīryaḥ pūrṇamuktair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2940: 3.049.009c bibheda niśitais tīkṣṇair gṛdhraṃ ghoraiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2948: 3.049.013c tāṃś cāsya javasaṃpannāñ jaghāna samare balī
GE09ram_03_u:2955: 3.049.016c sādhu sādhv iti bhūtāni gṛdhrarājam apūjayan
GE09ram_03_u:2956: 3.049.017a pariśrāntaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā jarayā pakṣiyūthapam
GE09ram_03_u:2957: 3.049.017c utpapāta punar hṛṣṭo maithilīṃ gṛhya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2961: 3.049.019c alpabuddhe harasy enāṃ vadhāya khalu rakṣasām
GE09ram_03_u:2965: 3.049.021c śīghram eva vinaśyanti yathā tvaṃ vinaśiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:2966: 3.049.022a baddhas tvaṃ kālapāśena kva gatas tasya mokṣyase
GE09ram_03_u:2967: 3.049.022c vadhāya baḍiśaṃ gṛhya sāmiṣaṃ jalajo yathā
GE09ram_03_u:2968: 3.049.023a na hi jātu durādharṣau kākutsthau tava rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2970: 3.049.024a yathā tvayā kṛtaṃ karma bhīruṇā lokagarhitam
GE09ram_03_u:2972: 3.049.025a yudhyasva yadi śūro 'si muhūrtaṃ tiṣṭha rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:2973: 3.049.025c śayiṣyase hato bhūmau yathā bhrātā kharas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:2976: 3.049.027a pāpānubandho vai yasya karmaṇaḥ ko nu tat pumān
GE09ram_03_u:2978: 3.049.028a evam uktvā śubhaṃ vākyaṃ jaṭāyus tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2980: 3.049.029a taṃ gṛhītvā nakhais tīkṣṇair virarāda samantataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2982: 3.049.030a virarāda nakhair asya tuṇḍaṃ pṛṣṭhe samarpayan
GE09ram_03_u:2984: 3.049.031a sa tathā gṛdhrarājena kliśyamāno muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:2990: 3.049.034a tataḥ kruddho daśakrīvaḥ sītām utsṛjya vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:2993: 3.049.035c rākṣasānāṃ ca mukhyasya pakṣiṇāṃ pravarasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:2995: 3.049.036c pakṣau pādau ca pārśvau ca khaḍgam uddhṛtya so 'cchinat
GE09ram_03_u:2998: 3.049.038a taṃ dṛṣṭvā patitaṃ bhūmau kṣatajārdraṃ jaṭāyuṣam
GE09ram_03_u:3010: 3.050.002a sā tu tārādhipamukhī rāvaṇena samīkṣya tam
GE09ram_03_u:3014: 3.050.004a na nūnaṃ rāma jānāsi mahad vyasanam ātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3016: 3.050.005a trāhi mām adya kākutstha lakṣmaṇeti varāṅganā
GE09ram_03_u:3020: 3.050.007a tāṃ latām iva veṣṭantīm āliṅgantīṃ mahādrumān
GE09ram_03_u:3022: 3.050.008a krośantīṃ rāma rāmeti rāmeṇa rahitāṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:3026: 3.050.010a dṛṣṭvā sītāṃ parāmṛṣṭāṃ dīnāṃ divyena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:3027: 3.050.010c kṛtaṃ kāryam iti śrīmān vyājahāra pitāmahaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3028: 3.050.011a prahṛṣṭā vyathitāś cāsan sarve te paramarṣayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3030: 3.050.012a sa tu tāṃ rāma rāmeti rudantīṃ lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_03_u:3033: 3.050.013c rarāja rājaputrī tu vidyut saudāmanī yathā
GE09ram_03_u:3034: 3.050.014a uddhūtena ca vastreṇa tasyāḥ pītena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3040: 3.050.017a tasyās tad vimalaṃ vaktram ākāśe rāvaṇāṅkagam
GE09ram_03_u:3041: 3.050.017c na rarāja vinā rāmaṃ vinālam iva paṅkajam
GE09ram_03_u:3042: 3.050.018a babhūva jaladaṃ nīlaṃ bhittvā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3048: 3.050.020c śuśubhe na vinā rāmaṃ divā candra ivoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3050: 3.050.021c śuśubhe kāñcanī kāñcī nīlaṃ maṇim ivāśritā
GE09ram_03_u:3054: 3.050.023c babhūva vimalo nīlaḥ saghoṣa iva toyadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3070: 3.050.031c vaidehyā nipatan bhāti gaṅgeva gaganāc cyutā
GE09ram_03_u:3072: 3.050.032c mā bhair iti vidhūtāgrā vyājahrur iva pādapāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3074: 3.050.033c sakhīm iva gatotsāhāṃ śocantīva sma maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:3079: 3.050.036a hriyamāṇāṃ tu vaidehīṃ dṛṣṭvā dīno divākaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3081: 3.050.037a nāsti dharmaḥ kutaḥ satyaṃ nārjavaṃ nānṛśaṃsatā
GE09ram_03_u:3082: 3.050.037c yatra rāmasya vaidehīṃ bhāryāṃ harati rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3087: 3.050.040a vikrośantīṃ dṛḍhaṃ sītāṃ dṛṣṭvā duḥkhaṃ tathā gatām
GE09ram_03_u:3088: 3.050.040c tāṃ tu lakṣmaṇa rāmeti krośantīṃ madhurasvarām
GE09ram_03_u:3096: 3.051.001a kham utpatantaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā maithilī janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:3101: 3.051.003c jñātvā virahitāṃ yo māṃ corayitvā palāyase
GE09ram_03_u:3102: 3.051.004a tvayaiva nūnaṃ duṣṭātman bhīruṇā hartum icchatā
GE09ram_03_u:3104: 3.051.004e yo hi mām udyatas trātuṃ so 'py ayaṃ vinipātitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3105: 3.051.005a paramaṃ khalu te vīryaṃ dṛśyate rākṣasādhama
GE09ram_03_u:3106: 3.051.005c viśrāvya nāmadheyaṃ hi yuddhe nāsti jitā tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:3107: 3.051.006a īdṛśaṃ garhitaṃ karma kathaṃ kṛtvā na lajjase
GE09ram_03_u:3108: 3.051.006c striyāś ca haraṇaṃ nīca rahite ca parasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:3111: 3.051.008a dhik te śauryaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca yat tvayā kathitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:3112: 3.051.008c kulākrośakaraṃ loke dhik te cāritram īdṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:3113: 3.051.009a kiṃ śakyaṃ kartum evaṃ hi yaj javenaiva dhāvasi
GE09ram_03_u:3114: 3.051.009c muhūrtam api tiṣṭhasva na jīvan pratiyāsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:3115: 3.051.010a na hi cakṣuḥpathaṃ prāpya tayoḥ pārthivaputrayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3116: 3.051.010c sasainyo 'pi samartaḥs tvaṃ muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_03_u:3117: 3.051.011a na tvaṃ tayoḥ śarasparśaṃ soḍhuṃ śaktaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:3119: 3.051.012a sādhu kṛtvātmanaḥ pathyaṃ sādhu māṃ muñca rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3120: 3.051.012c matpradharṣaṇaruṣṭo hi bhrātrā saha patir mama
GE09ram_03_u:3121: 3.051.012e vidhāsyati vināśāya tvaṃ māṃ yadi na muñcasi
GE09ram_03_u:3122: 3.051.013a yena tvaṃ vyavasāyena balān māṃ hartum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:3123: 3.051.013c vyavasāyaḥ sa te nīca bhaviṣyati nirarthakaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3124: 3.051.014a na hy ahaṃ tam apaśyantī bhartāraṃ vibudhopamam
GE09ram_03_u:3126: 3.051.015a na nūnaṃ cātmanaḥ śreyaḥ pathyaṃ vā samavekṣase
GE09ram_03_u:3128: 3.051.016a mumūrṣūṇāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ yat pathyaṃ tan na rocate
GE09ram_03_u:3130: 3.051.017a yathā cāsmin bhayasthāne na bibheṣe daśānana
GE09ram_03_u:3131: 3.051.017c vyaktaṃ hiraṇmayān hi tvaṃ saṃpaśyasi mahīruhān
GE09ram_03_u:3135: 3.051.019c drakṣyase śālmalīṃ tīkṣṇām āyasaiḥ kaṇṭakaiś citām
GE09ram_03_u:3136: 3.051.020a na hi tvam īdṛśaṃ kṛtvā tasyālīkaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3137: 3.051.020c dhārituṃ śakṣyasi ciraṃ viṣaṃ pītveva nirghṛṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3139: 3.051.021c kva gato lapsyase śarma bhartur mama mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3142: 3.051.023a sa kathaṃ rāghavo vīraḥ sarvāstrakuśalo balī
GE09ram_03_u:3143: 3.051.023c na tvāṃ hanyāc charais tīkṣṇair iṣṭabhāryāpahāriṇam
GE09ram_03_u:3144: 3.051.024a etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ vaidehī rāvaṇāṅkagā
GE09ram_03_u:3150: 3.052.001a hriyamāṇā tu vaidehī kaṃ cin nātham apaśyatī
GE09ram_03_u:3154: 3.052.002e mumoca yadi rāmāya śaṃseyur iti maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:3155: 3.052.003a vastram utsṛjya tan madhye vinikṣiptaṃ sabhūṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:3156: 3.052.003c saṃbhramāt tu daśagrīvas tat karma na ca buddhivān
GE09ram_03_u:3157: 3.052.004a piṅgākṣās tāṃ viśālākṣīṃ netrair animiṣair iva
GE09ram_03_u:3159: 3.052.005a sa ca pampām atikramya laṅkām abhimukhaḥ purīm
GE09ram_03_u:3161: 3.052.006a tāṃ jahāra susaṃhṛṣṭo rāvaṇo mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3163: 3.052.007a vanāni saritaḥ śailān sarāṃsi ca vihāyasā
GE09ram_03_u:3164: 3.052.007c sa kṣipraṃ samatīyāya śaraś cāpād iva cyutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3170: 3.052.010c etad anto daśagrīva iti siddhās tadābruvan
GE09ram_03_u:3171: 3.052.011a sa tu sītāṃ viveṣṭantīm aṅkenādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3172: 3.052.011c praviveśa purīṃ laṅkāṃ rūpiṇīṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3176: 3.052.013c nidadhe rāvaṇaḥ sītāṃ mayo māyām ivāsurīm
GE09ram_03_u:3178: 3.052.014c yathā naināṃ pumān strī vā sītāṃ paśyaty asaṃmataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3180: 3.052.015c yad yad icchet tad evāsyā deyaṃ macchandato yathā
GE09ram_03_u:3181: 3.052.016a yā ca vakṣyati vaidehīṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ cid apriyam
GE09ram_03_u:3182: 3.052.016c ajñānād yadi vā jñānān na tasyā jīvitaṃ priyam
GE09ram_03_u:3183: 3.052.017a tathoktvā rākṣasīs tās tu rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE09ram_03_u:3184: 3.052.017c niṣkramyāntaḥpurāt tasmāt kiṃ kṛtyam iti cintayan
GE09ram_03_u:3186: 3.052.018a sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahāvīryo varadānena mohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3191: 3.052.020c pauruṣaṃ balam āśritya trāsam utsṛjya dūrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3192: 3.052.021a balaṃ hi sumahad yan me janasthāne niveśitam
GE09ram_03_u:3195: 3.052.022c vairaṃ ca sumahaj jātaṃ rāmaṃ prati sudāruṇam
GE09ram_03_u:3196: 3.052.023a niryātayitum icchāmi tac ca vairam ahaṃ ripoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3197: 3.052.023c na hi lapsyāmy ahaṃ nidrām ahatvā saṃyuge ripum
GE09ram_03_u:3198: 3.052.024a taṃ tv idānīm ahaṃ hatvā kharadūṣaṇaghātinam
GE09ram_03_u:3200: 3.052.025a janasthāne vasadbhis tu bhavadbhī rāmam āśritā
GE09ram_03_u:3202: 3.052.026a apramādāc ca gantavyaṃ sarvair eva niśācaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3203: 3.052.026c kartavyaś ca sadā yatno rāghavasya vadhaṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:3205: 3.052.027c ataś cāsmiñ janasthāne mayā yūyaṃ niyojitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3217: 3.053.002c praviveśa gṛhaṃ ramyaṃ sītāṃ draṣṭum abhitvaran
GE09ram_03_u:3218: 3.053.003a sa praviśya tu tadveśma rāvaṇo rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3224: 3.053.006a tāṃ tu śokavaśāṃ dīnām avaśāṃ rākṣasādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3225: 3.053.006c sa balād darśayām āsa gṛhaṃ devagṛhopamam
GE09ram_03_u:3228: 3.053.008a kāñcanais tāpanīyaiś ca sphāṭikai rājatais tathā
GE09ram_03_u:3231: 3.053.009c sopānaṃ kāñcanaṃ citram āruroha tayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:3238: 3.053.013a darśayitvā tu vaidehīṃ kṛtsnaṃ tad bhavanottamam
GE09ram_03_u:3241: 3.053.014c varjayitvā jarā vṛddhān bālāṃś ca rajanīcarān
GE09ram_03_u:3242: 3.053.015a teṣāṃ prabhur ahaṃ sīte sarveṣāṃ bhīmakarmaṇām
GE09ram_03_u:3244: 3.053.016a yad idaṃ rājyatantraṃ me tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_03_u:3245: 3.053.016c jīvitaṃ ca viśālākṣi tvaṃ me prāṇair garīyasī
GE09ram_03_u:3247: 3.053.017c tāsāṃ tvam īśvarī sīte mama bhāryā bhava priye
GE09ram_03_u:3248: 3.053.018a sādhu kiṃ te 'nyayā buddhyā rocayasva vaco mama
GE09ram_03_u:3251: 3.053.019c neyaṃ dharṣayituṃ śakyā sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3252: 3.053.020a na deveṣu na yakṣeṣu na gandharveṣu narṣiṣu
GE09ram_03_u:3253: 3.053.020c ahaṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo me vīryasamo bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:3256: 3.053.022a bhajasva sīte mām eva bhartāhaṃ sadṛśas tava
GE09ram_03_u:3257: 3.053.022c yauvanaṃ hy adhruvaṃ bhīru ramasveha mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:3258: 3.053.023a darśane mā kṛthā buddhiṃ rāghavasya varānane
GE09ram_03_u:3259: 3.053.023c kāsya śaktir ihāgantum api sīte manorathaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3260: 3.053.024a na śakyo vāyur ākāśe pāśair baddhaṃ mahājavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3261: 3.053.024c dīpyamānasya vāpy agner grahītuṃ vimalāṃ śikhām
GE09ram_03_u:3262: 3.053.025a trayāṇām api lokānāṃ na taṃ paśyāmi śobhane
GE09ram_03_u:3264: 3.053.026a laṅkāyāṃ sumahad rājyam idaṃ tvam anupālaya
GE09ram_03_u:3266: 3.053.027a duṣkṛtaṃ yat purā karma vanavāsena tad gatam
GE09ram_03_u:3267: 3.053.027c yaś ca te sukṛto dharmas tasyeha phalam āpnuhi
GE09ram_03_u:3269: 3.053.028c bhūṣaṇāni ca mukhyāni tāni seva mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:3270: 3.053.029a puṣpakaṃ nāma suśroṇi bhrātur vaiśravaṇasya me
GE09ram_03_u:3271: 3.053.029c vimānaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ ca tad vimānaṃ manojavam
GE09ram_03_u:3272: 3.053.030a tatra sīte mayā sārdhaṃ viharasva yathāsukham
GE09ram_03_u:3274: 3.053.031a śokārtaṃ tu varārohe na bhrājati varānane
GE09ram_03_u:3275: 3.053.031c alaṃ vrīḍena vaidehi dharmalopa kṛtena te
GE09ram_03_u:3277: 3.053.032c etau pādau mayā snigdhau śirobhiḥ paripīḍitau
GE09ram_03_u:3278: 3.053.033a prasādaṃ kuru me kṣipraṃ vaśyo dāso 'ham asmi te
GE09ram_03_u:3279: 3.053.033c nemāḥ śūnyā mayā vācaḥ śuṣyamāṇena bhāṣitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3280: 3.053.034a na cāpi rāvaṇaḥ kāṃ cin mūrdhnā strīṃ praṇameta ha
GE09ram_03_u:3283: 3.054.001a sā tathoktā tu vaidehī nirbhayā śokakarṣitā
GE09ram_03_u:3286: 3.054.002c satyasandhaḥ parijñāto yasya putraḥ sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3287: 3.054.003a rāmo nāma sa dharmātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3288: 3.054.003c dīrghabāhur viśālākṣo daivataṃ sa patir mama
GE09ram_03_u:3290: 3.054.004c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā yas te prāṇāṃ hariṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:3291: 3.054.005a pratyakṣaṃ yady ahaṃ tasya tvayā syāṃ dharṣitā balāt
GE09ram_03_u:3292: 3.054.005c śayitā tvaṃ hataḥ saṃkhye janasthāne yathā kharaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3293: 3.054.006a ya ete rākṣasāḥ proktā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3294: 3.054.006c rāghave nirviṣāḥ sarve suparṇe pannagā yathā
GE09ram_03_u:3297: 3.054.008a asurair vā surair vā tvaṃ yady avadho 'si rāvaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3298: 3.054.008c utpādya sumahad vairaṃ jīvaṃs tasya na mokṣyase
GE09ram_03_u:3301: 3.054.010a yadi paśyet sa rāmas tvāṃ roṣadīptena cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:3302: 3.054.010c rakṣas tvam adya nirdagdho gaccheḥ sadyaḥ parābhavam
GE09ram_03_u:3303: 3.054.011a yaś candraṃ nabhaso bhūmau pātayen nāśayeta vā
GE09ram_03_u:3304: 3.054.011c sāgaraṃ śoṣayed vāpi sa sītāṃ mocayed iha
GE09ram_03_u:3307: 3.054.013a na te pāpam idaṃ karma sukhodarkaṃ bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:3308: 3.054.013c yāhaṃ nītā vinā bhāvaṃ patipārśvāt tvayā vanāt
GE09ram_03_u:3309: 3.054.014a sa hi daivatasaṃyukto mama bhartā mahādyutiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3310: 3.054.014c nirbhayo vīryam āśritya śūnye vasati daṇḍake
GE09ram_03_u:3311: 3.054.015a sa te darpaṃ balaṃ vīryam utsekaṃ ca tathāvidham
GE09ram_03_u:3314: 3.054.016c tadā kārye pramādyanti narāḥ kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3315: 3.054.017a māṃ pradhṛṣya sa te kālaḥ prāpto 'yaṃ rakṣasādhama
GE09ram_03_u:3317: 3.054.018a na śakyā yajñamadhyasthā vediḥ srugbhāṇḍa maṇḍitā
GE09ram_03_u:3319: 3.054.019a idaṃ śarīraṃ niḥsaṃjñaṃ bandha vā ghātayasva vā
GE09ram_03_u:3320: 3.054.019c nedaṃ śarīraṃ rakṣyaṃ me jīvitaṃ vāpi rākṣasa
GE09ram_03_u:3321: 3.054.019e na hi śakṣyāmy upakrośaṃ pṛthivyāṃ dātum ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3322: 3.054.020a evam uktvā tu vaidehī kroddhāt suparuṣaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3323: 3.054.020c rāvaṇaṃ maithilī tatra punar novāca kiṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:3326: 3.054.022a śṛṇu maithili madvākyaṃ māsān dvādaśa bhāmini
GE09ram_03_u:3328: 3.054.022e tatas tvāṃ prātarāśārthaṃ sūdāś chetsyanti leśaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3329: 3.054.023a ity uktvā paruṣaṃ vākyaṃ rāvaṇaḥ śatrurāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3330: 3.054.023c rākṣasīś ca tataḥ kruddha idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3331: 3.054.024a śīghram evaṃ hi rākṣasyo vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3333: 3.054.025a vacanād eva tās tasya vikṛtā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3335: 3.054.026a sa tāḥ provāca rājā tu rāvaṇo ghoradarśanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3339: 3.054.028a tatraināṃ tarjanair ghoraiḥ punaḥ sāntvaiś ca maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:3340: 3.054.028c ānayadhvaṃ vaśaṃ sarvā vanyāṃ gajavadhūm iva
GE09ram_03_u:3346: 3.054.031c rākṣasī vaśam āpannā vyāghrīṇāṃ hariṇī yathā
GE09ram_03_u:3347: 3.054.032a na vindate tatra tu śarma maithilī;
GE09ram_03_u:3352: 3.055.001c nihatya rāmo mārīcaṃ tūrṇaṃ pathi nyavartata
GE09ram_03_u:3355: 3.055.003a sa tasya svaram ājñāya dāruṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:3357: 3.055.004a aśubhaṃ bata manye 'haṃ gomāyur vāśyate yathā
GE09ram_03_u:3358: 3.055.004c svasti syād api vaidehyā rākṣasair bhakṣaṇaṃ vinā
GE09ram_03_u:3359: 3.055.005a mārīcena tu vijñāya svaram ālakṣya māmakam
GE09ram_03_u:3361: 3.055.006a sa saumitriḥ svaraṃ śrutvā tāṃ ca hitvātha maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:3363: 3.055.007a rākṣasaiḥ sahitair nūnaṃ sītāyā īpsito vadhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3364: 3.055.007c kāñcanaś ca mṛgo bhūtvā vyapanīyāśramāt tu mām
GE09ram_03_u:3365: 3.055.008a dūraṃ nītvā tu mārīco rākṣaso 'bhūc charāhataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3366: 3.055.008c hā lakṣmaṇa hato 'smīti yad vākyaṃ vyajahāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:3367: 3.055.009a api svasti bhaved dvābhyāṃ rahitābhyāṃ mayā vane
GE09ram_03_u:3369: 3.055.009e nimittāni ca ghorāṇi dṛśyante 'dya bahūni ca
GE09ram_03_u:3370: 3.055.010a ity evaṃ cintayan rāmaḥ śrutvā gomāyuniḥsvanam
GE09ram_03_u:3374: 3.055.011c savyaṃ kṛtvā mahātmānaṃ ghorāṃś ca sasṛjuḥ svarān
GE09ram_03_u:3379: 3.055.014a saṃjagarhe 'tha taṃ bhrātā jeṣṭho lakṣmaṇam āgatam
GE09ram_03_u:3381: 3.055.015a gṛhītvā ca karaṃ savyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ raghunandanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3383: 3.055.016a aho lakṣmaṇa garhyaṃ te kṛtaṃ yat tvaṃ vihāya tām
GE09ram_03_u:3384: 3.055.016c sītām ihāgataḥ saumya kaccit svasti bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:3385: 3.055.017a na me 'sti saṃśayo vīra sarvathā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:3387: 3.055.018a aśubhāny eva bhūyiṣṭhaṃ yathā prādurbhavanti me
GE09ram_03_u:3396: hṛtā mṛtā vā pathi vartate vā
GE09ram_03_u:3397: 3.056.001a sa dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇaṃ dīnaṃ śūnye daśarathātmajaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3399: 3.056.002a prasthitaṃ daṇḍakāraṇyaṃ yā mām anujagāma ha
GE09ram_03_u:3400: 3.056.002c kva sā lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yāṃ hitvā tvam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3402: 3.056.003c kva sā duḥkhasahāyā me vaidehī tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:3403: 3.056.004a yāṃ vinā notsahe vīra muhūrtam api jīvitum
GE09ram_03_u:3404: 3.056.004c kva sā prāṇasahāyā me sītā surasutopamā
GE09ram_03_u:3405: 3.056.005a patitvam amarāṇāṃ vā pṛthivyāś cāpi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3407: 3.056.006a kaccij jīvati vaidehī prāṇaiḥ priyatarā mama
GE09ram_03_u:3408: 3.056.006c kaccit pravrājanaṃ saumya na me mithyā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:3409: 3.056.007a sītānimittaṃ saumitre mṛte mayi gate tvayi
GE09ram_03_u:3410: 3.056.007c kaccit sakāmā sukhitā kaikeyī sā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:3412: 3.056.008c upasthāsyati kausalyā kaccin saumya na kaikayīm
GE09ram_03_u:3413: 3.056.009a yadi jīvati vaidehī gamiṣyāmy āśramaṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3414: 3.056.009c suvṛttā yadi vṛttā sā prāṇāṃs tyakṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3417: 3.056.011a brūhi lakṣmaṇa vaidehī yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_03_u:3418: 3.056.011c tvayi pramatte rakṣobhir bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
GE09ram_03_u:3419: 3.056.012a sukumārī ca bālā ca nityaṃ cāduḥkhadarśinī
GE09ram_03_u:3422: 3.056.013c vadatā lakṣmaṇety uccais tavāpi janitaṃ bhayam
GE09ram_03_u:3423: 3.056.014a śrutaś ca śaṅke vaidehyā sa svaraḥ sadṛśo mama
GE09ram_03_u:3424: 3.056.014c trastayā preṣitas tvaṃ ca draṣṭuṃ māṃ śīghram āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3425: 3.056.015a sarvathā tu kṛtaṃ kaṣṭaṃ sītām utsṛjatā vane
GE09ram_03_u:3428: 3.056.016c taiḥ sītā nihatā ghorair bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3430: 3.056.017c kiṃ tv idānīṃ kariṣyāmi śaṅke prāptavyam īdṛśam
GE09ram_03_u:3431: 3.056.018a iti sītāṃ varārohāṃ cintayann eva rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3443: 3.057.002a tam uvāca kimarthaṃ tvam āgato 'pāsya maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:3444: 3.057.002c yadā sā tava viśvāsād vane viharitā mayā
GE09ram_03_u:3445: 3.057.003a dṛṣṭvaivābhyāgataṃ tvāṃ me maithilīṃ tyajya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3446: 3.057.003c śaṅkamānaṃ mahat pāpaṃ yat satyaṃ vyathitaṃ manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3447: 3.057.004a sphurate nayanaṃ savyaṃ bāhuś ca hṛdayaṃ ca me
GE09ram_03_u:3448: 3.057.004c dṛṣṭvā lakṣmaṇa dūre tvāṃ sītāvirahitaṃ pathi
GE09ram_03_u:3449: 3.057.005a evam uktas tu saumitrir lakṣmaṇaḥ śubhalakṣaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3451: 3.057.006a na svayaṃ kāmakāreṇa tāṃ tyaktvāham ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3453: 3.057.007a āryeṇeva parikruṣṭaṃ hā sīte lakṣmaṇeti ca
GE09ram_03_u:3454: 3.057.007c paritrāhīti yad vākyaṃ maithilyās tac chrutiṃ gatam
GE09ram_03_u:3455: 3.057.008a sā tam ārtasvaraṃ śrutvā tava snehena maithilī
GE09ram_03_u:3456: 3.057.008c gaccha gaccheti mām āha rudantī bhayavihvalā
GE09ram_03_u:3459: 3.057.010a na tat paśyāmy ahaṃ rakṣo yad asya bhayam āvahet
GE09ram_03_u:3460: 3.057.010c nirvṛtā bhava nāsty etat kenāpy evam udāhṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:3461: 3.057.011a vigarhitaṃ ca nīcaṃ ca katham āryo 'bhidhāsyati
GE09ram_03_u:3462: 3.057.011c trāhīti vacanaṃ sīte yas trāyet tridaśān api
GE09ram_03_u:3463: 3.057.012a kiṃnimittaṃ tu kenāpi bhrātur ālambya me svaram
GE09ram_03_u:3464: 3.057.012c visvaraṃ vyāhṛtaṃ vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇa trāhi mām iti
GE09ram_03_u:3466: 3.057.013a alaṃ vaiklavyam ālambya svasthā bhava nirutsukā
GE09ram_03_u:3467: 3.057.013c na cāsti triṣu lokeṣu pumān yo rāghavaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:3468: 3.057.013e jāto vā jāyamāno vā saṃyuge yaḥ parājayet
GE09ram_03_u:3470: 3.057.014c uvācāśrūṇi muñcantī dāruṇaṃ mām idaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3471: 3.057.015a bhāvo mayi tavātyarthaṃ pāpa eva niveśitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3472: 3.057.015c vinaṣṭe bhrātari prāpte na ca tvaṃ mām avāpsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:3477: 3.057.018a evam ukto hi vaidehyā saṃrabdho raktalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3480: 3.057.019c abravīd duṣkṛtaṃ saumya tāṃ vinā yat tvam āgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3481: 3.057.020a jānann api samarthaṃ māṃ rakṣasāṃ vinivāraṇe
GE09ram_03_u:3483: 3.057.021a na hi te parituṣyāmi tyaktvā yad yāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:3484: 3.057.021c kruddhāyāḥ paruṣaṃ śrutvā striyā yat tvam ihāgataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3485: 3.057.022a sarvathā tv apanītaṃ te sītayā yat pracoditaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3486: 3.057.022c krodhasya vaśam āgamya nākaroḥ śāsanaṃ mama
GE09ram_03_u:3487: 3.057.023a asau hi rākṣasaḥ śete śareṇābhihato mayā
GE09ram_03_u:3498: 3.058.001c prāsphurac cāskhalad rāmo vepathuś cāsya jāyate
GE09ram_03_u:3500: 3.058.002c api kṣemaṃ tu sītāyā iti vai vyājahāra ha
GE09ram_03_u:3505: 3.058.005a dadarśa parṇaśālāṃ ca rahitāṃ sītayā tadā
GE09ram_03_u:3506: 3.058.005c śriyā virahitāṃ dhvastāṃ hemante padminīm iva
GE09ram_03_u:3511: 3.058.008a hṛtā mṛtā vā naṣṭā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:3512: 3.058.008c nilīnāpy atha vā bhīrur atha vā vanam āśritā
GE09ram_03_u:3513: 3.058.009a gatā vicetuṃ puṣpāṇi phalāny api ca vā punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3514: 3.058.009c atha vā padminīṃ yātā jalārthaṃ vā nadīṃ gatā
GE09ram_03_u:3515: 3.058.010a yatnān mṛgayamāṇas tu nāsasāda vane priyām
GE09ram_03_u:3517: 3.058.011a vṛkṣād vṛkṣaṃ pradhāvan sa girīṃś cāpi nadīn nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:3519: 3.058.012a asti kaccit tvayā dṛṣṭā sā kadambapriyā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:3520: 3.058.012c kadamba yadi jānīṣe śaṃsa sītāṃ śubhānanām
GE09ram_03_u:3522: 3.058.013c śaṃsasva yadi vā dṛṣṭā bilva bilvopamastanī
GE09ram_03_u:3523: 3.058.014a atha vārjuna śaṃsa tvaṃ priyāṃ tām arjunapriyām
GE09ram_03_u:3524: 3.058.014c janakasya sutā bhīrur yadi jīvati vā na vā
GE09ram_03_u:3525: 3.058.015a kakubhaḥ kakubhoruṃ tāṃ vyaktaṃ jānāti maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:3527: 3.058.016a bhramarair upagītaś ca yathā drumavaro hy ayam
GE09ram_03_u:3532: 3.058.018c kathayasva varārohāṃ kāruṣyaṃ yadi te mayi
GE09ram_03_u:3534: 3.058.019c priyāṃ yadi vijānīṣe niḥśaṅkaṃ kathayasva me
GE09ram_03_u:3535: 3.058.020a atha vā mṛgaśāvākṣīṃ mṛga jānāsi maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:3537: 3.058.021a gaja sā gajanāsorur yadi dṛṣṭā tvayā bhavet
GE09ram_03_u:3538: 3.058.021c tāṃ manye viditāṃ tubhyam ākhyāhi varavāraṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3539: 3.058.022a śārdūla yadi sā dṛṣṭā priyā candranibhānanā
GE09ram_03_u:3540: 3.058.022c maithilī mama visrabdhaḥ kathayasva na te bhayam
GE09ram_03_u:3541: 3.058.023a kiṃ dhāvasi priye nūnaṃ dṛṣṭāsi kamalekṣaṇe
GE09ram_03_u:3542: 3.058.023c vṛkṣeṇācchādya cātmānaṃ kiṃ māṃ na pratibhāṣase
GE09ram_03_u:3543: 3.058.024a tiṣṭha tiṣṭha varārohe na te 'sti karuṇā mayi
GE09ram_03_u:3546: 3.058.025c dhāvanty api mayā dṛṣṭā tiṣṭha yady asti sauhṛdam
GE09ram_03_u:3547: 3.058.026a naiva sā nūnam atha vā hiṃsitā cāruhāsinī
GE09ram_03_u:3548: 3.058.026c kṛcchraṃ prāptaṃ hi māṃ nūnaṃ yathopekṣitum arhati
GE09ram_03_u:3549: 3.058.027a vyaktaṃ sā bhakṣitā bālā rākṣasaiḥ piśitāśanaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3551: 3.058.028a nūnaṃ tac chubhadantauṣṭhaṃ mukhaṃ niṣprabhatāṃ gatam
GE09ram_03_u:3552: 3.058.028c sā hi campakavarṇābhā grīvā graiveya śobhitā
GE09ram_03_u:3553: 3.058.029a komalā vilapantyās tu kāntāyā bhakṣitā śubhā
GE09ram_03_u:3556: 3.058.030c mayā virahitā bālā rakṣasāṃ bhakṣaṇāya vai
GE09ram_03_u:3558: 3.058.031c hā lakṣmaṇa mahābāho paśyasi tvaṃ priyāṃ kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:3559: 3.058.032a hā priye kva gatā bhadre hā sīteti punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3560: 3.058.032c ity evaṃ vilapan rāmaḥ paridhāvan vanād vanam
GE09ram_03_u:3561: 3.058.033a kva cid udbhramate vegāt kva cid vibhramate balāt
GE09ram_03_u:3562: 3.058.033c kva cin matta ivābhāti kāntān veṣaṇatatparaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3563: 3.058.034a sa vanāni nadīḥ śailān giriprasravaṇāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:3565: 3.058.035a tathā sa gatvā vipulaṃ mahad vanaṃ;
GE09ram_03_u:3566: parītya sarvaṃ tv atha maithilīṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:3570: 3.059.001c rahitāṃ parṇaśālāṃ ca vidhvastāny āsanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:3571: 3.059.002a adṛṣṭvā tatra vaidehīṃ saṃnirīkṣya ca sarvaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3572: 3.059.002c uvāca rāmaḥ prākruśya pragṛhya rucirau bhujau
GE09ram_03_u:3573: 3.059.003a kva nu lakṣmaṇa vaidehī kaṃ vā deśam ito gatā
GE09ram_03_u:3574: 3.059.003c kenāhṛtā vā saumitre bhakṣitā kena vā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:3575: 3.059.004a vṛṣkeṇāvārya yadi māṃ sīte hasitum icchasi
GE09ram_03_u:3576: 3.059.004c alaṃ te hasitenādya māṃ bhajasva suduḥkhitam
GE09ram_03_u:3577: 3.059.005a yaiḥ saha krīḍase sīte viśvastair mṛgapotakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3578: 3.059.005c ete hīnās tvayā saumye dhyāyanty asrāvilekṣaṇāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3580: 3.059.006c paraloke mahārājo nūnaṃ drakṣyati me pitā
GE09ram_03_u:3581: 3.059.007a kathaṃ pratijñāṃ saṃśrutya mayā tvam abhiyojitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3583: 3.059.008a kāmavṛttam anāryaṃ māṃ mṛṣāvādinam eva ca
GE09ram_03_u:3584: 3.059.008c dhik tvām iti pare loke vyaktaṃ vakṣyati me pitā
GE09ram_03_u:3586: 3.059.009c mām ihotsṛjya karuṇaṃ kīrtir naram ivānṛjum
GE09ram_03_u:3587: 3.059.010a kva gacchasi varārohe mām utsṛjya sumadhyame
GE09ram_03_u:3588: 3.059.010c tvayā virahitaś cāhaṃ mokṣye jīvitam ātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3592: 3.059.012c paṅkam āsādya vipulaṃ sīdantam iva kuñjaram
GE09ram_03_u:3594: 3.059.013a mā viṣādaṃ mahābāho kuru yatnaṃ mayā saha
GE09ram_03_u:3595: 3.059.013c idaṃ ca hi vanaṃ śūra bahukandaraśobhitam
GE09ram_03_u:3597: 3.059.014c sā vanaṃ vā praviṣṭā syān nalinīṃ vā supuṣpitām
GE09ram_03_u:3599: 3.059.015c vitrāsayitukāmā vā līnā syāt kānane kva cit
GE09ram_03_u:3600: 3.059.015e jijñāsamānā vaidehī tvāṃ māṃ ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:3601: 3.059.016a tasyā hy anveṣaṇe śrīman kṣipram eva yatāvahe
GE09ram_03_u:3602: 3.059.016c vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicinuvo yatra sā janakātmajā
GE09ram_03_u:3603: 3.059.016e manyase yadi kākutstha mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3604: 3.059.017a evam uktas tu sauhārdāl lakṣmaṇena samāhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3606: 3.059.017e tau vanāni girīṃś caiva saritaś ca sarāṃsi ca
GE09ram_03_u:3608: 3.059.018c tasya śailasya sānūni guhāś ca śikharāṇi ca
GE09ram_03_u:3610: 3.059.019c vicitya sarvataḥ śailaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3611: 3.059.020a neha paśyāmi saumitre vaidehīṃ parvate śubhe
GE09ram_03_u:3615: 3.059.022a yathā viṣṇur mahābāhur baliṃ baddhvā mahīm imām
GE09ram_03_u:3616: 3.059.022c evam uktas tu vīreṇa lakṣmaṇena sa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3620: 3.059.024c na hi paśyāmi vaidehīṃ prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasīm
GE09ram_03_u:3625: 3.059.027a bahuśaḥ sa tu niḥśvasya rāmo rājīvalocanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3627: 3.059.028a taṃ sāntvayām āsa tato lakṣmaṇaḥ priyabāndhavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3630: 3.059.029c apaśyaṃs tāṃ priyāṃ sītāṃ prākrośat sa punaḥ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3631: 3.060.001a sa dīno dīnayā vācā lakṣmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3632: 3.060.001c śīghraṃ lakṣmaṇa jānīhi gatvā godāvarīṃ nadīm
GE09ram_03_u:3633: 3.060.001e api godāvarīṃ sītā padmāny ānayituṃ gatā
GE09ram_03_u:3634: 3.060.002a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa lakṣmaṇaḥ punar eva hi
GE09ram_03_u:3636: 3.060.003a tāṃ lakṣmaṇas tīrthavatīṃ vicitvā rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3637: 3.060.003c naināṃ paśyāmi tīrtheṣu krośato na śṛṇoti me
GE09ram_03_u:3638: 3.060.004a kaṃ nu sā deśam āpannā vaidehī kleśanāśinī
GE09ram_03_u:3639: 3.060.004c na hi taṃ vedmi vai rāma yatra sā tanumadhyamā
GE09ram_03_u:3640: 3.060.005a lakṣmaṇasya vacaḥ śrutvā dīnaḥ saṃtāpa mohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3642: 3.060.006a sa tām upasthito rāmaḥ kva sītety evam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3644: 3.060.007c na tāṃ śaśaṃsū rāmāya tathā godāvarī nadī
GE09ram_03_u:3645: 3.060.008a tataḥ pracoditā bhūtaiḥ śaṃsāsmai tāṃ priyām iti
GE09ram_03_u:3646: 3.060.008c na ca sābhyavadat sītāṃ pṛṣṭā rāmeṇa śocitā
GE09ram_03_u:3647: 3.060.009a rāvaṇasya ca tad rūpaṃ karmāṇi ca durātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3648: 3.060.009c dhyātvā bhayāt tu vaidehīṃ sā nadī na śaśaṃsa tām
GE09ram_03_u:3649: 3.060.010a nirāśas tu tayā nadyā sītāyā darśane kṛtaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3651: 3.060.011a kiṃ nu lakṣmaṇa vakṣyāmi sametya janakaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3652: 3.060.011c mātaraṃ caiva vaidehyā vinā tām aham apriyam
GE09ram_03_u:3653: 3.060.012a yā me rājyavihīnasya vane vanyena jīvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3654: 3.060.012c sarvaṃ vyapanayac chokaṃ vaidehī kva nu sā gatā
GE09ram_03_u:3656: 3.060.013c manye dīrghā bhaviṣyanti rātrayo mama jāgrataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3658: 3.060.014c sarvāṇy anucariṣyāmi yadi sītā hi dṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:3659: 3.060.015a evaṃ saṃbhāṣamāṇau tāv anyonyaṃ bhrātarāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:3661: 3.060.016a tāṃ puṣpavṛṣṭiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmo mahītale
GE09ram_03_u:3662: 3.060.016c uvāca lakṣmaṇaṃ vīro duḥkhito duḥkhitaṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3666: 3.060.018c kruddho 'bravīd giriṃ tatra siṃhaḥ kṣudramṛgaṃ yathā
GE09ram_03_u:3667: 3.060.019a tāṃ hemavarṇāṃ hemābhāṃ sītāṃ darśaya parvata
GE09ram_03_u:3668: 3.060.019c yāvat sānūni sarvāṇi na te vidhvaṃsayāmy aham
GE09ram_03_u:3671: 3.060.021a imāṃ vā saritaṃ cādya śoṣayiṣyāmi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3672: 3.060.021c yadi nākhyāti me sītām adya candranibhānanām
GE09ram_03_u:3673: 3.060.022a evaṃ sa ruṣito rāmo didhakṣann iva cakṣuṣā
GE09ram_03_u:3674: 3.060.022c dadarśa bhūmau niṣkrāntaṃ rākṣasasya padaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:3675: 3.060.023a sa samīkṣya parikrāntaṃ sītāyā rākṣasasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:3678: 3.060.024c bhūṣaṇānāṃ hi saumitre mālyāni vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:3682: 3.060.026c bhittvā bhittvā vibhaktā vā bhakṣitā vā bhaviṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:3684: 3.060.027c babhūva yuddhaṃ saumitre ghoraṃ rākṣasayor iha
GE09ram_03_u:3686: 3.060.028c dharaṇyāṃ patitaṃ saumya kasya bhagnaṃ mahad dhanuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3688: 3.060.029c viśīrṇaṃ patitaṃ bhūmau kavacaṃ kasya kāñcanam
GE09ram_03_u:3690: 3.060.030c bhagnadaṇḍam idaṃ kasya bhūmau saumya nipātitam
GE09ram_03_u:3692: 3.060.031c bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ kasya vā nihatā raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:3694: 3.060.032c apaviddhaś ca bhagnaś ca kasya sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3699: 3.060.035a hṛtā mṛtā vā sītā hi bhakṣitā vā tapasvinī
GE09ram_03_u:3700: 3.060.035c na dharmas trāyate sītāṃ hriyamāṇāṃ mahāvane
GE09ram_03_u:3701: 3.060.036a bhakṣitāyāṃ hi vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3702: 3.060.036c ke hi loke priyaṃ kartuṃ śaktāḥ saumya mameśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3706: 3.060.038c nirvīrya iti manyante nūnaṃ māṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3707: 3.060.039a māṃ prāpya hi guṇo doṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ paśya lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3710: 3.060.040a naiva yakṣā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3711: 3.060.040c kiṃnarā vā manuṣyā vā sukhaṃ prāpsyanti lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3718: 3.060.044a na tāṃ kuśalinīṃ sītāṃ pradāsyanti mameśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3719: 3.060.044c asmin muhūrte saumitre mama drakṣyanti vikramam
GE09ram_03_u:3728: 3.060.049a naiva devā na daiteyā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3732: 3.060.050e nirmaryādān imāṃl lokān kariṣyāmy adya sāyakaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3733: 3.060.051a yathā jarā yathā mṛtyur yathākālo yathāvidhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3742: 3.061.002a vīkṣamāṇaṃ dhanuḥ sajyaṃ niḥśvasantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3743: 3.061.002c hantukāmaṃ paśuṃ rudraṃ kruddhaṃ dakṣakratau yathā
GE09ram_03_u:3744: 3.061.003a adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāmaṃ sa lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3746: 3.061.004a purā bhūtvā mṛdur dāntaḥ sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3747: 3.061.004c na krodhavaśam āpannaḥ prakṛtiṃ hātum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:3748: 3.061.005a candre lakṣṇīḥ prabhā sūrye gatir vāyau bhuvi kṣamā
GE09ram_03_u:3749: 3.061.005c etac ca niyataṃ sarvaṃ tvayi cānuttamaṃ yaśaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3750: 3.061.006a na tu jānāmi kasyāyaṃ bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3751: 3.061.006c kena vā kasya vā hetoḥ sāyudhaḥ saparicchadaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3754: 3.061.008a ekasya tu vimardo 'yaṃ na dvayor vadatāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:3755: 3.061.008c na hi vṛttaṃ hi paśyāmi balasya mahataḥ padam
GE09ram_03_u:3756: 3.061.009a naikasya tu kṛte lokān vināśayitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:3758: 3.061.010a sadā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śaraṇyaḥ paramā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3759: 3.061.010c ko nu dārapraṇāśaṃ te sādhu manyeta rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:3761: 3.061.011c nālaṃ te vipriyaṃ kartuṃ dīkṣitasyeva sādhavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3762: 3.061.012a yena rājan hṛtā sītā tam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:3764: 3.061.013a samudraṃ ca viceṣyāmaḥ parvatāṃś ca vanāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:3765: 3.061.013c guhāś ca vividhā ghorā nalinīḥ pārvatīś ca ha
GE09ram_03_u:3768: 3.061.015a na cet sāmnā pradāsyanti patnīṃ te tridaśeśvarāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3776: 3.062.002a tataḥ saumitrir āśvāsya muhūrtād iva lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3778: 3.062.003a mahatā tapasā rāma mahatā cāpi karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:3780: 3.062.004a tava caiva guṇair baddhas tvadviyogān mahīpatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3781: 3.062.004c rājā devatvam āpanno bharatasya yathā śrutam
GE09ram_03_u:3782: 3.062.005a yadi duḥkham idaṃ prāptaṃ kākutstha na sahiṣyase
GE09ram_03_u:3783: 3.062.005c prākṛtaś cālpasattvaś ca itaraḥ kaḥ sahiṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:3784: 3.062.006a duḥkhito hi bhavāṃl lokāṃs tejasā yadi dhakṣyate
GE09ram_03_u:3785: 3.062.006c ārtāḥ prajā naravyāghra kva nu yāsyanti nirvṛtim
GE09ram_03_u:3787: 3.062.007c gataḥ śakreṇa sālokyam anayas taṃ samaspṛśat
GE09ram_03_u:3788: 3.062.008a maharṣayo vasiṣṭhas tu yaḥ pitur naḥ purohitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3789: 3.062.008c ahnā putraśataṃ jajñe tathaivāsya punar hatam
GE09ram_03_u:3790: 3.062.009a yā ceyaṃ jagato mātā devī lokanamaskṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:3791: 3.062.009c asyāś ca calanaṃ bhūmer dṛśyate satyasaṃśrava
GE09ram_03_u:3792: 3.062.010a yau cemau jagatāṃ netre yatra sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
GE09ram_03_u:3794: 3.062.011a sumahānty api bhūtāni devāś ca puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:3797: 3.062.012c śrūyete naraśārdūla na tvaṃ vyathitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:3798: 3.062.013a naṣṭāyām api vaidehyāṃ hṛtāyām api cānagha
GE09ram_03_u:3799: 3.062.013c śocituṃ nārhase vīra yathānyaḥ prākṛtas tathā
GE09ram_03_u:3800: 3.062.014a tvadvidhā hi na śocanti satataṃ satyadarśinaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3805: 3.062.016c nāntareṇa kriyāṃ teṣāṃ phalam iṣṭaṃ pravartate
GE09ram_03_u:3806: 3.062.017a mām eva hi purā vīra tvam eva bahuṣo 'nvaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3807: 3.062.017c anuśiṣyād dhi ko nu tvām api sākṣād bṛhaspatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3808: 3.062.018a buddhiś ca te mahāprājña devair api duranvayā
GE09ram_03_u:3810: 3.062.019a divyaṃ ca mānuṣaṃ caivam ātmanaś ca parākramam
GE09ram_03_u:3813: 3.062.020c tam eva tu ripuṃ pāpaṃ vijñāyoddhartum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:3817: 3.063.002c avaṣṭabhya dhanuś citraṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3818: 3.063.003a kiṃ kariṣyāvahe vatsa kva vā gacchāva lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:3820: 3.063.004a taṃ tathā paritāpārtaṃ lakṣmaṇo rāmam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3821: 3.063.004c idam eva janasthānaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:3826: 3.063.007a tāni yukto mayā sārdhaṃ tvam anveṣitum arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:3829: 3.063.008c ity uktas tad vanaṃ sarvaṃ vicacāra salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3830: 3.063.009a kruddho rāmaḥ śaraṃ ghoraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:3833: 3.063.010c taṃ dṛṣṭvā giriśṛṅgābhaṃ rāmo lakṣmaṇam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3834: 3.063.010e anena sītā vaidehī bhakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3835: 3.063.011a gṛdhrarūpam idaṃ vyaktaṃ rakṣo bhramati kānanam
GE09ram_03_u:3837: 3.063.011e enaṃ vadhiṣye dīptāgrair ghorair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3838: 3.063.012a ity uktvābhyapatad gṛdhraṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi kṣuram
GE09ram_03_u:3839: 3.063.012c kruddho rāmaḥ samudrāntāṃ cālayann iva medinīm
GE09ram_03_u:3840: 3.063.013a taṃ dīnadīnayā vācā saphenaṃ rudhiraṃ vaman
GE09ram_03_u:3843: 3.063.014c sā devī mama ca prāṇā rāvaṇenobhayaṃ hṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:3844: 3.063.015a tvayā virahitā devī lakṣmaṇena ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:3846: 3.063.016a sītām abhyavapan no 'haṃ rāvaṇaś ca raṇe mayā
GE09ram_03_u:3848: 3.063.017a etad asya dhanur bhagnam etad asya śarāvaram
GE09ram_03_u:3849: 3.063.017c ayam asya raṇe rāma bhagnaḥ sāṃgrāmiko rathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3850: 3.063.018a pariśrāntasya me pakṣau chittvā khaḍgena rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3852: 3.063.018e rakṣasā nihataṃ pūrvma na māṃ hantuṃ tvam arhasi
GE09ram_03_u:3853: 3.063.019a rāmas tasya tu vijñāya sītāsaktāṃ priyāṃ kathām
GE09ram_03_u:3855: 3.063.020a ekam ekāyane durge niḥśvasantaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE09ram_03_u:3856: 3.063.020c samīkṣya duḥkhito rāmaḥ saumitrim idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3857: 3.063.021a rājyād bhraṃśo vane vāsaḥ sītā naṣṭā hato dvijaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3859: 3.063.022a saṃpūrṇam api ced adya pratareyaṃ mahodadhim
GE09ram_03_u:3860: 3.063.022c so 'pi nūnaṃ mamālakṣmyā viśuṣyet saritāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3865: 3.063.025a ity evam uktvā bahuśo rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3871: 3.064.001a rāmaḥ prekṣya tu taṃ gṛdhraṃ bhuvi raudreṇa pātitam
GE09ram_03_u:3874: 3.064.002c rākṣasena hataḥ saṃkhye prāṇāṃs tyajati dustyajān
GE09ram_03_u:3875: 3.064.003a ayam asya śarīre 'smin prāṇo lakṣmaṇa vidyate
GE09ram_03_u:3877: 3.064.004a jaṭāyo yadi śaknoṣi vākyaṃ vyāharituṃ punaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3878: 3.064.004c sītām ākhyāhi bhadraṃ te vadham ākhyāhi cātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3879: 3.064.005a kiṃnimitto 'harat sītāṃ rāvaṇas tasya kiṃ mayā
GE09ram_03_u:3880: 3.064.005c aparāddhaṃ tu yaṃ dṛṣṭvā rāvaṇena hṛtā priyā
GE09ram_03_u:3881: 3.064.006a kathaṃ tac candrasaṃkāśaṃ mukham āsīn manoharam
GE09ram_03_u:3882: 3.064.006c sītayā kāni coktāni tasmin kāle dvijottama
GE09ram_03_u:3883: 3.064.007a kathaṃvīryaḥ kathaṃrūpaḥ kiṃkarmā sa ca rākṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3884: 3.064.007c kva cāsya bhavanaṃ tāta brūhi me paripṛcchataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3889: 3.064.010a pariśrāntasya me tāta pakṣau chittvā niśācaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3890: 3.064.010c sītām ādāya vaidehīṃ prayāto dakṣiṇā mukhaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3891: 3.064.011a uparudhyanti me prāṇā dṛṣṭir bhramati rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:3893: 3.064.012a yena yāti muhūrtena sītām ādāya rāvaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3895: 3.064.013a vindo nāma muhūrto 'sau sa ca kākutstha nābudhat
GE09ram_03_u:3896: 3.064.013c jhaṣavad baḍiśaṃ gṛhya kṣipram eva vinaśyati
GE09ram_03_u:3897: 3.064.014a na ca tvayā vyathā kāryā janakasya sutāṃ prati
GE09ram_03_u:3898: 3.064.014c vaidehyā raṃsyase kṣipraṃ hatvā taṃ rākṣasaṃ raṇe
GE09ram_03_u:3901: 3.064.016a putro viśravasaḥ sākṣād bhrātā vaiśravaṇasya ca
GE09ram_03_u:3902: 3.064.016c ity uktvā durlabhān prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3904: 3.064.017c tyaktvā śarīraṃ gṛdhrasya jagmuḥ prāṇā vihāyasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:3905: 3.064.018a sa nikṣipya śiro bhūmau prasārya caraṇau tadā
GE09ram_03_u:3906: 3.064.018c vikṣipya ca śarīraṃ svaṃ papāta dharaṇītale
GE09ram_03_u:3907: 3.064.019a taṃ gṛdhraṃ prekṣya tāmrākṣaṃ gatāsum acalopamam
GE09ram_03_u:3908: 3.064.019c rāmaḥ subahubhir duḥkhair dīnaḥ saumitrim abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:3909: 3.064.020a bahūni rakṣasāṃ vāse varṣāṇi vasatā sukham
GE09ram_03_u:3912: 3.064.021c so 'yam adya hataḥ śete kālo hi duratikramaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3913: 3.064.022a paśya lakṣmaṇa gṛdhro 'yam upakārī hataś ca me
GE09ram_03_u:3914: 3.064.022c sītām abhyavapan no vai rāvaṇena balīyasā
GE09ram_03_u:3916: 3.064.023c mama hetor ayaṃ prāṇān mumoca patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3919: 3.064.025a sītāharaṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ na me saumya tathāgatam
GE09ram_03_u:3920: 3.064.025c yathā vināśo gṛdhrasya matkṛte ca paraṃtapa
GE09ram_03_u:3921: 3.064.026a rājā daśarathaḥ śrīmān yathā mama mayā yaśāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3922: 3.064.026c pūjanīyaś ca mānyaś ca tathāyaṃ patageśvaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3926: 3.064.028c imaṃ dhakṣyāmi saumitre hataṃ raudreṇa rakṣasā
GE09ram_03_u:3927: 3.064.029a yā gatir yajñaśīlānām āhitāgneś ca yā gatiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3928: 3.064.029c aparāvartināṃ yā ca yā ca bhūmipradāyinām
GE09ram_03_u:3929: 3.064.030a mayā tvaṃ samanujñāto gaccha lokān anuttamān
GE09ram_03_u:3930: 3.064.030c gṛdhrarāja mahāsattva saṃskṛtaś ca mayā vraja
GE09ram_03_u:3931: 3.064.031a evam uktvā citāṃ dīptām āropya patageśvaram
GE09ram_03_u:3932: 3.064.031c dadāha rāmo dharmātmā svabandhum iva duḥkhitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3933: 3.064.032a rāmo 'tha sahasaumitrir vanaṃ yātvā sa vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:3934: 3.064.032c sthūlān hatvā mahārohīn anu tastāra taṃ dvijam
GE09ram_03_u:3937: 3.064.034a yat tat pretasya martyasya kathayanti dvijātayaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3938: 3.064.034c tat svargagamanaṃ tasya kṣipraṃ rāmo jajāpa ha
GE09ram_03_u:3940: 3.064.035c udakaṃ cakratus tasmai gṛdhrarājāya tāv ubhau
GE09ram_03_u:3945: 3.065.001a kṛtvaivam udakaṃ tasmai prasthitau rāghavau tadā
GE09ram_03_u:3946: 3.065.001c avekṣantau vane sītāṃ paścimāṃ jagmatur diśam
GE09ram_03_u:3949: 3.065.003a gulmair vṛkṣaiś ca bahubhir latābhiś ca praveṣṭitam
GE09ram_03_u:3951: 3.065.004a vyatikramya tu vegena gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
GE09ram_03_u:3953: 3.065.005a tataḥ paraṃ janasthānāt trikrośaṃ gamya rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:3957: 3.065.007a didṛkṣamāṇau vaidehīṃ tad vanaṃ tau vicikyatuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3959: 3.065.008a lakṣmaṇas tu mahātejāḥ sattvavāñ śīlavāñ śuciḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3961: 3.065.009a spandate me dṛḍhaṃ bāhur udvignam iva me manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3963: 3.065.010a tasmāt sajjībhavārya tvaṃ kuruṣva vacanaṃ hitam
GE09ram_03_u:3964: 3.065.010c mamaiva hi nimittāni sadyaḥ śaṃsanti saṃbhramam
GE09ram_03_u:3966: 3.065.011c āvayor vijayaṃ yuddhe śaṃsann iva vinardati
GE09ram_03_u:3967: 3.065.012a tayor anveṣator evaṃ sarvaṃ tad vanam ojasā
GE09ram_03_u:3968: 3.065.012c saṃjajñe vipulaḥ śabdaḥ prabhañjann iva tad vanam
GE09ram_03_u:3970: 3.065.013c vanasya tasya śabdo 'bhūd divam āpūrayann iva
GE09ram_03_u:3971: 3.065.014a taṃ śabdaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu rāmaḥ kakṣe sahānujaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3973: 3.065.015a āsedatus tatas tatra tāv ubhau pramukhe sthitam
GE09ram_03_u:3981: 3.065.019a ghorau bhujau vikurvāṇam ubhau yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_03_u:3982: 3.065.019c karābhyāṃ vividhān gṛhya ṛṣkān pakṣigaṇān mṛgān
GE09ram_03_u:3984: 3.065.020c sthitam āvṛtya panthānaṃ tayor bhrātroḥ prapannayoḥ
GE09ram_03_u:3987: 3.065.022a sa mahābāhur atyarthaṃ prasārya vipulau bhujau
GE09ram_03_u:3988: 3.065.022c jagrāha sahitāv eva rāghavau pīḍayan balāt
GE09ram_03_u:3993: 3.065.025a ghoraṃ deśam imaṃ prāptau mama bhakṣāv upasthitau
GE09ram_03_u:3994: 3.065.025c vadataṃ kāryam iha vāṃ kimarthaṃ cāgatau yuvām
GE09ram_03_u:4001: 3.065.028c vyasanaṃ jīvitāntāya prāptam aprāpya tāṃ priyām
GE09ram_03_u:4003: 3.065.029c tvāṃ ca māṃ ca naravyāghra vyasanaiḥ paśya mohitau
GE09ram_03_u:4005: 3.065.030a śūrāś ca balavantaś ca kṛtāstrāś ca raṇājire
GE09ram_03_u:4011: 3.066.001a tau tu tatra sthitau dṛṣṭvā bhrātarau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:4013: 3.066.002a tiṣṭhataḥ kiṃ nu māṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhārtaṃ kṣatriyarṣabhau
GE09ram_03_u:4015: 3.066.003a tac chrutvā lakṣmaṇo vākyaṃ prāptakālaṃ hitaṃ tadā
GE09ram_03_u:4017: 3.066.004a tvāṃ ca māṃ ca purā tūrṇam ādatte rākṣasādhamaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4018: 3.066.004c tasmād asibhyām asyāśu bāhū chindāvahe gurū
GE09ram_03_u:4019: 3.066.005a tatas tau deśakālajñau khaḍgābhyām eva rāghavau
GE09ram_03_u:4021: 3.066.006a dakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ bāhum asaktam asinā tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4022: 3.066.006c ciccheda rāmo vegena savyaṃ vīras tu lakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4024: 3.066.007c khaṃ ca gāṃ ca diśaś caiva nādayañ jalado yathā
GE09ram_03_u:4026: 3.066.008c dīnaḥ papraccha tau vīrau kau yuvām iti dānavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4029: 3.066.010a ayam ikṣvākudāyādo rāmo nāma janaiḥ śrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4030: 3.066.010c asyaivāvarajaṃ viddhi bhrātaraṃ māṃ ca lakṣmaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:4033: 3.066.012a tvaṃ tu ko vā kimarthaṃ vā kabandha sadṛśo vane
GE09ram_03_u:4035: 3.066.013a evam uktaḥ kabandhas tu lakṣmaṇenottaraṃ vacaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4037: 3.066.014a svāgataṃ vāṃ naravyāghrau diṣṭyā paśyāmi cāpy aham
GE09ram_03_u:4038: 3.066.014c diṣṭyā cemau nikṛttau me yuvābhyāṃ bāhubandhanau
GE09ram_03_u:4039: 3.066.015a virūpaṃ yac ca me rūpaṃ prāptaṃ hy avinayād yathā
GE09ram_03_u:4040: 3.066.015c tan me śṛṇu naravyāghra tattvataḥ śaṃsatas tava
GE09ram_03_u:4042: 3.067.001c rūpam āsīn mamācintyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu viśrutam
GE09ram_03_u:4043: 3.067.001e yathā somasya śakrasya sūryasya ca yathā vapuḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4044: 3.067.002a so 'haṃ rūpam idaṃ kṛtvā lokavitrāsanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:4045: 3.067.002c ṛṣīn vanagatān rāma trāsayāmi tatas tataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4046: 3.067.003a tataḥ sthūlaśirā nāma maharṣiḥ kopito mayā
GE09ram_03_u:4049: 3.067.004c etad eva nṛśaṃsaṃ te rūpam astu vigarhitam
GE09ram_03_u:4050: 3.067.005a sa mayā yācitaḥ kruddhaḥ śāpasyānto bhaved iti
GE09ram_03_u:4052: 3.067.006a yadā chittvā bhujau rāmas tvāṃ dahed vijane vane
GE09ram_03_u:4053: 3.067.006c tadā tvaṃ prāpsyase rūpaṃ svam eva vipulaṃ śubham
GE09ram_03_u:4054: 3.067.007a śriyā virājitaṃ putraṃ danos tvaṃ viddhi lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:4055: 3.067.007c indrakopād idaṃ rūpaṃ prāptam evaṃ raṇājire
GE09ram_03_u:4057: 3.067.008c dīrgham āyuḥ sa me prādāt tato māṃ vibhramo 'spṛśat
GE09ram_03_u:4058: 3.067.009a dīrgham āyur mayā prāptaṃ kiṃ me śakraḥ kariṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:4059: 3.067.009c ity evaṃ buddhim āsthāya raṇe śakram adharṣayam
GE09ram_03_u:4061: 3.067.010c sakthinī ca śiraś caiva śarīre saṃpraveśitam
GE09ram_03_u:4062: 3.067.011a sa mayā yācyamānaḥ sann ānayad yamasādanam
GE09ram_03_u:4063: 3.067.011c pitāmahavacaḥ satyaṃ tad astv iti mamābravīt
GE09ram_03_u:4066: 3.067.013a evam uktas tu me śakro bāhū yojanam āyatau
GE09ram_03_u:4067: 3.067.013c prādād āsyaṃ ca me kukṣau tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭram akalpayat
GE09ram_03_u:4070: 3.067.015a sa tu mām abravīd indro yadā rāmaḥ salakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4071: 3.067.015c chetsyate samare bāhū tadā svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:4072: 3.067.016a sa tvaṃ rāmo 'si bhadraṃ te nāham anyena rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4073: 3.067.016c śakyo hantuṃ yathātattvam evam uktaṃ maharṣiṇā
GE09ram_03_u:4076: 3.067.018a evam uktas tu dharmātmā danunā tena rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4078: 3.067.019a rāvaṇena hṛtā sītā mama bhāryā yaśasvinī
GE09ram_03_u:4080: 3.067.020a nāmamātraṃ tu jānāmi na rūpaṃ tasya rakṣasaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4081: 3.067.020c nivāsaṃ vā prabhāvaṃ vā vayaṃ tasya na vidmahe
GE09ram_03_u:4083: 3.067.021c kāruṇyaṃ sadṛśaṃ kartum upakāre ca vartatām
GE09ram_03_u:4084: 3.067.022a kāṣṭhāny ānīya śuṣkāṇi kāle bhagnāni kuñjaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4085: 3.067.022c bhakṣyāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ vīra śvabhre mahati kalpite
GE09ram_03_u:4086: 3.067.023a sa tvaṃ sītāṃ samācakṣva yena vā yatra vā hṛtā
GE09ram_03_u:4087: 3.067.023c kuru kalyāṇam atyarthaṃ yadi jānāsi tattvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4088: 3.067.024a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa vākyaṃ danur anuttamam
GE09ram_03_u:4089: 3.067.024c provāca kuśalo vaktuṃ vaktāram api rāghavam
GE09ram_03_u:4090: 3.067.025a divyam asti na me jñānaṃ nābhijānāmi maithilīm
GE09ram_03_u:4091: 3.067.025c yas tāṃ jñāsyati taṃ vakṣye dagdhaḥ svaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4092: 3.067.026a adagdhasya hi vijñātuṃ śaktir asti na me prabho
GE09ram_03_u:4093: 3.067.026c rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahāvīryaṃ sītā yena hṛtā tava
GE09ram_03_u:4094: 3.067.027a vijñānaṃ hi mahad bhraṣṭaṃ śāpadoṣeṇa rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4096: 3.067.028a kiṃ tu yāvan na yāty astaṃ savitā śrāntavāhanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4097: 3.067.028c tāvan mām avaṭe kṣiptvā daha rāma yathāvidhi
GE09ram_03_u:4099: 3.067.029c vakṣyāmi tam ahaṃ vīra yas taṃ jñāsyati rākṣasaṃ
GE09ram_03_u:4100: 3.067.030a tena sakhyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ nyāyyavṛttena rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4102: 3.067.031a na hi tasyāsty avijñātaṃ triṣu lokeṣu rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4103: 3.067.031c sarvān parisṛto lokān purā vai kāraṇāntare
GE09ram_03_u:4104: 3.068.001a evam uktau tu tau vīrau kabandhena nareśvarau
GE09ram_03_u:4107: 3.068.002c citām ādīpayām āsa sā prajajvāla sarvataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4110: 3.068.004a sa vidhūya citām āśu vidhūmo 'gnir ivotthitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4111: 3.068.004c araje vāsasī vibhran mālāṃ divyāṃ mahābalaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4115: 3.068.006c prabhayā ca mahātejā diśo daśa virājayan
GE09ram_03_u:4117: 3.068.007c śṛṇu rāghava tattvena yathā sīmām avāpsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:4118: 3.068.008a rāma ṣaḍ yuktayo loke yābhiḥ sarvaṃ vimṛśyate
GE09ram_03_u:4121: 3.068.009c yat kṛte vyasanaṃ prāptaṃ tvayā dārapradharṣaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:4122: 3.068.010a tad avaśyaṃ tvayā kāryaḥ sa suhṛt suhṛdāṃ vara
GE09ram_03_u:4123: 3.068.010c akṛtvā na hi te siddhim ahaṃ paśyāmi cintayan
GE09ram_03_u:4124: 3.068.011a śrūyatāṃ rāma vakṣyāmi sugrīvo nāma vānaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4127: 3.068.012c nivasaty ātmavān vīraś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4128: 3.068.013a vayasyaṃ taṃ kuru kṣipram ito gatvādya rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4130: 3.068.014a na ca te so 'vamantavyaḥ sugrīvo vānarādhipaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4131: 3.068.014c kṛtajñaḥ kāmarūpī ca sahāyārthī ca vīryavān
GE09ram_03_u:4132: 3.068.015a śaktau hy adya yuvāṃ kartuṃ kāryaṃ tasya cikīrṣitam
GE09ram_03_u:4133: 3.068.015c kṛtārtho vākṛtārtho vā kṛtyaṃ tava kariṣyati
GE09ram_03_u:4134: 3.068.016a sa ṛkṣarajasaḥ putraḥ pampām aṭati śaṅkitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4138: 3.068.018a sa hi sthānāni sarvāṇi kārtsnyena kapikuñjaraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4140: 3.068.019a na tasyāviditaṃ loke kiṃ cid asti hi rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4142: 3.068.020a sa nadīr vipulāñ śailān giridurgāṇi kandarān
GE09ram_03_u:4145: 3.068.021c diśo vicetuṃ tāṃ sītāṃ tvadviyogena śocatīm
GE09ram_03_u:4151: 3.069.001c vākyam anvartham arthajñaḥ kabandhaḥ punar abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:4152: 3.069.002a eṣa rāma śivaḥ panthā yatraite puṣpitā drumāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4155: 3.069.003c aśvatthāḥ karṇikārāś ca cūtāś cānye ca pādapāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4156: 3.069.004a tān āruhyāthavā bhūmau pātayitvā ca tān balāt
GE09ram_03_u:4158: 3.069.005a caṅkramantau varān deśāñ śailāc chailaṃ vanād vanam
GE09ram_03_u:4159: 3.069.005c tataḥ puṣkariṇīṃ vīrau pampāṃ nāma gamiṣyathaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4162: 3.069.007a tatra haṃsāḥ plavāḥ krauñcāḥ kurarāś caiva rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4166: 3.069.009a rohitān vakratuṇḍāṃś ca nalamīnāṃś ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4167: 3.069.009c pampāyām iṣubhir matsyāṃs tatra rāma varān hatān
GE09ram_03_u:4170: 3.069.011a bhṛśaṃ te khādato matsyān pampāyāḥ puṣpasaṃcaye
GE09ram_03_u:4175: 3.069.013c apāṃ lobhād upāvṛttān vṛṣabhān iva nardataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4176: 3.069.013e rūpānvitāṃś ca pampāyāṃ drakṣyasi tvaṃ narottama
GE09ram_03_u:4178: 3.069.014c śītodakaṃ ca pampāyāṃ dṛṣṭvā śokaṃ vihāsyasi
GE09ram_03_u:4180: 3.069.015c utpalāni ca phullāni paṅkajāni ca rāghava
GE09ram_03_u:4181: 3.069.016a na tāni kaś cin mālyāni tatrāropayitā naraḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4184: 3.069.017c ye prapetur mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ śarīrāt svedabindavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4185: 3.069.018a tāni mālyāni jātāni munīnāṃ tapasā tadā
GE09ram_03_u:4189: 3.069.020a tvāṃ tu dharme sthitā nityaṃ sarvabhūtanamaskṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:4191: 3.069.021a tatas tad rāma pampāyās tīram āśritya paścimam
GE09ram_03_u:4193: 3.069.022a na tatrākramituṃ nāgāḥ śaknuvanti tam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:4194: 3.069.022c ṛṣes tasya mataṅgasya vidhānāt tac ca kānanam
GE09ram_03_u:4200: 3.069.025a śayānaḥ puruṣo rāma tasya śailasya mūrdhani
GE09ram_03_u:4201: 3.069.025c yat svapne labhate vittaṃ tat prabuddho 'dhigacchati
GE09ram_03_u:4203: 3.069.026c tatraiva praharanty enaṃ suptam ādāya rākṣasāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4208: 3.069.029a te tatra pītvā pānīyaṃ vimalaṃ śītam avyayam
GE09ram_03_u:4210: 3.069.030a rāma tasya tu śailasya mahatī śobhate guhā
GE09ram_03_u:4212: 3.069.031a tasyā guhāyāḥ prāgdvāre mahāñ śītodako hradaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4214: 3.069.032a tasyāṃ vasati sugrīvaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4216: 3.069.033a kabandhas tv anuśāsyaivaṃ tāv ubhau rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:4218: 3.069.034a taṃ tu khasthaṃ mahābhāgaṃ kabandhaṃ rāmalakṣmaṇau
GE09ram_03_u:4219: 3.069.034c prasthitau tvaṃ vrajasveti vākyam ūcatur antikāt
GE09ram_03_u:4220: 3.069.035a gamyatāṃ kāryasiddhyartham iti tāv abravīc ca saḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4221: 3.069.035c suprītau tāv anujñāpya kabandhaḥ prasthitas tadā
GE09ram_03_u:4226: 3.070.001a tau kabandhena taṃ mārgaṃ pampāyā darśitaṃ vane
GE09ram_03_u:4230: 3.070.003a kṛtvā ca śailapṛṣṭhe tu tau vāsaṃ raghunandanau
GE09ram_03_u:4232: 3.070.004a tau puṣkariṇyāḥ pampāyās tīram āsādya paścimam
GE09ram_03_u:4233: 3.070.004c apaśyatāṃ tatas tatra śabaryā ramyam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:4234: 3.070.005a tau tam āśramam āsādya drumair bahubhir āvṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:4236: 3.070.006a tau tu dṛṣṭvā tadā siddhā samutthāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4237: 3.070.006c pādau jagrāha rāmasya lakṣmaṇasya ca dhīmataḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4238: 3.070.007a tām uvāca tato rāmaḥ śramaṇīṃ saṃśitavratām
GE09ram_03_u:4239: 3.070.007c kaccit te nirjitā vighnāḥ kaccit te vardhate tapaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4240: 3.070.008a kaccit te niyataḥ kopa āhāraś ca tapodhane
GE09ram_03_u:4241: 3.070.008c kaccit te niyamāḥ prāptāḥ kaccit te manasaḥ sukham
GE09ram_03_u:4243: 3.070.009a rāmeṇa tāpasī pṛṣṭhā sā siddhā siddhasaṃmatā
GE09ram_03_u:4246: 3.070.010c itas te divam ārūḍhā yān ahaṃ paryacāriṣam
GE09ram_03_u:4247: 3.070.011a taiś cāham uktā dharmajñair mahābhāgair maharṣibhiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4248: 3.070.011c āgamiṣyati te rāmaḥ supuṇyam imam āśramam
GE09ram_03_u:4250: 3.070.012c taṃ ca dṛṣṭvā varāṃl lokān akṣayāṃs tvaṃ gamiṣyasi
GE09ram_03_u:4251: 3.070.013a mayā tu vividhaṃ vanyaṃ saṃcitaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE09ram_03_u:4253: 3.070.014a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā śabaryā śabarīm idam
GE09ram_03_u:4254: 3.070.014c rāghavaḥ prāha vijñāne tāṃ nityam abahiṣkṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:4255: 3.070.015a danoḥ sakāśāt tattvena prabhāvaṃ te mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4256: 3.070.015c śrutaṃ pratyakṣam icchāmi saṃdraṣṭuṃ yadi manyase
GE09ram_03_u:4257: 3.070.016a etat tu vacanaṃ śrutvā rāmavaktrād viniḥsṛtam
GE09ram_03_u:4258: 3.070.016c śabarī darśayām āsa tāv ubhau tad vanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:4261: 3.070.018a iha te bhāvitātmāno guravo me mahādyute
GE09ram_03_u:4263: 3.070.019a iyaṃ pratyak sthalī vedī yatra te me susatkṛtāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4269: 3.070.022a kṛtābhiṣekais tair nyastā valkalāḥ pādapeṣv iha
GE09ram_03_u:4271: 3.070.023a kṛtsnaṃ vanam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca śrutaṃ tvayā
GE09ram_03_u:4272: 3.070.023c tad icchāmy abhyanujñātā tyaktum etat kalevaram
GE09ram_03_u:4273: 3.070.024a teṣām icchāmy ahaṃ gantuṃ samīpaṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:4274: 3.070.024c munīnām āśraṃmo yeṣām ahaṃ ca paricāriṇī
GE09ram_03_u:4275: 3.070.025a dharmiṣṭhaṃ tu vacaḥ śrutvā rāghavaḥ sahalakṣmaṇaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4281: 3.071.001a divaṃ tu tasyāṃ yātāyāṃ śabaryāṃ svena karmaṇā
GE09ram_03_u:4282: 3.071.001c lakṣmaṇena saha bhrātrā cintayām āsa rāghavaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4283: 3.071.002a cintayitvā tu dharmātmā prabhāvaṃ taṃ mahātmanām
GE09ram_03_u:4287: 3.071.004a saptānāṃ ca samudrāṇām eṣu tīrtheṣu lakṣmaṇa
GE09ram_03_u:4288: 3.071.004c upaspṛṣṭaṃ ca vidhivat pitaraś cāpi tarpitāḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4289: 3.071.005a pranaṣṭam aśubhaṃ yat tat kalyāṇaṃ samupasthitam
GE09ram_03_u:4290: 3.071.005c tena tv etat prahṛṣṭaṃ me mano lakṣmaṇa saṃprati
GE09ram_03_u:4292: 3.071.006c tad āgaccha gamiṣyāvaḥ pampāṃ tāṃ priyadarśanām
GE09ram_03_u:4295: 3.071.007e nityaṃ vālibhayāt trastaś caturbhiḥ saha vānaraiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4296: 3.071.008a abhitvare ca taṃ draṣṭuṃ sugrīvaṃ vānararṣabham
GE09ram_03_u:4297: 3.071.008c tadadhīnaṃ hi me saumya sītāyāḥ parimārgaṇam
GE09ram_03_u:4298: 3.071.009a iti bruvāṇaṃ taṃ rāmaṃ saumitrir idam abravīt
GE09ram_03_u:4299: 3.071.009c gacchāvas tvaritaṃ tatra mamāpi tvarate manaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4300: 3.071.010a āśramāt tu tatas tasmān niṣkramya sa viśāṃ patiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4304: 3.071.011e etaiś cānyaiś ca vividhair nāditaṃ tad vanaṃ mahat
GE09ram_03_u:4305: 3.071.012a sa rāmo vidhivān vṛkṣān sarāṃsi vividhāni ca
GE09ram_03_u:4307: 3.071.013a sa tām āsādya vai rāmo dūrād udakavāhinīm
GE09ram_03_u:4310: 3.071.014c viveśa nalinīṃ pampāṃ paṅkajaiś ca samāvṛtām
GE09ram_03_u:4322: 3.071.020a sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ pampāṃ rāmaḥ saumitriṇā saha
GE09ram_03_u:4324: 3.071.021a tilakair bījapūraiś ca vaṭaiḥ śukladrumais tathā
GE09ram_03_u:4325: 3.071.021c puṣpitaiḥ karavīraiś ca puṃnāgaiś ca supuṣpitaiḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4329: 3.071.023a asyās tīre tu pūrvoktaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4331: 3.071.024a harir ṛkṣarajo nāmnaḥ putras tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4332: 3.071.024c adhyāste taṃ mahāvīryaḥ sugrīva iti viśrutaḥ
GE09ram_03_u:4334: 3.071.025c ity uvāca punar vākyaṃ lakṣmaṇaṃ satyavikramam
